customer_query: Hello, I'm trying to update my contact details but I'm having some trouble. I've booked a flight with Cebu Pacific and would like to change my contact number. What's the best way to do this?
resolution: You can update your contact number via Manage Booking. Please follow these steps: 1. Log in to your account, 2. Select your booking, 3. Go to the contact information section and update your phone number. Note that you can only do this up to 2 hours before your flight. Additionally, please make sure that you have the correct contact information on your valid ID to ensure a smooth check-in process. If you need assistance, you can contact our Live Agent via our app or website.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: Kumusta pag-update ng settings sa app para sa bagong bansa at lengguwahe?
resolution:
You can update your country and language settings on the Cebu Pacific app as follows:

1. Tap on 'Menu' at the top right corner of your screen.
2. Under 'Preferences', tap on 'Country' to access the available options.
3. Select your preferred country from the list.

Please note that selecting a new country may affect the availability of certain features and services. You can also change the language settings by tapping on 'Language' under 'Preferences' and selecting your preferred language from the list.

If you're having trouble with the app, please try refreshing the app or using a different browser. If the problem persists, please contact our customer support team.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: I am a person with reduced mobility (PRM) and I will be traveling to Hong Kong. Can I request wheelchair assistance upon arrival?
resolution: Yes, you can request wheelchair assistance upon arrival in Hong Kong. To do this, please declare your wheelchair request when you first book your flight or through Manage Booking on the app at least two (2) hours before departure. Our ground staff will collect your wheelchair for you before entering the aircraft, and it will be stored on the aircraft for proper safekeeping. Please note that our wheelchair service is only available upon arrival in Hong Kong, and you can use it when boarding.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I'm wondering if I can get a refund for my Travel Fund. How long does this process take?
resolution: To request a refund for your Travel Fund, please contact our support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or phone at 02 8585 8888. We will require your booking reference number and other necessary details to process your request. Please note that refunds can take up to 7-10 working days to process. We will notify you via email once your refund has been processed.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I've been trying to pay for my flight using GrabPay, but the transaction is failing. Can you help me?
resolution: Sorry to hear that. Our GrabPay feature is only available in Philippine Peso (PHP). Please check your booking total and ensure that your GrabPay account has sufficient funds. You can also try converting your booking total to PHP or contact GrabPay's customer support for assistance. If you need further help, contact our customer support at support@cebupacificair.com or call us at (+632) 8702-0888 with your booking reference number ready.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! WE BOOKED AN INFANT SEAT BUT THEY WON'T LET US CHOOSE SEATS NEXT TO EACH OTHER!!!!
resolution:
We understand your concern. Here's what you need to know:
* Infants with seats are required to have a seat next to the parent/guardian's, and this is charged at the lowest available fare.
* Unfortunately, this means you won't be able to choose seats next to each other.
* If you'd like to rebook your flight to accommodate your family's needs, please contact our customer service at [help@cebupacificair.com](mailto:help@cebupacificair.com) or +63 2 70 20 555 with your booking reference.
* Please note that there's a rebooking fee of PHP 1,200 per person, and you'll need to pay the fare difference if we can rebook your flight.
* To resolve this issue, please respond to this email with your preferred flight details, and we'll assist you with rebooking.
What's your preferred flight date and time for rebooking?

customer_query: I am a first-time traveler and I'm not sure if I need to purchase special baggage for my musical instrument. Can you please clarify?
resolution: Welcome to Cebu Pacific! According to our policy, special baggage is required for musical instruments, among other sports equipment. Please note that each guest is only allowed one special baggage per kind, with a weight limit of 20kg. Excess weight up to 32kg can be purchased separately. I recommend checking our baggage guidelines and upgrade options article for further instructions. Next step: review the baggage guidelines.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook yung aming flights kasi nag-iba yung schedule?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flights if the schedule changes. According to Cebu Pacific, if schedule changes or disruptions happen, we will provide options based on the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. You can check our website or social media for updates, or visit the article on 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight' for more information. To rebook, please contact our customer service and they will help you with the process.

customer_query: Kumusta? Gusto ko magtanong kung paano ko makapag-rebook ng booking ko para sa aking infant.
resolution:
Kamustahin, gusto mong mag-rebook ng booking mo para sa aking infant. 

Puwede kang mag-rebook sa ating website o sa mga airport counter. May mga mga requirements para sa CRS (Child Restraint System) na kailangan mong sundin. 

Para sa rebooking ay mayroong mga fee na kailangan bayaran. Magandang mensahe sa ating website para sa karagdagang impormasyon at para makapag-rebook ng booking mo.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!! I JUST REALIZED I DON'T HAVE A VISA!!! HELP!!!
resolution: Please check if you need a visa to visit Dubai at Cebu Pacific TravelDoc. According to the Dubai Airports Filming & Photography, Philippine passport holders must obtain a visa to visit Dubai. We can assist you in the re-booking process. Please call us at +632 7020 888 or log in to our website to proceed with the rebooking. Note that you will also be responsible for the rebooking fee. Please respond with your booking reference number or your complete name so we can assist you further. Resolution Time: 5 minutes

customer_query: I'm a bit concerned that I have to pay for a digital arrival card, but I couldn't find any information on a fee. Can you help me understand this and possibly waive the fee for my flight?
resolution: We appreciate your feedback. To clarify, there is no fee for submitting the TDAC. It's a free service provided by the Thai government. Please disregard any information suggesting otherwise. We'll make sure to update our knowledge base to reflect this. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. We're here to help.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners

customer_query: I'm trying to understand how the fare bundles work. Can you clarify the difference between GO Basic and GO Easy? Specifically, what's the deal with the baggage allowance?
resolution: The main difference between GO Basic and GO Easy is the baggage allowance. With GO Basic, you're only allowed 7kg hand-carry, while GO Easy includes 7kg hand-carry plus 1pc 20kg checked baggage. If you need to add or upgrade your baggage allowance, you can do so after selecting your fare bundle. Please note that each additional piece of checked baggage will incur a fee of PHP 300. You can consult our website for more information or contact our Customer Service team at [email address] or [phone number].

customer_query: i had a schedule change of 1 hour and my flight wasn't cancelled, but i would like to cancel my flight and get a travel fund instead. is this possible?
resolution: According to our airline policies, if your flight had a schedule change of at least 1 hour, you can cancel your flight and choose a travel fund instead. To do this, please visit our Manage Booking page and follow the instructions. Please note that you'll need to have an AMyCebuPacific account to make changes to your booking. If you have any questions or concerns about the travel fund or rebooking, please contact our customer support team at 1-800-CEBU-PACIFIC, and we'll be happy to assist you.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: I booked a flight last year with CEB Flexi, and I'd like to know if I can still use my Travel Fund to pay for a new flight, but this time with different dates. I feel that the policy on rebooking change fees is unfair.
resolution: ['I understand your concern, but our policy on rebooking change fees is clearly stated in our website.', 'Unfortunately, CEB Flexi does not cover rebooking change fees, and this policy cannot be waived.', 'However, I can offer you an alternative solution: you can use your Travel Fund to pay for a new flight, but you will need to pay the rebooking change fees separately.', 'If you would like to discuss this further or would like to know more about our rebooking fees, please contact our customer support team.']

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!! CAN I STILL BUY CEB TRAVELSURE?!?
resolution: Unfortunately, no, you won't be able to purchase CEB TravelSure anymore as it needs to be purchased up to 24 hours before your flight. In future, kindly purchase it when you book your flight or at least 24 hours in advance. If you have any other concerns, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Please review our booking process for future trips to purchase CEB TravelSure on time.

customer_query: Pwede ba mag-rebook ang aking piliin na biyahe
resolution: Oo, may mga pagkakataon na pwede ka mag-rebook ng iyong biyahe. Kung ikaw ay may CEB Flexi, pwede kang mag-rebook ng libre, subalit kailangan mong mag-cancellation ng iyong booking up to two hours bago ang paglipat. Kung hindi ka may CEB Flexi, pwede kang mag-rebook ngunit may mga mga bayad para sa pagbabago ng iyong tiket. Pwede kang mag-rebook online sa MyCebuPacific account o tulungan ng aming customer support team para sa mga detalye.

customer_query: I am a foreign national and booked my flight through a third-party site. Can I still rebook my flight?
resolution:
Yes, you can still rebook your flight if you booked through a third-party site. However, please note that there may be instances where our app or website doesn't recognize your booking reference number.
In this case, please contact the third-party site where your booking was originally created to retrieve your booking reference number. If you are unable to contact the third-party site, please contact our customer service team via our app or website and we will do our best to assist you.
Please note that rebooking is only possible up to 4 hours before the scheduled flight departure.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm a bit confused about the baggage allowance. Can you please clarify the weight restriction for checked baggage on my upcoming flight?
resolution: Our Online Travel Agency (OTA) bookings FAQ states that checked baggage allowance varies depending on the route and fare type. For your specific flight, checked baggage allowance is 23 kg. Excess baggage fees range from PHP 100 to PHP 200 per kilogram, depending on the route and fare type. To avoid any issues during check-in, we recommend checking the baggage policy for your specific flight on our website. Would you like me to assist you with your baggage allowance question?

customer_query: Can I add a bicycle to my checked baggage allowance, or do I need to purchase a special baggage add-on?
resolution: According to our policy, guests with sports equipment requiring special baggage add-ons will need to purchase this service. The bicycle will be part of the guest's checked baggage allowance, but its weight will not be pooled with prepaid baggage or surfboard allowance. Each guest is only allowed one special baggage per kind, with a weight limit of 20kg. To confirm, please visit our sports equipment page for more details. Next step: visit our sports equipment page.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I TRIED TO PAY WITH GCASH BUT IT SAYS INVALID PAYMENT!!! WHAT DO I DO!!!
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try checking your GCash account balance and ensure that it's sufficient for the payment. If you're experiencing issues with payment conversion, kindly try using a different e-Wallet or credit/debit card. For assistance with your payment, please contact our 24/7 hotline at +632 70-700-700 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). We're here to help!

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? ano ang mga requirements?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight but a rebooking fee of PHP 2,500 may apply. Please note that rebooking is subject to availability and fare difference. You can contact our customer service hotline at 87022222 to inquire about the requirements and fees. We'll be happy to assist you with the rebooking process.

customer_query: Dear Customer Service, I'm writing to inquire about the refund for my cancelled flight. I booked a seat sale promotion and was informed that the refund will be processed within 14 to 20 working days.
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. Unfortunately, we cannot expedite the refund process. According to our refund policy, refunds for cancelled flights will be processed within 14 to 20 working days. You will receive an email notification once the refund has been processed. Please check your email for updates on your refund status. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? kasi nagka-problem si flight ko
resolution: Dear passenger, yes, you can rebook your flight. Our airline follows the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights, which provides options for passengers in case of flight disruptions. To rebook, please visit our website or contact our customer service hotline. We'll guide you through the process and help you find a suitable alternative flight. Please note that rebooking fees may apply. For more information, please refer to our website or visit our customer service counters at the airport. Next step: please provide your flight details and preferred travel dates so we can assist you further.

customer_query: Why do I have to pay a rebooking fee? Is it not stated in the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights that I am entitled to a free rebooking?
resolution: We understand your concern. However, according to our article on 'Cebu Pacific Policies and Terms & Conditions', rebooking fees are subject to our policies. We will provide options based on the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights, but the fees for rebooking are listed in our policies. You can check the article on 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight' for more information. If you have any further concerns, please contact our customer service and we will be happy to assist you. We will do our best to find a solution for your situation.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko, may kailangan kong i-ask pa ba?
resolution: To rebook your flight with Cebu Pacific, please contact our customer support team as soon as possible. According to our Kaohsiung Airport and Travel Guide, changes to your flight itinerary may incur a fee. I recommend checking our website or mobile app for the exact rebooking fees and any applicable restrictions. Can you please provide me with your booking reference number and a brief explanation of your rebooking request so I can assist you further?

customer_query: I would like to know more about the Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC) and its requirements.
resolution:
• The TDAC is an online form that replaces the traditional paper-based arrival card for international travelers entering Thailand.
• It is free of charge and can be submitted within 3 days before entering Thailand.

To proceed, please visit the [Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC)](link) article to learn more about the requirements and submission process.
Next step: Fill out the TDAC online form and submit it before your flight.

customer_query: I recently booked a flight for my 12-year-old child and I was asked to pay the Unaccompanied Minor Fee. However, I believe this fee is unfair since my child is now considered an adult. Can you please explain why this fee is still required?
resolution: I understand your concern, and I appreciate you bringing this to our attention. However, according to our policy, children between the ages of 12 and 17 are still considered minors and require the Unaccompanied Minor Service. This service is provided to ensure their safety and comfort during the flight. The Unaccompanied Minor Fee is not a rebooking fee, but rather a separate fee for this service. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: Hello, I'd like to request some clarification on the CEB Flexi policy. If I purchase CEB Flexi after finishing my booking, will I still be able to cancel and get a refund?
resolution: ['Unfortunately, CEB Flexi can only be purchased at the time of booking, not after.', 'This is because adding CEB Flexi after booking is not allowed, and it does not cover rebooking change fees.', 'However, if you have purchased CEB Flexi and used it to cancel your flight, you can convert the value to a non-expiring Travel Fund within 24 hours.', 'If you have any further concerns or would like to discuss this policy, please contact our customer support team.']

customer_query: I'd like to inquire about the menu for long-haul flights. Can you tell me more about the meal service?
resolution: For long-haul flights, you can order up to four (4) meals per guest, per flight. Meals are served 1 hour after take-off and 2 hours before landing. You can view our meal options on our website at <https://cebupacificair.com/meals>. If you have any further questions or would like to place an order, please contact our customer care team at +639063245632 or +63323059990.

customer_query: I'm disputing the rebooking fee. I think it's unfair that I have to pay extra for changing my flight.
resolution: We understand your concern. According to our policies, rebooking fees are subject to change due to various circumstances. Please refer to our website for the current rebooking fee rates. If you believe you've been incorrectly charged, kindly contact our customer support at support@cebupacificair.com or call us at (+632) 8702-0888 with your booking reference number ready. We'll review your case and provide a resolution within 3-5 business days. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

customer_query: I selected the GO Basic fare bundle but I have 23kg of checked baggage. Can I add more baggage allowance?
resolution: **You can add more baggage allowance, but only after selecting a fare bundle**. According to our Fare Bundle Guidelines, you can add or upgrade your baggage allowance after selecting a fare bundle. The GO Basic fare bundle only includes 7kg hand-carry baggage allowance, but you can purchase additional baggage allowance for a fee. Please contact our support team at https://www.cebupacificair.com/contact-us to know more about our baggage allowance fees. **How many extra kilograms of baggage do you need to add?**

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! IS CEBU PACIFIC ALLOWED TO FLY FROM MANILA TO Kaohsiung WITH ONLY 3X WEEKLY FLIGHTS?
resolution: Unfortunately, our flights from Manila to Kaohsiung are only available 3x weekly, as stated in our Kaohsiung Airport and Travel Guide. Please check our website or mobile app for the latest schedule. You can also contact our customer support team via phone or chat for assistance. We recommend checking in online and printing or downloading your boarding pass to speed up the airport process.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng infant na meron na seat sa booking ko?
resolution:
Kamustahin, gusto mong mag-rebook ng infant na meron na seat sa booking mo. 

Puwede kang mag-rebook, ngunit may mga bagong requirements para sa CRS (Child Restraint System) para sa infant mo. 

Ikaw ay kailangang mag-purchase ng CRS na sumasang-ayon sa FMVSS (Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards) o na-certified ng Civil Aviation Authority (CAA). 

Para sa rebooking ay mayroong mga fee na kailangan bayaran. Magandang mensahe sa ating website para sa karagdagang impormasyon at para makapag-rebook ng booking mo.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kapag natanggap ko ang Flight Swap offer? at magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight when you receive a Flight Swap offer. According to Cebu Pacific's Flight Swap offer, you can change your flight to another one offered by Cebu Pacific (same route, different time/date) and receive Travel Fund credits. There are no fees or hidden charges if you decide to accept the offer. However, please note that availability may vary depending on timing, travel dates, and other operational factors. Resolution time: 7 minutes.

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! i cant find the baggage allowance in the shanghai airport guide!!!
resolution: To clarify the baggage allowance for your flight from Manila to Shanghai, please check our website for the correct information. According to our Shanghai Airport and Travel Guide, you can bring up to 7 kg of hand carry baggage and 10 kg of checked baggage with a total fee of PHP 200 for excess baggage. For more information on baggage allowance and fees, kindly contact our 24/7 hotline at +63 917 523 3000. Please note that baggage check-in closes 1 hour before flight departure.

customer_query: i want to pay for my flight using my American Express card but the option is not available. Can you please assist me?
resolution: Our system accepts American Express cards for payment. However, it's possible that there might have been an error in our system. Please try checking our accepted forms of payment on our website or in the Cebu Pacific app. If the issue persists, kindly contact our customer support team at +632 70-700-700 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). We'll be happy to assist you with your payment.

customer_query: I pre-ordered a meal but wasn't served it during the flight. I feel that this is unacceptable and I would like a full refund.
resolution: We're sorry to hear that you weren't served your meal during the flight. If you're not satisfied with your in-flight meal, you can contact our live agents who will assist you in resolving the issue. Unfortunately, we cannot offer a full refund for unserved meals. However, we can provide a partial refund or offer an alternative solution. Please contact our live agents to discuss further. Next steps: Contact our live agents at 24/7 and discuss your issue.

customer_query: I am having trouble purchasing the CEB Transfers add-on because I don't have a MyCebuPacific account. How do I create one?
resolution:
To create a MyCebuPacific account, follow these steps:
1. Open the Cebu Pacific app.
2. Tap on the 'Sign Up' button.
3. Fill in the required information, including your name, email address, and password.

Once you have created your account, you can log in and purchase the CEB Transfers add-on. You can also contact us at XXX-XXX-XXXX for assistance with creating your account.

Note: Please sign up for a MyCebuPacific account at least 24 hours before your flight to ensure availability of the CEB Transfers add-on.

customer_query: I'd like to change my child's passenger type from child to adult on one of my flights. Can I do this?
resolution: Unfortunately, our passenger type cannot be changed once the booking has been paid. However, you can book separate one-way flights for your child if you need to change their passenger type during the travel period. Please note that this will incur an additional fee. You can contact our customer support team via [email](mailto:customer_support@cebupacific.com) or [phone](tel:02-702-0888) to discuss your options. The fee for rebooking is subject to change, but you can expect to pay around PHP [insert fee amount].

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I FORGOT TO GET MY KOREA E-ARRIVAL CARD!!! PLEASE TELL ME I CAN STILL GET IT!!!
resolution: You can still submit your Korea e-Arrival Card, but you need to do it within three days of your entry date. Since your flight is tomorrow, you won't be able to submit it in time. However, you can check-in online at least 1 hour before your flight time and complete the Korea e-Arrival Card at the Incheon International Airport check-in counter. Please ensure you have a valid passport and visa. There's no additional fee for this, but you might need to pay for printing the card if you haven't already done so. Contact our support team at least 2 hours before your flight for assistance at +63 917 725 5711. Resolution time: 5 minutes. Please confirm you've completed the online check-in and are on your way to the airport.

customer_query: I'M BOARDING TOMORROW AND I FORGOT TO DECLARE MY SERVICE DOG!!! WHAT DO I DO??
resolution: We're happy to help you. To board with your service dog, please contact our customer support immediately to inform us. You can reach us at +63 998 888 1234 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Please be prepared to provide documentation confirming that your dog is trained to perform specific tasks for individuals with reduced mobility. You may also visit our website to update your booking and declare your service dog. We'll be happy to assist you as soon as possible.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I'm a member of the AFP and I'd like to bring my firearm on my domestic flight. Do I need any special permits?
resolution:
* As an active member of the AFP, you are allowed to bring firearms in your checked baggage. 
* To do so, you need to bring the following documents: valid service / agency ID, valid Memorandum Receipt / Acknowledgement Receipt Equipment, and valid Mission Order/Letter Order. 
* Please note that the Firearms Handling Fee will be charged per sector and per guest. 

Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding your baggage, sir?
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!! HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO PROCESS REFUND IF I HAVE CEB FLEXI?!?!?
resolution:
If you have the CEB Flexi add-on, you can cancel your booking and convert it to Travel Fund. Please contact our Live Agent via the Cebu Pacific app or website to initiate the process. Once you receive an email confirmation of the Travel Fund conversion, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days. Please note that Travel Fund conversions are non-refundable and non-transferable. To check your Travel Fund balance, log in to your Cebu Pacific account and navigate to 'My Booking'.

Next step: Please reply with your booking reference number so I can assist you further.
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! HOW DO I CHECK-IN ONLINE???
resolution:
For urgent cases like yours, please visit our website at [www.cebupacificair.com](http://www.cebupacificair.com) and click on 'Check-in' to proceed with online check-in. If you're unable to check-in online, kindly proceed to the Ninoy Aquino International Airport Terminal 3 for check-in assistance. The check-in counters open 3 hours prior to your flight's scheduled departure time. Please be prepared to pay a late check-in fee of PHP 500 per person. We recommend arriving at least 2 hours before your flight to ensure a smooth process. Please follow these steps to complete your check-in: 
1. Visit our website and click on 'Check-in'. 
2. Log in to your account and select your flight. 
3. Fill out the check-in form and confirm your booking. 
4. Print your boarding pass or present it on your mobile device at the airport. If you have any issues, you may contact our customer service hotline at +63 2 70 70 700 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) for assistance. 
Resolution Time: 5 minutes

If you've already booked, please contact us immediately so we can assist you with your travel plans. Next steps: Check your passport details and contact us if you have any concerns.

customer_query: ano kaya ang gagawin ko kung gusto kong mag-add ng booking sa account ko?
resolution: You can link or add a booking to your account if you're one of the guests or if the full name or email in your booking matches the details in your MyCebuPacific account. Check if you meet these requirements before proceeding. If you still encounter issues, please contact our customer support team via the app or website.

customer_query: I'm disputing the rebooking fee. I was told it's non-refundable but the article says I can rebook if I contact you.
resolution: I understand your concern and would be happy to help you resolve this. However, according to our policy, rebooking fees are non-refundable.
