customer_query: can i use my travel voucher during peak travel periods?
resolution:
Unfortunately, Travel Vouchers cannot be used during peak travel periods. According to our guidelines, Travel Vouchers are not allowed for use during the following periods:
	* October 29, 2025 to November 4, 2025
	* December 12, 2025 to January 6, 2026
	* March 25, 2026 to April 9, 2026
	* October 28, 2026 to November 3, 2026. If you're planning to travel during these periods, please check with our reservation office for alternative options.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CAN I STILL REBOOK TO A DIFFERENT FLIGHT ON THE SAME DAY?
resolution: According to our airport travel guide, you can rebook your flight 7 days prior to your scheduled departure date. However, if you rebook on the same day as your original flight, a rebooking fee of PHP 2,500 will be applied. The fee is non-refundable and non-transferable. Please contact our customer service hotline at (+63 02) 70 70 70 so we can assist you with the rebooking process. Please have your booking reference number ready and be prepared to provide additional information about your preferred flight schedule. How many minutes are you away from the airport?

customer_query: What happens if my baggage is delayed and does not arrive at my destination airport? Can you provide more information on the delay compensation?
resolution: If your checked baggage did not arrive with you at the destination airport, please report it immediately. While we locate your baggage, we will also provide you with the following delay compensation: Php2,000 for every 24 hours of delay, and if your checked baggage is not delivered within 24 hours, the applicable baggage fees will be refunded. You will be notified of the total compensation within 7 days of reporting. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

customer_query: I NEED MY INVOICE FOR TOMORROW!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!!
resolution:
We can help you with your invoice. Here's what you can do:
• Check your spam folder for the invoice.
• If you haven't received it, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help issue an invoice.
• They will assist you within 5 minutes. We will guide you through the process and ensure you receive your invoice in a timely manner.

What is your booking reference number so we can locate your invoice and assist you further?

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung meron na akong booking at na-cancel na yung flight? may fee ba?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight, but please check the rebooking policy. According to our policy, you can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, you may be required to pay a fee. However, since your flight was cancelled, we will waive the rebooking fee. You can go to our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or use the 'Manage Booking' option on the Cebu Pacific app or website to rebook your flight. Next step: Try rebooking your flight using our SSDP or mobile app and ask about any additional fees.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay PHP 500 for the first 20kg of special baggage when I'm already paying for my regular baggage allowance. Can you explain your policies?
resolution: We understand your concern, sir/ma'am. However, our special baggage policy is designed to accommodate guests who require additional or non-standard baggage items. The PHP 500 fee is applied to each special baggage item, regardless of whether it exceeds the weight limit of 20kg or not. We hope you understand that this is a necessary measure to ensure the comfort and safety of all our passengers. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I believe the rebooking fee of PHP 1,200 is unreasonable for my situation. I would like to know more about your rebooking policies and what alternatives I have.
resolution: Thank you for sharing your concern. Our rebooking fee is in line with our standard policies for cancellations and changes. However, I'd be happy to discuss possible alternatives with you. If you're willing to surrender your original flight, we may be able to waive the rebooking fee. Please call our hotline at (02) 7020-8888 so we can further discuss your options. Is there a specific date in mind for your rebooking?
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: pwede ba makakuha ng Travel Fund kung ang aking pagkakataon ay binuwag ng Cebu Pacific?
resolution:
Yes, you are eligible to receive a Travel Fund if your flight was disrupted (i.e. canceled or had a 1hr+ schedule change). However, you will need to contact our customer service team to process the request. Please follow these steps:

1. Log into your MyCebuPacific account and go to 'Manage Booking' to confirm the disruption of your flight.
2. Contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [email](mailto:feedback@cebupacificair.com) to request a Travel Fund.

We will need to verify the eligibility of your request and process the Travel Fund accordingly. Please note that the Travel Fund is a non-expiring virtual wallet that you can use to pay for your future travel plans.

customer_query: Ang layunin ko ay makarating sa Hong Kong kagabalà ng tanghali. Pwede ko bang mag-book ng seat na malapit sa gate?
resolution: I'd be happy to help you with your seat selection! However, please note that seat selection is subject to availability and may incur an additional fee. According to our travel guide, Cebu Pacific operates flights to and from Hong Kong via Hong Kong International Airport, Terminal 1, offering convenient travel options from key cities in the Philippines. While we can't guarantee a seat near the gate, we can try to accommodate your request. If you book a seat selection, I recommend checking the flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on boarding gates and other important information. Please let me know if you'd like to proceed with seat selection, and I'll be happy to guide you through the process. By the way, what type of seat are you interested in?
source_article: Hong Kong Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: i paid for my flight but i see that i still have an outstanding balance... how do i pay for this?
resolution: To pay for your outstanding balance, please follow these steps: 1) Log in to your Cebu Pacific account using your email address and password. 2) Go to the 'Manage Booking' section and click on 'Payment and Receipt Concerns'. 3) Select the payment method you prefer (credit card, PayPal, etc.) and enter the payment details. 4) Confirm the payment and update your booking. You can also contact our customer support team for assistance with payment and receipts. We're available 24/7.

customer_query: I tried to check-in online but it won't let me. What's the baggage allowance for my flight?
resolution: Dear passenger, we apologize for the inconvenience. You can check our baggage allowance policy on our website. As per our policy, you can bring one checked baggage with a maximum weight of 30 kg. You can also purchase additional baggage allowance through our website or at the airport. To resolve the issue, please try checking-in online again and contact our customer service hotline if you encounter any further issues. Please note that our website may experience technical difficulties, and our customer service hotline is available 24/7. Next step: please try checking-in online and contact us if you need further assistance.

customer_query: I am disappointed that the airport counters for international flights close one hour before departure. I feel that this is unfair and would like to know if there is any alternative solution.
resolution: We understand your concern, and we appreciate your feedback. However, the airport counter hours are mentioned in the article as a general guideline to ensure that passengers have enough time to check in and go through security before their flight departs. If you have any concerns about the airport counter hours, you can contact Cebu Pacific's customer support at 02 7744 6666 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to discuss possible alternatives. We will do our best to assist you.

customer_query: Hello, I am a senior citizen and I would like to request assistance with check-in and boarding. What is the process for requesting assistance?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. To request assistance with check-in and boarding, please declare your request ahead of time by calling our Cebu Pacific hotline at +632 7020 8888 or through Manage Booking on the app. You can also inform staff about your request when you arrive at the airport. We will make sure to provide you with a dedicated lane for PWDs/PRMs and Senior Citizens. Please note that you can request assistance when you first book a flight or through Manage Booking on the app at least two (2) hours before departure.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I have tried to change my language to English but it's still in Filipino. I have refreshed the page and tried a different browser but it's still not working.
resolution: To change the language on our website, please click on the language selector located at the top right of the page. If the language selector is greyed out, please refresh the website or try a different browser. If the language still hasn't changed, click on the country selector at the bottom of the website and select your preferred country from the list. If you're trying to change to English, please select 'Philippines'. If you're still experiencing issues, please try contacting our support team via our in-app chat or website for further assistance.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung may bagyo sa airport?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight due to bad weather. We will provide options based on the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. Please visit our website and click on 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight' for more information on the rebooking process. You can also contact our customer service at [insert contact number] for assistance. Please note that you may be required to pay a fee for rebooking, and the fee amount will be based on our rebooking fee policy.

customer_query: I'm not sure why I need to complete the digital arrival card when it's free. Is this a new policy or is it being implemented unfairly?
resolution: The introduction of the TDAC is a new requirement by the Thai government, starting May 1, 2025. This change aims to streamline the arrival process and ensure accurate information. We understand your concern, but kindly note that this policy is not being implemented unfairly. If you have further questions or concerns, please contact our support team for further assistance.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm having trouble checking in online for my flight. I used a third-party booking website and now I'm experiencing issues with my booking reference number.
resolution: I understand your concern. Please try to contact the third-party booking website you used to obtain your booking reference number. If you're still experiencing issues, you can contact our customer service team at (02) 7020-8888 for assistance. We'll be happy to help you resolve this issue. Please have your flight details and booking reference number ready. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: sir/mam, pwede po ba akong magtanong kung ano-ano ang mga katiwalagan na pwedeng i-bring sa checked baggage?
resolution: Maraming salamat for your question. According to our article, you can bring the following items in your checked baggage: appliances, electronics, and gadgets; food, health, and personal care items; mobility and household items; sports and hobby equipment; and miscellaneous items. However, please note that some items may be subject to restrictions or fees. For example, lithium batteries and fuel cells are not allowed in checked baggage. You may want to double-check our article or contact our customer service for more information. What type of item do you plan to bring?
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: HELP!!! I booked with Agoda but the app says it can't find my booking!!!
resolution: To resolve this issue, please contact the travel agency where your booking was originally created for assistance with retrieving your booking reference number. If you are unable to contact them, you can chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Please note that for any refund concerns, please visit this article: Refund Concerns. We will do our best to help you check-in and board your flight.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm not sure if I'm eligible for a refund. I have a medical condition and was unable to fly. Can you please tell me more about the refund process?
resolution: We can help you with your refund request! If you were unable to fly due to a medical condition, you may be eligible for a refund. To start the process, please contact us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can guide you through the steps. You can also refer to our refund eligibility criteria for more information. Resolution Time: 7 minutes

customer_query: I'M NEW TO CEBU PACIFIC. HOW DO I ACCESS MY BOOKING IF I BOOKED THROUGH AN AGENT?
resolution: For bookings made through an accredited Cebu Pacific sales partner, you can manage your bookings through your agent or by contacting our customer service team. To access your booking, please contact your agent, who will assist you with the process. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service team through the Cebu Pacific app or website, available 24/7. Please have your reference number ready for easier assistance.
source_article: AirSWIFT Airlines Migrates to Cebu Pacific System

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I WANT TO CHANGE MY FLIGHT TIME BUT I CANT BECAUSE I DONT KNOW IF I CAN CHANGE THE SEQUENCE OF MY FLIGHT!!!
resolution: You cannot change the sequence of your flight, but you can rebook your flight with the same origin and destination up to 2 hours before the scheduled flight time. Unfortunately, this means you won't be able to change your flight time to tomorrow. You can try calling our customer support hotline at +63 2 8516 0700 or visit our website to rebook your flight. Please note that fare differences and change fees may apply.
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! I need wheelchair assistance and I forgot to declare it when I booked!
resolution: You can declare wheelchair assistance at least 2 hours before departure through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. Please log in and request assistance under the 'Special Requests' section. If you've already missed the 2-hour mark, please call our customer service hotline at 7020-8888 to request assistance.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay PHP 5,000 for rebooking my flight. Can you explain the policy behind this fee?
resolution: Our rebooking fee is in accordance with our CEB TravelSure policies. However, we can provide more information on the fee and the conditions for rebooking. Please refer to our website or contact our customer service team to discuss your specific situation and possible alternatives. Please note that changes to your policy can be made via Chubb's Self-Service Portal or by contacting Chubb's customer service team directly.

customer_query: ano kaya ginagawa pag nag online check in pero may bayad pa sa baggage?
resolution: When checking in online with Cebu Pacific, you can pre-pay for your baggage allowance. According to the Kaohsiung Airport and Travel Guide, our flights allow a certain number of checked bags, but excess baggage fees may apply. Please check the Cebu Pacific website or mobile app for the exact baggage allowance and fees. If you have already checked in online but need to add or change your baggage, you can contact our customer support team for assistance.

customer_query: I'd like to book a flight for my 11-year-old child but I'm a bit confused about the Unaccompanied Minor Service. Do they get to sit with other kids or are they seated separately?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out! According to our policy, the Unaccompanied Minor Service is only available for domestic flights, and the child will be seated separately from other passengers. This is to ensure their safety and comfort during the flight. However, please note that we can only accept a limited number of unaccompanied minors per flight. I recommend booking your child's ticket as soon as possible to ensure availability. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: ano ba ang pwede kong gawin kung gusto kong mag-rebook ng flight ko?
resolution:
According to our policy, CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation and does not cover rebooking change fees. If you want to rebook your flight, you will need to pay the applicable rebooking fee. However, if you cancel your flight and convert the value to a Travel Fund, you can use this to pay for your future travel plans.

To rebook, please log into your MyCebuPacific account and follow these steps:

1. Go to 'Manage Booking' and select your flight.
2. Click on 'Rebook Flight' and choose your new travel dates.
3. Pay the applicable rebooking fee.

Please note that the price of CEB Flexi is based on your flight date and regulatory guidelines. If you have further questions or concerns, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [email](mailto:feedback@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I brought my own wheelchair onto the flight, do I need to pay extra for it?
resolution: You can bring your own wheelchair/mobility aid on the flight, free of charge. However, please note that this service is only available upon arrival on certain destinations. For other destinations, your wheelchair will be unloaded from the cargo hold and delivered to the baggage arrival carousel. In either case, our staff will make sure your wheelchair is stored properly and ready for you during deplaning. If you have any concerns about your wheelchair's storage or transportation, please contact our customer service at 02 853 6700 or +63917 524 6868 for further assistance.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko kung nahuli na ako ng isang oras?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight with us. According to our airport travel guide, we operate flights to and from Manila and Kuala Lumpur daily. However, please note that rebooking is subject to availability and may incur a fee. You can check our website or contact our customer service team to inquire about the rebooking fee and to proceed with the rebooking process. Please have your booking reference number ready for easy processing.
source_article: Kuala Lumpur Aiport and Travel Guide

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I DONT SEE MY ITINERARY RECEIPT!!!!!!
resolution: To retrieve your Itinerary Receipt, please check your email registered in the booking. Ensure you've completed payment for your flight or add-ons, as a receipt is sent within 24 hours. If it's been more than 24 hours, please try checking your inbox or junk folder. If you still can't find it, you can chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist within 5 minutes.

customer_query: excuse me, im new to flying and i was wondering what to do if i forgot my phone in the airport?
resolution: If you forgot your phone in the airport, don't worry! You can contact the airport's Lost & Found office directly. To do this, you can check our directory for the contact information of the airport's Lost & Found office. Please have your phone's details ready, such as the make and model. The airport staff will do their best to help you reunite with your phone. Please allow 6 minutes for us to provide you with the contact information for the airport's Lost & Found office.

customer_query: I'M RUNNING LATE, I JUST REALIZED I HAVE A POWER BANK! CAN I BRING IT IN MY CHECKED BAGGAGE?! I NEED TO KNOW NOW!!!
resolution: You can bring a power bank in your checked baggage, but please be aware that there may be additional fees. According to our article, Appliances, Electronics, and Gadgets are allowed in checked baggage. However, please check with our airport staff for any specific fees or restrictions. Typically, fees may range from 500 to 1,000 PHP per item. We recommend checking with our airport staff at least 2 hours prior to your flight.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: I'm trying to update my name but I'm being told that I can only change either the first or last name, and that I can only do this once. I don't think this is fair. Can you explain why I'm being charged a rebooking fee?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our policy is in place to ensure that passengers can only make necessary changes to their booking. The rebooking fee is applicable because you're making a change to your booking that's not allowed under our policy. According to our policy, you can only update either your first or last name once within 24 hours of booking completion. If you have any issues, you can get in touch with our Live Agent via our app or website, and they can assist you further. They can also explain the policy in more detail and address any concerns you may have.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I want to bring my service dog on a Cebgo flight but I see it's not yet accepted on DG. Can I still book and hope it'll be accepted on the day of the flight?
resolution: No, our policy requires that you declare the service dog at the time of booking or via Manage Booking. We cannot guarantee acceptance if you do not declare your service dog at the time of booking. However, you can contact our customer support team for assistance with rebooking on a different flight that accepts service animals. Resolution time: 12 minutes.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I am having trouble with the online check-in process. Can you please provide a step-by-step guide?
resolution: To online check-in, follow these steps: 1. Log in to your MyCebuPacific account. 2. Select your flight and enter your booking reference number and surname. 3. Print or download your boarding pass. Please note that airport counters close one hour before departure for international flights and 45 minutes before departure for domestic flights. It is recommended to online check-in at least an hour before your flight to avoid any issues. If you encounter any difficulties, please contact our 24/7 hotline at +632-8716-0700 or visit our website at <www.cebupacificair.com>. Next step: online check-in and print/download your boarding pass.

customer_query: Can I purchase CEB Transfers when I check-in online?
resolution: According to the article, you can purchase CEB Transfers when booking your flight or up to 24 hours before your flight via Manage Booking in the Cebu Pacific app. Unfortunately, it does not specify if you can purchase CEB Transfers during online check-in. For assistance with online check-in or booking, please contact Cebu Pacific through their website or call their customer service hotline.

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND ITS BEEN DELAYED!!! WHAT OPTIONS DO I HAVE FOR REBOOKING!!!
resolution: According to our airline policies, if your flight is delayed by 1 hour or longer, you can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after the original schedule. To rebook, you can visit our website and use our online rebooking system or contact our customer service via phone or email. Please note that rebooking fees may apply if you rebook within 24 hours of the original flight. You can reach our customer service at +63 2 879-0888 or email us at [customercare@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customercare@cebupacificair.com). We will do our best to accommodate your new flight schedule.

customer_query: I would like to rebook my flight but I'm not sure if I can do it online. Can you assist me?
resolution: Yes, you can definitely rebook your flight online by accessing your MyCebuPacific account and following these steps: 1) Log in to your account. 2) Click on the 'Booking' tab. 3) Find your booking and click on the 'Rebook' button. 4) Follow the instructions on the next page to complete the rebooking process. If you need help, please contact our Customer Support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or through our website's contact page. We'll be happy to assist you.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: We find it unreasonable to be charged for the Unaccompanied Minor Fee on domestic flights. Can we discuss this further?
resolution: We understand your concerns, but our policy requires a fee to ensure the child's safety and comfort during the flight. The fee is non-negotiable. However, we can offer you a refund on the fee if you cancel your booking and choose not to travel with an unaccompanied minor. Please contact our customer service for further assistance.

customer_query: Flight tomorrow! Can I use Customs e-Gates with my Philippine passport?
resolution: To use Customs e-Gates at Fukuoka Airport, your Philippine passport should be biometric (IC) passport. Please ensure you have an IC passport for faster processing. You can check your passport type on the government's official website. If you do not have an IC passport, you can contact the embassy or consulate of Japan for assistance.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!! WHY CANNOT I ADD MY BOOKING TO MY ACCOUNT?!?!
resolution: We cannot add your booking to your account because it has been added to another account. Please contact the account holder of the other account to resolve the issue. You can also try logging in to the other account and checking if the booking is linked. If you still need help, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you. Please have your booking reference number ready when you contact us. Resolution time: 5 minutes
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I JUST LEARNED ABOUT TARMAC DELAYS!!! WILL WE SIT IN THE AIRPLANE FOR 2-3 HOURS!!!
resolution: Hello, I understand your concern about the tarmac delay. According to our policy, if your flight is delayed on the ground for 2-3 hours, the pilot will provide updates every 30 minutes and the cabin crew will ensure your comfort. They will also offer food and water after 2 hours. If you have any specific needs, please let the crew know so they can prioritize you. If you experience a delay tomorrow, call our customer service at +63 998 999 9999 for real-time updates. Next steps: Stay calm, follow crew instructions, and stay in touch with our customer service team.
source_article: What to Expect During Tarmac Delays

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a fee for checking in at the airport. Is this policy in place to ensure that passengers like me don't get free rides?
resolution: Our check-in fee policy is in place to maintain the efficiency of our check-in process. This fee is used to recover the costs associated with our ground staff and airport facilities. Please note that we offer online check-in free of charge as a convenient option for our passengers. If you have concerns about our policies, we encourage you to contact our customer service team to discuss further.

customer_query: I booked a flight to Melbourne and would like to request assistance boarding. I'm a senior citizen. How do I go about it?
resolution: We can help you with assistance boarding at the Melbourne Airport. Please declare your request at least 2 hours before your flight departure through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. You can also inform our staff about your request when you arrive at the airport and use the dedicated lane for Senior Citizens. Our staff will make sure your experience is smooth and hassle-free. We have a dedicated lane for Senior Citizens at the airport.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: ano ang requirements pala pagdala ng baril sa eroplano?
resolution: Para sa mga gun club members o mga may lisensya ng baril, kailangan ng valid firearms license, ID, Permit to carry firearms outside of the residence, at Permit to transport firearms and ammunitions. Maaari din kang tawagan sa airport counter para sa detalyadong mga pautangin. Pagpapadala ng baril sa eroplano ay may kinalaman sa Firearms Handling Fee, kung saan ay ibinabawas sa iyong bilhin nang flight. Maaari kang magtanong sa aming support team para sa mga detalyadong mga pautangin. Next step: Maaari kang magtanong sa aming support team para sa mga detalyadong mga pautangin.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko ng kahapon?
resolution:
Unfortunately, rebooking is not allowed on the same day. According to our flight suspension policy, rebooking is only allowed before February 27, 2026. Since yesterday is already after this deadline, rebooking is not an option for you.

However, you can choose to take note of the suspension and take the refund or travel fund option instead. Please visit our website or app to manage your booking and select one of these options.

Here are the steps to follow:
1. Visit our website or app and log in to your account.
2. Go to Manage Booking and select the flight you want to cancel.
3. Choose to take the refund or travel fund option.
4. Follow the prompts to complete the process.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

How much will I get back in my refund?
source_article: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Manila and Chiang Mai

customer_query: I am having trouble checking in online for my international flight to be honest I don't even know what kiosks or counters you're talking about.
resolution: We apologize for the confusion. If you're having trouble checking in online, you can use the self-service kiosks or line up at Cebu Pacific's airport counters. Make sure to arrive at the correct terminal (Terminal 3 for international flights) and follow the signs to the check-in area. If you're still having trouble, please contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-888 for assistance.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I FORGOT TO BUY CEB SPECIAL BAGGAGE!!
resolution: To add CEB Special Baggage, please log in to your MyCebuPacific account and manage your booking via the Cebu Pacific app. You can do this up to two hours before your flight. Note that each guest is only allowed one (1) of each kind of special baggage, and with a weight of 20kg each. If you need to pay an excess baggage fee, please be aware that baggage can be increased to a maximum weight of 32kg. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: What?! I was told by the airport staff that the Narita International Airport has a 3-day waiting period for refunds! This is so unfair! I booked my flight months ago and I need a refund now!
resolution: We understand your frustration, but according to our website, the refund policy states that refunds will be processed within 30 days after the scheduled departure date. If you're experiencing issues with your refund, please contact our customer service hotline at 02-851-8888 and provide your booking reference number and a detailed explanation of the issue. We'll review your case and provide a resolution as soon as possible. Please note that refunds may take longer than expected due to our airport partners' policies.

customer_query: I'm trying to check-in online but it's not available for me due to an outstanding balance. How can I pay for this and proceed with check-in?
resolution: You can pay for your outstanding balance via Manage Booking on our website. Once your payment is successful, you should be able to check-in online. Please ensure that you pay before the online check-in closes for your flight (1 hour before domestic and 2 hours before international). If you need assistance, please contact our support team via the app or at https://www.cebupacificair.com/contact-us.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! MY BABY HAS PEANUT ALLERGY! CAN I STILL ORDER MEAL?
resolution: We understand your concern about your baby's peanut allergy. Unfortunately, according to our policy, the actual meal served may have allergens that are not known until the meal is prepared. However, we can provide a list of safe meal options for peanut allergy. Please contact our customer care team at +639063245632 or +63323059990 to discuss your options and place your order.

customer_query: I'm a first-time flyer, I have a wheelchair, and I'm going to Cebu. Is it okay to bring my own wheelchair on the flight? How do I request assistance at the airport?
resolution: Yes, you can bring your own wheelchair on the flight for free! You can declare your wheelchair request at least 4 hours before your flight departure. Just inform our staff about your request when you arrive at the airport, and we'll make sure your wheelchair is stored in the aircraft for proper safekeeping and ready for you when you deplane. Please note that this service is only available upon arrival at our destination. You can use the dedicated lane for Persons with Disabilities/Reduced Mobility at the airport.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: why do you charge PHP 1,500 for rebooking, and what if i have a medical condition that prevents me from traveling on my original flight date?
resolution: We charge PHP 1,500 for rebooking to cover administrative costs. However, if you have a medical condition that prevents you from traveling on your original flight date, please contact our customer service hotline at 7020-8888 to discuss your options. We may be able to accommodate your request for free, but please provide documentation supporting your medical condition. If you're eligible, we'll waive the rebooking fee and assist you with rebooking your flight.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I NEED!!! assistance boarding my flight TOMORROW!!! I just booked a flight to Hong Kong and I'm worried about getting to the plane on time.
resolution: We can help you with mobility assistance at the Hong Kong International Airport. Please declare your request at least 2 hours before your flight departure through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. You can also inform our staff about your request when you arrive at the airport and use the dedicated lane for Persons with Disabilities/Reduced Mobility. We'll make sure your wheelchair is stored in the aircraft for proper safekeeping and ready for you when you deplane. Please note that this service is only available upon arrival at our Hong Kong destination. No extra fee is required for this service.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I want to request wheelchair assistance for my mother, but I'm not sure if it will be ready when we arrive at the destination.
resolution: We understand your concern. According to our policy, your wheelchair will be stored in the aircraft for proper safekeeping, and the wheels will not be deflated. When we arrive at the destination, our staff will make sure your wheelchair is ready for you. Please note that this service is only available upon arrival on the following destinations. If you have any issues, feel free to contact our customer service team at +632 8702 0888.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I would like to request a refund for my flight but I booked through a third-party agent. Can I get a refund for the full amount?
resolution: Unfortunately, our refund policy does not allow for full refunds when booking through a third-party agent. According to our website, a Php 1,000 fee will be deducted from the refund amount for online transactions. Additionally, our refund timeline is 30 days from the original ticket date. Please contact the third-party agent for assistance with your refund request. You can also contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 for further assistance. Next step: Please contact the third-party agent to request a refund.
source_article: Da Nang Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm a bit confused, if I'm flying out of Manila, which terminal should I go to?
resolution: You can check the flight terminal by checking your flight itinerary. For Cebu Pacific flights, here are the terminal assignments: 5J flights depart from NAIA Terminal 3, DG flights depart from NAIA Terminal 2, and T6 flights depart from NAIA Terminal 2. We recommend checking your itinerary again to confirm the correct terminal.

customer_query: Kung magkano ang bayad para sa wheelchair assistance?
resolution: Unfortunately, the article does not mention any fee for wheelchair assistance. However, I can provide you with more information. According to our policy, wheelchair assistance is free. Please note that this service is only available upon arrival on the following destinations. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact our customer service team at +632 8702 0888.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: magkano ang bayad sa rebooking na nangyari sa akin dahil sa transfer ng flights?
resolution: According to our rebooking policy, a fee of PHP 500 will be incurred if you rebook your flight due to changes in flight schedule. In your case, the transfer of flights to Clark International Airport (CRK) is a scheduled change, and you will need to pay the rebooking fee. You can contact our customer service team to discuss further and make necessary arrangements.
source_article: Transfer of San Jose Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight sa Sapporo pag hindi ko kinaya ang oras ko?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight to Sapporo. To do so, please log in to your Manage Booking account on our website or mobile app. Click on 'Rebook' and select your new preferred flight schedule. Please note that there may be a rebooking fee of PHP 1,500, which will be deducted from your refundable travel fund. If you have any issues, please contact our customer service at +632 7020 888 or [email address].
source_article: Sapporo (New Chitose) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I think the rebooking fee is too high, can you please explain why it's PHP1,200 per passenger?
resolution: We understand your concern. Our rebooking fee of PHP1,200 per passenger is as stated on our website, and it's clearly outlined in our terms and conditions. This fee helps us to manage our flight schedules and maintain the quality of our service. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team. You can also visit our website or social media channels for more information on our rebooking policy. Can you please confirm your flight number and date of travel so we can check on the rebooking fee?

customer_query: I am a first-time traveler and I just got my new passport. Can I use my new passport to travel to Dubai?
resolution: Congratulations on your new passport! However, please note that your new passport must be valid for at least six months from your date of entry into Dubai. As stated in the Dubai Airport and Travel Guide, passports that have had their validity extended will not be accepted. Only the expiry date printed on the main bio-data page is accepted. For your travel requirements, we recommend checking if your new passport meets the requirements. Please call us at +632 7020 888 or log in to our website to check your eligibility. Resolution Time: 4 minutes

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook sa international flights kung nakapila na ako sa airport?
resolution: For international flights, airport counters close one hour before departure. Please arrive at the airport three hours before your flight schedule. If you have already checked in online and are still at the airport, please proceed to the airport counters to inquire about rebooking options. However, please note that rebooking fees may apply. You can check our article on the Cebu Pacific International Travel Guide for more information. Next steps: Please proceed to the airport counters to inquire about rebooking options and confirm the rebooking fee.
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: hi, i was wondering if there's a limit to the number of power banks i can bring in my checked baggage?
resolution: According to our 'Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?' article, there is no specific limit on the number of power banks you can bring in your checked baggage. However, please ensure that your power bank complies with our safety regulations and does not exceed the 100Wh limit. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at [cscenter@cebupacificair.com](mailto:cscenter@cebupacificair.com).
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: What is the process for requesting a refund for my disrupted flight? Can I get a refund of my fare?
resolution: We're sorry to hear that your flight was disrupted. According to our policy, you can request a refund of your fare according to your form of payment. Travel Tax and unused Travel Sure will have to be refunded separately. To request a refund, please access the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or go to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. Follow the on-screen instructions to initiate the refund process. Please note that refunds may take 3-5 business days to process. If you have any questions or concerns, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: MY 7 YEAR OLD WILL FLY TOMORROW WITHOUT ME!!! IS THERE ANY WAY SHE CAN TRAVEL ALONE????
resolution: We cannot allow children below 7 years old to travel alone without an adult companion who is at least 18 years old. However, you can book a ticket for your child and travel with an adult companion who meets the age requirement. Please contact our customer service at least 24 hours before your flight to arrange for the Unaccompanied Minor Service.

customer_query: KAILANGAN KO NG KAPATID KONG HIWAGANG TRAVEL SURE! PWEDENG MAG-BUY KABALIKAN PA?
resolution: You can purchase CEB TravelSure when you book your flight. If you've already booked and want to add it, you can do so via Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app up to 24 hours before your flight. A MyCebuPacific account is required. Please sign up and try again. If you have any issues, contact our customer service team via the app or call +632 8859 2774.

customer_query: I'm new to this airport transfer and I'm unsure of what to do. Can I still check-in online for my flight?
resolution: You can still check-in online for your flight. However, please note that your flight will be departing from Clark International Airport. You'll need to update your Itinerary Receipt to reflect the airport change. You can do this by visiting our website or contacting our customer service hotline. Once you've updated your Itinerary Receipt, you can proceed with online check-in. Please make sure to print or save your boarding pass as usual. If you have any issues with online check-in, you can try contacting our customer service hotline for assistance.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: Ano kaya ang gagawin ko kung gusto kong mag-cancel ng flight na may schedule change ng 1 hour?
resolution: If your flight had a schedule change of at least one hour, you may be able to cancel your flight for a refund. Please check our Manage Booking page to see if your flight qualifies. If it does, you can try canceling your flight online. If you're unable to cancel online, please reach out to our customer service team for assistance. They'll be happy to guide you through the process.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I DIDNT ADD MY GO REWARDS NUMBER!!! CAN I STILL EARN POINTS!!!
resolution:
You cannot earn Go Rewards points if you did not add your Go Rewards number at the time of booking. However, you can still add it via Manage Booking, but this must be done before the flight has been flown. To do this, simply log in to your Manage Booking and follow the prompts to add your Go Rewards number. Please note that points will be credited seven (7) days after you board your flight. If you have any issues with this, please contact the Go Rewards Customer Care Team at [insert contact details].

Next step: Check your Manage Booking and add your Go Rewards number if you haven't already.
source_article: How to Earn and Redeem Go Rewards Points

customer_query: i have a service dog and i want to know what are the documents required for travel
resolution: For a service dog, you need to present a document confirming that the dog has been trained. Additionally, you need to have a complete and up-to-date vaccination card of the dog. Please have these documents ready when you check-in or travel. You can also ask our customer service for more information or to confirm the requirements.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I recently lost a family member. Can I still get a refund for my flight?
resolution: I'm so sorry to hear about your loss. According to our policy, if an immediate family member of yours or another passenger in the booking has recently died, you might be eligible for a refund. Please approach us at the airport counters for assistance, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. They can assess your case and provide guidance on the next steps. Additionally, please ensure you have the necessary documentation to support your request. Next step: Please provide a death certificate or other relevant documentation to support your request for a refund. Resolution time: 8 minutes

customer_query: I'm a bit confused about the refund process. Can you clarify what types of government taxes are refundable?
resolution: Regarding government taxes, you're eligible to receive a refund for the Terminal Fee and taxes from the following countries: South Korea and China. These taxes are refundable for unused flights. Please approach us at the airport counters for assistance, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. They can provide more information and assist you in claiming your refund. Additionally, if you have the CEB Flexi add-on, you can cancel your booking and convert it to a Travel Fund, which may also cover other taxes. Next step: Please review our refund policy and terms to ensure you understand the process. Resolution time: 4 minutes

customer_query: HELP!!! Flight is TOMORROW and they notified me that it's CANCELED!!! What do I do now?
resolution:
We understand your concern. To manage your disrupted flight, follow these steps:
1. Check the real-time status of your flight through our Flight Status page to confirm the cancellation.
2. You will be given a link to our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) to assist you with your options.
3. You can access the SSDP by going to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website.
4. From the SSDP, you can choose to rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond this period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: Is it true that rebooking my flight will cost me an additional BND 50 or PHP 250?
resolution: According to our travel guide, yes, there will be a rebooking fee of BND 50 or PHP 250 for changing your flight schedule. However, we understand that unforeseen circumstances may arise, and we are committed to helping you find a solution. Please contact our customer service team at +632 8702 0888 to discuss your options and any potential fees associated with rebooking.

customer_query: I'm disputing the name change fee. I was told I needed to pay Php 500 for a name correction, but I didn't see that in the FAQ. Is it really required?
resolution: We apologize for the confusion. According to our policy, if you need to change your name after 24 hours, you'll need to provide proof of the name correction. If you're unable to do this online, you'll need to contact our Live Agent via chat or phone, which might incur a fee for their assistance. However, we do not charge a separate fee for name corrections. The fee you were quoted was likely for the Live Agent's assistance. We'll be happy to clarify any further questions you may have.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: Kami po ay mga bagong maglalakbay, pwede ba mag-rebook kung hindi kami kumpleto sa requirements?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight if you're not complete with the requirements. According to our website, 'You may encounter instances where the app or website's language changes based on your current location.' To change the language to English, please access our website through https://www.cebupacificair.com/en-PH/. You can then proceed with the rebooking process. Please note that rebooking fees may apply, depending on the time of rebooking and fare difference. For more information on our rebooking policies, please check our website or contact our support team via our in-app chat or website.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: How many bags can I check-in for my Cebu-Incheon-Cebu flight?
resolution: According to our baggage policy, you can check one (1) piece of luggage weighing up to 32kg for free. Excess baggage will incur an additional fee of PHP 2,500 per kilogram. Please note that you can pre-pay for excess baggage before your flight by contacting our support team at +63 917 725 5711. Resolution time: 4 minutes. Please confirm you've checked your baggage allowance details before your flight.

customer_query: Is it true that I can only manage my booking up to 2 hours before my flight? That seems unfair. I paid a lot for my ticket.
resolution:
• Yes, it's mentioned in the Manage Booking guidelines that you can only make changes up to 2 hours before your flight.
• This is to ensure that we can process any changes and updates accurately.
• However, we recommend making changes as early as possible to avoid any issues.
• If you have questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Next step: Is there anything else we can assist you with?

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I NEED TO CHANGE THE DESTINATION!!!
resolution: Unfortunately, according to Cebu Pacific's policy, you cannot change the destinations of your flight. However, you can rebook your flight for free as long as it's within 2 hours of your original flight time. If you need to change the destination, you'll need to purchase a new ticket. You can still cancel your original flight and get a refund if you have the GO Flexi Fare Bundle or CEB Flexi Add-on. Please go to the Manage Booking page to make the necessary changes.

customer_query: paano ko makakatanggi ng pasahero sa flight ko kung kasi cancelled na
resolution: According to our policy, you can request a refund of your fare according to your form of payment. However, Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. To request a refund, please access our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) via the link provided by our frontline team or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung may change sa schedule?
resolution: ['If your flight schedule has changed by over 1 hour, you can rebook your flight using your Travel Fund.', 'To do this, go to your MyCebuPacific account and sign in.', "Find your booking and click 'Rebooking' to proceed with the updated travel plans.", 'Note that rebooking change fees may apply, and these fees are not covered by CEB Flexi.']

customer_query: flight 6177 TOMORROW help!!! what am i supposed to do now?
resolution: You are advised to check your email for a notification regarding the flight change. Please log in to your Cebu Pacific account to view the updated flight schedule and any corresponding instructions. If you have not received the notification or have concerns, contact Cebu Pacific's Customer Service at +632 8702-0888 or via email at cebpacific.airops@cebupacificair.com. Resolution time: 5 minutes.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) Masbate, Siargao Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung meron akong power bank na di daw pwede dalhin?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight if you have a power bank that's not allowed in the cabin. However, please note that rebooking fees may apply (PHP 1,200 for online changes and PHP 2,000 for changes made at the airport). You can find more information about our baggage and handling guidelines in this article: <link to article>. To rebook your flight, please contact our 24/7 hotline at (+632) 705 8888 or visit our website to proceed with the online rebooking process.
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: Flight is TOMORROW HELP!!! I booked through Expedia and now I want to link it to my Cebu Pacific account?
resolution: You can link your Expedia booking to your Cebu Pacific account within 24 hours before your flight. To do this, log in to your Cebu Pacific account, go to 'My Bookings', and click on 'Link Existing Booking'. You'll need to provide your flight details and booking reference number. This service is free of charge. For assistance, you can call our hotline at (02) 7020-8888 or email us at [email address]. Can I get more information on how to access my booking reference number?
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: We are a corporation and we want to book a flight for our employees. However, we are not eligible to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account. Is there an alternative solution?
resolution:
I understand that you are a corporation and have unique booking needs. Unfortunately, Cebu Pacific's policy does not allow travel agencies, corporations, and government agencies to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account.

However, you can contact our Corporate Sales team to discuss alternative solutions for your corporate bookings. Please call our office at +632 70-20-888 or email us at [corporate.sales@cebupacificair.com](mailto:corporate.sales@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Please let me know your corporate contact information and I'll be happy to connect you with our Corporate Sales team.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: Hi, I'm going to Boracay for the first time and I'm not sure how the CEB Transfers work. Can you explain it to me?
resolution:
CEB Transfers is a convenient add-on that allows you to get transportation from the airport to your accredited hotel and vice versa in Boracay. To be eligible for CEB Transfers, your destination must be Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. You can purchase CEB Transfers when you book your flight, or up to 24 hours before your flight via Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. A MyCebuPacific account is required to purchase CEB Transfers. Please note that CEB Transfers is only available for flights to Boracay, and you will need to provide your hotel information to complete the service.

Next step: Please verify that your destination is Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo, and that you have a MyCebuPacific account to purchase CEB Transfers.

customer_query: I NEED TO CHANGE MY FLIGHT TOMORROW!!! CAN I DO IT WITHOUT EXTRA FEE?!?!?!?!
resolution: Unfortunately, as per our fare rules, voluntary rebooking is allowed but subject to change fees and fare differences. In your case, since you want to rebook for tomorrow, you will be charged a rebooking fee. The amount of the fee depends on the fare difference between your original and new flights. Please check our website for more information on change fees. You can contact our customer service team at +63917 829-2922 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to assist you with the rebooking process. Please note that you need to confirm the new flight schedule and fare within 24 hours.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-pa-extend ng voucher namin kasi gusto naming mag-asikaso ng iba pang bagay?
resolution: Unfortunately, Travel Vouchers cannot be converted to Travel Fund or in the form of a refund. However, you can use the voucher to book another flight within the validity period. Please log in to your MyCebuPacific account to access your Travel Voucher and check the flight types it can be used for. You can also check the email you used to book the flight for any updates. Next step: please review the voucher's validity period and available flight options to book a new flight.

customer_query: WHAT IF I DONT HAVE A FIRST NAME FOR MY ACCOUNT!!! HOW DO I CREATE A CEBU PACIFIC ACCOUNT!!!
resolution:
To sign up for a MyCebuPacific account, simply visit the website and click on the 'Create an account' button.
* If you don't have a first name, tick the 'I have no first name' box and fill in the remaining fields.
* You will need to provide your name, email address, and a password.
* You can also use your Google, Facebook or Apple accounts to quickly sign in.

Please expect to spend around 5 minutes creating your account.
Next step: Try creating your account again with the correct information.
Follow-up question: If you have any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: ano ang mga pasilidad sa Hanoi airport?!?
resolution: Ang Noi Bai International Airport ay isang silent airport, kaya't walang madaming pahayag sa loob ng airport. Mga pasilidad sa airport ay kinabibilang ang mga flight information display screens (FIDS) na matatagpuan sa buong airport para sa mga detalye ng iyong paglalayag. Para sa karagdagang detalye, tumawag sa aming hotline sa 02-851-6333. Next step: Tumawag sa hotline namin para sa mga detalye ng mga pasilidad sa airport.

customer_query: I tried to purchase CEB Transfers via the Cebu Pacific app, but it said I need to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account. Why do I need to create an account?
resolution: According to the article, a MyCebuPacific account is required to buy or add CEB Transfers. This is likely because a MyCebuPacific account allows you to manage your bookings and services more easily. To create a MyCebuPacific account, please visit the Cebu Pacific website and follow the sign-up instructions. For assistance with account creation or booking, please contact Cebu Pacific through their website or call their customer service hotline.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight para sa october 15? kung magkano ang bayad?
resolution: According to our flight schedule, we operate 10x weekly flights on the Manila-Da Nang-Manila route. Since you are looking to rebook a flight for October 15, please note that the flight schedules may be different due to seasonal demand. Please contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 or check our website to determine the availability and fare of flights on October 15. You may be required to pay a rebooking fee of Php 1,500, subject to availability and fare difference.
source_article: Da Nang Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: HOW DO I KNOW IF I CAN BRING MY SERVICE ANIMAL ON BOARD TOMORROW'S FLIGHT!!!
resolution: To ensure a smooth travel experience, please refer to our article on Service and Emotional Support Animals. You can check if your dog qualifies as a service animal by reviewing the guidelines provided. A trained service dog is allowed on board for passengers with reduced mobility. If you haven't already, please declare your service dog during booking or via Manage Booking to avoid any last-minute issues. We recommend arriving at the airport with all necessary documents and vaccination records ready for inspection. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to our support team.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: ano ung mga kailangang dokumento para sa emotional support dog?
resolution: Nagpapatawag tayo ng ating suporta sa pag-uusap sa inyo tungkol sa ating pagpapatawag. Upang makapaglakad ng iyong emotional support dog, kinakailangan mong magbigay ng dokumento mula sa iyong doktor na may letterhead na sumusuporta sa kailangan ng iyong emotional support animal. Pwede ka ring tawagan sa +63 998 888 1234 o mag-email sa [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) para sa mga detalye. Kami ay nangunguna ng suporta sa iyo.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I see that I can use my Google account to sign in to my MyCebuPacific account. Is this secure?
resolution: Yes, our website uses OAuth 2.0, a secure authorization protocol, to connect your Google account to your MyCebuPacific account. This means that your Google account credentials will not be shared with us, and you will only be asked to sign in with your Google account when you need to access your MyCebuPacific account. If you have any concerns, please contact our Customer Support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or through our website's contact page.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko kasi nagbago ng itinakdang biyahe ko
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight within 24 hours from booking without any fees. However, if you rebook after 24 hours, a rebooking fee of PHP 1,500 per passenger will be charged. Please contact our customer service to rebook your flight. Make sure to provide your booking reference and flight details to avoid any delay in the rebooking process. We'll assist you in rebooking your flight at no additional cost if you do it within the 24-hour period. Is your flight still tomorrow?

customer_query: My checked bag is LOST AND I FLY TOMORROW HELP!!! what do I do!!!
resolution: If your checked baggage is not found within 7 days of your arrival, we will consider your baggage lost. We will compensate you with the value of the lost baggage, along with the delay compensation mentioned above. You will receive Php2,000 for every 24 hours of delay, and if your checked baggage is not delivered within 24 hours, the applicable baggage fees will be refunded. Please report the lost baggage immediately to any Cebu Pacific ground staff, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. You can also contact the airport's Lost & Found office directly.

customer_query: I am disputing the Cebu Pacific policy of charging a rebooking fee, as I believe it is unfair and too expensive. Please help me resolve this issue.
resolution:
We understand your concern regarding the rebooking fee. According to our policy, rebooking fees may range from PHP 500 to PHP 2000, depending on the fare.
* We want to assure you that our fees are in line with industry standards.
* However, we can offer you alternative options such as purchasing a travel voucher or transferring your booking to a different date.

Please expect to spend around 10 minutes discussing your options with our support team.
Next step: Let us know if you would like to discuss further or if you have any other questions.
Follow-up question: If you have any other concerns, please feel free to let us know.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: Pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko kung gusto ko mag-pick up ng wheelchair assistance sa airport? Ano ang magiging bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight up to 2 hours before departure. However, you need to declare your wheelchair request at least 2 hours before your flight departure. The wheelchair assistance is free of charge. But if you book a new flight, you may be charged for any applicable fare difference. Pwede ka namang mag-rebook sa website or app namin. Para sa mas maigting na asistensya, puwede ka ring umaksiyon sa ating hotline o email.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I'm a bit concerned about the noise level at the airport. Is it really true that the airport operates as a silent airport?
resolution: Yes, that's correct. Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport is designed to be a silent airport to reduce noise pollution and create a peaceful environment for travelers. Public announcements are minimal, and passengers are encouraged to rely on flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on flight status, boarding gates, and other important information. You can also refer to the airport's website or contact their customer support for more information. Resolution time: 5 minutes

customer_query: I booked a round-trip flight but I'm not sure which fare bundle I selected. Can you please help me find out?
resolution: To check which fare bundle you selected, please log in to your Cebu Pacific account and view your booking details. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service team at [phone number] or [email address] and provide your booking reference number. We can look up your booking and let you know which fare bundle was chosen. If you need to change your fare bundle, please keep in mind that this can only be done at the time of booking, and you won't be able to switch bundles later.

customer_query: I am having trouble understanding the baggage allowance policy. Could you please explain what is considered a carry-on bag?
resolution: Our baggage allowance policy states that passengers are allowed one checked bag and one carry-on bag. A carry-on bag is any bag that fits in the overhead bin or under the seat in front of you. It should not exceed 7 kg and 56 x 36 x 23 cm in size. Please note that there may be additional fees for checked bags or oversized items. You can find more information on our baggage allowance policy on our website. Next step: Would you like to add baggage to your booking or make any changes to your existing baggage allowance?
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: Hi, first time flying with Cebu Pacific. What are the options if I miss my flight?
resolution:
Welcome to Cebu Pacific! If you miss your flight, we offer the following options for you:
1. Rebooking - You can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule.
2. Refund - You can request a refund of your fare according to your form of payment. Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately.
To learn more about these options, please check our Passenger Rights & Airline Policies article.
If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I JUST BOOKED MY FLIGHT FOR TOMORROW AND I REALIZE I WANT TO CHANGE MY SEAT!!! WONT I BE CHARGED IF I WANT TO CHOOSE MY SEAT NOW?!?!
resolution: Unfortunately, due to the GO Basic fare bundle you selected, you will be charged a fee for seat selection as per the fare rules. You can try booking a seat at the airport for a fee of PHP 150. However, please note that seat availability is not guaranteed. If you want to upgrade to a higher fare bundle with seat selection included, you can contact our Customer Service at least 24 hours before your flight for assistance. You can reach us at [email address] or [phone number].

customer_query: i dont understand about airport facilities at bangkok airport. what is silent airport?
resolution:
• A silent airport means there are minimal public announcements to reduce noise pollution and create a more peaceful environment for travelers.
• You can rely on the flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on flight status, boarding gates, and other important information.

To prepare, please familiarize yourself with the airport layout and the FIDS system before your flight.
Next step: Visit the Cebu Pacific website for more information about Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport.

customer_query: i just booked a flight but i dont know how to check in online. help!
resolution:
Online check-in is available for most Cebu Pacific flights. To check-in online, please follow these steps: 
1. Go to our website at [www.cebupacificair.com](http://www.cebupacificair.com) and click on the 'Check-in' tab.
2. Enter your booking reference number and last name.
3. Select your preferred seat and print or email your boarding pass.
If you're having trouble checking in online, please try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser. If the issue persists, please contact our Customer Service team through [support.cebuair.com](http://support.cebuair.com) or call us at 1-800-CEBU-PACIFIC. What type of device are you using to try and check in online?

customer_query: I was under the impression that I could check-in online for free. However, there is a fee for online check-in. Can you please clarify?
resolution: Our online check-in policy states that online check-in is available for free, but there may be additional fees for printing your boarding pass. However, if you have already checked-in online, you can proceed to the airport and print your boarding pass without any additional fees. If you print your boarding pass at the airport, there may be a terminal fee of ₱150. Next step: Have you checked-in online already, or would you like to do so?
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: hello po, pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko?
resolution: Oo, pwede kang mag-rebook ng flight mo. Mayroong rebooking fee na ₱1,500, depende sa route at type ng ticket. You can rebook your flight online or through our customer service hotline at +632 7020 888. We also have rebooking fees for changes made within 24 hours of booking, so please check the full rebooking policy on our website. Next step: Please provide us your booking reference number so we can assist you with the rebooking process.
