customer_query: I just paid for the Philippine Travel Tax and I realized I don't need to pay for it
resolution: According to the Dubai Airport and Travel Guide, OFWs returning to Dubai are not required to pay for the Philippine Travel Tax. We can assist you in the refund process. Please visit this article to learn more about Cebu Pacific Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax. If you would like to request a refund, please call us at +632 7020 888 or log in to our website. We will require your booking reference number or your complete name for further assistance. Resolution Time: 7 minutes

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung gusto kong magpasok ng anak ko sa existing flight ko?
resolution: Oo, pwedeng mag-rebook kung gusto mo magpasok ng anak mo sa existing flight mo. Isa lang sa ilang mga bagay na dapat mong maalala: kailangan ng anak mo ay babalik-loob na 2 taon o kaya'y mas bata sa oras ng biyahe. Pwede na rin kang mag-rebook sa aming website o sa aming app, o kaya'y i-contact ang aming customer support team para sa tulong.

customer_query: Hi, I'm first-time flyer and I'm not sure about baggage allowance. Can you please tell me what I can bring on board?
resolution: For our domestic flights, you can bring one hand carry bag and one check-in baggage for free. The maximum weight for check-in baggage is 20 kilograms. For international flights, your baggage allowance may vary depending on the route and fare type. Please check our baggage allowance policy on our website for more information. If you're still unsure, you can also contact our customer service via phone or email.

customer_query: I paid for a seat near the exit and lavatory but it seems that I didn't get one. I was told that priority boarding is only available for Premium seats, except for Macau, China, and Dubai. I think this is unfair.
resolution: I'm sorry to hear that you felt that way. However, our policy clearly states that priority boarding is only available for Premium seats, except for Macau, China, and Dubai. If you purchased a Standard Plus seat, it does not come with priority boarding. I understand your concern, but the policy is in place to ensure fairness for all passengers. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Next step: consider purchasing a Premium seat for future flights.

customer_query: ano ang mga steps sa pag online check-in?
resolution:
Here are the steps to check-in online:
1. Go to our online check-in page at least 48 hours before your flight.
2. Enter your booking reference number and last name.
3. Review and confirm your travel details.
4. Choose your seat and pay for any additional services if needed.
5. Download and print your boarding pass.
Please note that online check-in closes 1 hour before your domestic flight and 2 hours before your international flight.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I was wondering if there are any instances where the seat I previously selected may not be available when I rebook my flight?
resolution: Yes, when flight changes occur, there may be instances where the exact seat you previously selected may not be available. In this case, we will automatically assign you a seat in the same class. If you have any concerns or questions about seat selection, please visit our article on the CEB Seat Selector Add-on for more information.

customer_query: I HAVE A FLIGHT TOMORROW!!! I JUST REMEMBERED MY FRIEND'S BABY CAN COME WITH US!!! CAN WE ADD HER TO OUR BOOKING!!!
resolution: We can add an infant to your booking up to 2 hours before departure. To do this, head to Manage Booking, log in to your Cebu Pacific account, and follow the instructions. Please note that a small service fee will be charged to add an infant to your booking. You will need to have a valid credit or debit card to pay the fee. To connect with a Live Agent who can assist you, please use our app or website. Our Live Agent will guide you through the process. Can you please confirm your booking reference number so we can assist you further?
source_article: Adding an Infant to Your Booking
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: My immediate family member passed away, and I want to cancel my flight. Can I get a refund or convert it to Travel Fund?
resolution: I'm so sorry to hear about the loss of your family member. According to our policy, if a guest's immediate family member has died, you may be eligible for a refund or conversion to Travel Fund. Please contact our customer support team, and we will be happy to assist you with your request. You will need to provide documentation to support your claim, and we will review your eligibility for a refund or Travel Fund conversion.

customer_query: I'm worried about the entry requirements in Japan and I'm not sure if I need a visa. Can you help me?
resolution: According to our website, some nationalities may need a visa to enter Japan, while others may be eligible for a visa-free entry. As a general rule, Philippine passport holders are eligible for a visa-free entry for tourism and business purposes. However, please check the Japanese government's website for the latest visa requirements and requirements for your specific nationality. You can also contact the Japanese embassy or consulate in the Philippines for further assistance.

customer_query: I'm concerned about the distance from the Macau International Airport to the Cotai Strip. Is it a long walk?
resolution:
According to our travel guide, the Macau International Airport is located on Taipa Island, just 10-15 minutes from the Cotai Strip and downtown Macau. You may take a taxi or a bus from the airport to your destination. The journey is relatively short and convenient. Please note that the airport has a free shuttle bus service to the nearby city, but this service is subject to change. We recommend checking our website or contacting our customer service hotline at +63 2 70 70 700 for the most up-to-date information before your flight. 
Resolution Time: 6 minutes

customer_query: I strongly feel that the rebooking fee for my upcoming flight from Manila to Surigao is unreasonable. I'd like to request a waiver of the fee, given the circumstances.
resolution: We understand your concerns regarding the rebooking fee. However, our policy is to charge a rebooking fee for any changes to the flight itinerary. The fee is PHP 500 and is non-refundable. If you'd like to discuss the matter further or request a waiver, please contact our customer service department at [email protected] or call us at +632 855-8888. We will review your request and provide a decision within 3 business days.

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I JUST GOT MY TRAVEL VOUCHER NOW!!!
resolution: We're so sorry to hear that you're experiencing last-minute issues with your travel voucher. Unfortunately, our travel vouchers are non-rebookable and can only be used for future travel plans. However, you can still redeem your voucher by booking flights on our website or mobile app using the voucher code. Please note that travel vouchers are non-transferrable and have specific flight type restrictions (e.g., domestic one-way, international round-trip). To proceed, log in to your MyCebuPacific account and follow the redemption process. If you're still encountering issues, please contact our customer support team via phone at +632 7020 888 or email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next steps, please confirm if you've successfully redeemed your voucher.

customer_query: I am concerned about the tarmac delay policy. Can you confirm the maximum waiting time before we are entitled to compensation?
resolution: According to the article 'What to Expect During Tarmac Delays', Cebu Pacific will provide options such as food, water, and restrooms during tarmac delays. The Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights does not specify a maximum waiting time for compensation. However, you can check the article on 'Cebu Pacific Policies and Terms & Conditions' for more information on our policies. If you have any further concerns, please contact our customer service and we will be happy to assist you.

customer_query: ano po kaya ang gagawin ko kung may damage sa bag ko pwede ba mag-rebook?
resolution: If your checked baggage arrived with a cracked surface or missing handle and/or wheels, we will assess if the damage exceeds regular wear and tear. If so, we will provide compensation based on Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights or the Montreal Convention. Please report the damaged baggage to any Cebu Pacific ground staff, and our staff will assist you in filing a Property Irregularity Report (PIR). You can also chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help.

customer_query: I am writing to inquire about the baggage allowance for my upcoming flight from Manila to Surigao via Cebu. Could you please let me know how much baggage I can bring?
resolution: Our baggage policy allows for one (1) checked baggage and one (1) carry-on baggage per passenger. You can bring one (1) luggage with a maximum weight of 32 kg and maximum dimensions of 158 cm. Please note that excess baggage fees may apply for any baggage exceeding these limits. For more information on our baggage policy, please check our website or mobile app.

customer_query: Dear Cebu Pacific Team, I would like to inquire about the possibility of rebooking my flight for a later date. I was informed that there would be a fee for this service.
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us! We do charge a fee for rebooking flights outside of the 30-day window. The fee varies depending on the route and type of ticket. However, we do offer a refund of the rebooking fee if you choose to cancel your rebooked flight. For more information on our rebooking policies, please check our Passenger Rights & Airline Policies article. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: Hello, I'm not sure when I need to complete the eTravel form. Can someone please clarify the deadline?
resolution:
Registration must be completed within 72 hours (3 days) before your scheduled arrival or departure. This means you need to complete the eTravel form at least 3 days before your flight. If you're unsure about your travel plans, it's best to register as soon as possible to avoid delays.

Next step: Please check your flight itinerary and plan accordingly. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: I'm planning to travel to the Philippines and I want to know if I need to accomplish the PH eTravel and Customs Declaration before arrival.
resolution: Yes, according to the article, all passengers entering the Philippines need to accomplish the PH eTravel and Customs Declaration within 72 hours before arrival. You can do this by accessing the link provided in the article, which will direct you to the official website for the PH eTravel and Customs Declaration. Please make sure to complete this requirement before your arrival in the Philippines. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact our support team at support@cebupacificair.com. Next step: Complete the PH eTravel and Customs Declaration within 72 hours before arrival.

customer_query: can you explain the refund policy for disrupted flights? specifically, how long does it take to process?
resolution:
Our refund policy is designed to ensure that you receive the full amount of your fare back in accordance with your form of payment. For disrupted flights, you can request a refund via our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or by chatting with us via our app or website.

Refund processing typically takes 3-5 business days for e-vouchers and 7-10 business days for cash refunds. Please note that Refund Concerns may take longer to resolve.

To check the status of your refund, please log in to your account on our website or app and check your transaction history.

Next step: Please confirm your preferred method of refund and I'll be happy to assist you.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I have a flight from Manila to Surigao tomorrow and I just read that the direct flights are changing. I'm so worried I'll miss my flight!!!
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience this change may have caused. Your flight will now depart from Manila to Cebu, then Cebu to Surigao. Please check the flight schedule on our website or mobile app for the latest information. Your flight status is available 24/7 through our website or mobile app. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach us via our 24/7 contact center at +632 855-8888.

customer_query: Is it really necessary to buy seat selector for my children, and what happens if I don't buy one?
resolution: We highly recommend purchasing seat selector for your children to ensure that you are seated together. If you don't buy seat selector, you will be assigned a random seat at check-in, and there is a chance that you won't be seated together with your children. Please note that everyone with a ticket is guaranteed a seat on the aircraft, but we cannot guarantee that you will be seated together. You can purchase seat selector when booking your flight or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. If you have any concerns or need assistance, please contact our customer support team at +632 7020 888 or send us a message on the app.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! WHAT ARE THE ENTRY REQUIREMENTS FOR INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS AT MACTAN-CEBU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT?
resolution: Please check the article for Cebu Airport and Travel Guide at https://www.cebupacificair.com/articles/cebu-airport-and-travel-guide. For international flights, ensure you have a valid passport, visa (if required), and any necessary travel documents, such as a return ticket or onward travel arrangements. You may also want to check the Philippine Bureau of Immigration website for any recent updates on entry requirements. For Cebu Pacific flights, please contact our customer support team at least 24 hours before your flight to confirm your entry documents. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask.

customer_query: I am having trouble understanding the process of signing up for a MyCebuPacific account. Can someone explain it to me in simpler terms?
resolution:
To sign up for a MyCebuPacific account, you will need to provide some basic information.
* You will need to enter your name (or tick the 'I have no first name' box if you don't have one).
* You will need to enter your email address (this should be the same email address used in your previous bookings).
* You may also use your Google, Facebook or Apple accounts to quickly sign in.

Our MyCebuPacific account is free and easy to sign up for.
Please expect to spend around 5 minutes creating your account.
Next step: Try creating your account again with the correct information.
Follow-up question: If you have any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I believe the fee for rebooking a flight with checked baggage is unfair. I was charged 4,000 PHP to rebook my flight, while I was told that the fee was only 2,000 PHP. Can you explain this discrepancy?
resolution: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize for the confusion. After reviewing your case, we found that the 4,000 PHP fee was due to a fare difference, which is in addition to the rebooking fee of 2,000 PHP. We understand that this may be a surprise to you, and we would like to offer a refund of the additional 2,000 PHP. Please contact our customer service to discuss further.

customer_query: I am trying to book a flight for my family and I have an emotional support dog. Can we book a flight for the dog as well?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. Please note that only one (1) dog is allowed per flight. If you want to bring your emotional support dog with you, please inform us at the time of booking or through Manage Booking. You will be required to provide the necessary documents, including a letter from your doctor and an up-to-date vaccination card for the dog. If you have already booked your flight, please contact us at +63 998 888 1234 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to update your booking. We appreciate your understanding and look forward to assisting you.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I DON'T HAVE A FIRST NAME!!! HOW CAN I SIGN UP FOR A MYCEBU PACIFIC ACCOUNT!!!
resolution: To sign up for a MyCebuPacific account, please provide your name. If you don't have a first name, simply tick the 'I have no first name' box and fill in the remaining fields. If you still encounter any issues, please contact our support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or phone at 02 8585 8888. We can assist you in signing up for an account.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: Dear Sir/Madam, I have a question regarding the Paid Voucher. I understand that I need to review the AirSWIFT FAQs for details, but could you kindly clarify the process for using it?
resolution: Dear valued passenger, thank you for reaching out. According to our AirSWIFT FAQs, Paid Vouchers can be redeemed for a variety of services, including seat selection, baggage upgrades, and meal options. Please note that the voucher must be redeemed at least 2 hours before your scheduled flight time. For more detailed information, I recommend reviewing our Domestic Travel Guide. Would you like me to guide you through the redemption process?

customer_query: I'm new here, how do I talk to someone if I have a question about my flight?
resolution: You can chat with us on the Cebu Pacific mobile app or website. Simply tap on the Menu at the bottom right corner of the app, click on the Talk to Us section, and select Charlie. If you have any other questions, you can contact our call center hotlines. We have hotlines in Australia, Japan, Hong Kong, China, South Korea, and Taiwan. Please check the article for the contact numbers and timing. Charlie can also help you with your flight-related questions.

customer_query: I FLEW INTO NAIA T3 TOMORROW AND I CANT FIND THE SELF BAG DROP KIOSKS! WHY ARE THEY NOT THERE????
resolution: The Self Bag Drop Kiosks are located at Aisle A, between Gates 5 & 6. Please try to proceed to the security/immigration gates if you don't have any bags to check in. If you have bags to check in, you can use the kiosks at Aisle A. You can also refer to the airport signage or ask airport staff for assistance. Additionally, you may want to check-in online before arriving at the airport to avoid such issues in the future. Resolution time: 5 minutes.

customer_query: I understand that the CEB Transfers add-on is only available for flights to Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. However, I feel that this is unfair since other airlines offer transfers to other destinations. Can you explain your policy?
resolution:
We appreciate your feedback and understand your concerns. However, our policy is to offer the CEB Transfers add-on only for flights to Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. This is because we have partnered with local transportation providers to offer this service to our passengers.

If you would like to explore other options for transportation, you can contact us at XXX-XXX-XXXX to inquire about other available services. We will do our best to assist you in finding a suitable alternative.

Please note that our policy is in place to ensure that we can provide the best possible service to our passengers. We strive to be fair and transparent in all our policies and procedures.

customer_query: WHAT DO I DO IF I MISSED THE 1-HOUR CHECK-IN TIME FOR MY AUSTRALIA FLIGHT?
resolution: If you missed the 1-hour check-in time for your Australia flight, please head to the regular airport counters to check-in manually. For international flights, please arrive at the airport three hours before your flight schedule and be prepared to check-in and drop off your baggage at the designated counters. If you're connecting to or from other airlines, you'll need to go through the applicable immigration and arrival procedures before checking in with Cebu Pacific for your onward destination.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I JUST SAW PHILIPPINE TRAVEL TAX FEE!!! HOW DO I PAY IT???
resolution:
To pay the Philippine Travel Tax, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your Cebu Pacific Manage Booking page.
2. Click on 'Pay Now' under the Philippine Travel Tax section.
3. Select your payment method and proceed with the payment.
4. You will receive a payment confirmation email once the payment is successful.
Please note that the Philippine Travel Tax fee must be paid at least 4 hours before your flight departure.
You can contact our 24/7 Customer Service Hotline at +63 998 848 8555 if you have any concerns.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: I was told that my travel voucher cannot be used during peak travel periods. Can you please clarify what peak travel periods are?
resolution: Yes, we have specific peak travel periods where travel vouchers cannot be used. According to our policy, travel vouchers are not allowed during the following periods: October 29 to November 4, 2025; December 12 to January 6, 2026; March 25 to April 9, 2026; and October 28 to November 3, 2026. If you're planning to travel during these periods, please explore other payment options or consider booking flights outside of these dates. Can you please confirm if you're planning to travel during one of these peak periods?

customer_query: i booked my flight through an authorized OTA, pero wala akong makukuha na itinerary receipt. what should i do?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. Since you booked with an authorized OTA, you can try contacting them directly to request your itinerary receipt. If you're unable to obtain it from the OTA, you can reach out to our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or website. We can assist you in verifying your booking and providing you with your itinerary receipt. This usually takes around 10 minutes. Please note that authorized OTAs are required to provide you with a copy of your itinerary receipt, so it's best to contact them first to resolve the issue.

customer_query: I am a first-time flyer. Do I need to pay Philippine Travel Tax?
resolution:
As a first-time flyer, you are still required to pay the Philippine Travel Tax. The tax is PHP 162.00 for domestic flights and PHP 1,620.00 for international flights. You can pay the tax online or at the airport.
Please note that Philippine Travel Tax is a government-imposed fee and is mandatory for all passengers.
Next step: Please confirm your flight details and Philippine Travel Tax payment with us.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: I've booked a flight for my wife, but I realized I made a typo in her first name. Can I change it now?
resolution: You can update your guest's name by going to Manage Booking within 24 hours of booking. You can only update either the First or Last Name only, and you can only make this change once. If it's more than 24 hours since you made your booking, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can validate your request. Please prepare proof of the name correction, such as a marriage certificate. Resolution time: 8 minutes.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I would like to know the rules and fees for hand-carry allowance. Can you explain it to me?
resolution: According to our website, hand-carry allowance is included in all fare bundles. Each passenger is allowed one piece of hand-carry baggage, and the size limit is 39x39x39in. There are no additional fees for standard-sized hand-carry baggage. However, if you're bringing a larger or specialized item, you may need to purchase our CEB Special Baggage Add-on. Can you please tell me what type of item you're planning to bring so we can assist you further?
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I WANT TO REBOOK MY FLIGHT FOR TOMORROW BUT I CHOSE THE WRONG FARE BUNDLE !!! WILL I BE CHARGED EXTRA ??!!
resolution: **Rebooking with a different Fare Bundle is not allowed**. According to our Fare Bundle Guidelines, you can only select a fare bundle at the time of booking. If you want to rebook your flight, you will be subject to change fees and fare differences. Please contact our support team at https://www.cebupacificair.com/contact-us to know more about our rebooking policies and fees. We can help you find the best option for your situation. **What's your preferred flight schedule for the new booking?**

customer_query: IS CEB MEALS AVAILABLE FOR LONG-HAUL FLIGHTS?! WE'RE FLYING TOMORROW!!!
resolution: You can order up to four (4) meals per guest, per flight for long-haul flights. Meals are served 1h after take-off and 2h before landing. Please check your Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app to pre-order your meals before it's too late. If you have already missed the 24-hour mark, you can reach out to our live agents available 24/7 to inquire about possible solutions.

customer_query: I am trying to add my booking to my account but it says that it has already been added to another account. However, I am the only guest on the booking. What can I do?
resolution:
If you are the only guest on the booking but it says that it has already been added to another account, please contact our customer service team via our app or website. We can assist you in investigating the issue and resolving it.
In the meantime, please note that it is not possible to unlink a booking from your MyCebuPacific account.
Please be prepared to provide your booking reference number and any other necessary information to help us resolve the issue.
We will do our best to assist you as soon as possible.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! MY CREDIT CARD PAYMENT WAS REJECTED!!!
resolution: To resolve this urgent matter, please log in to your account and select 'My Bookings.' Find your booking and click 'View Details.' You can then select 'Pay Now' to settle the unpaid balance. You may also contact our 24/7 customer support at +63 2 8588 8653 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to assist you with the payment. If the rejected payment was due to a fee, please check our 'Policies & Guides' section for more information. The fee for an unsettled balance on flights exiting Dubai is approximately 1.4% of the booking value, up to a maximum of PHP 50. Please settle the balance before your flight departs. To avoid any last-minute issues, please settle the balance immediately.
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: It seems unfair that I'm being charged a fee at the airport counters if my booking still has an unsettled balance. Can you explain why this is the case?
resolution: I understand your concern, but the fee is mentioned in the article as a possible charge for guests on flights exiting Dubai. It's a standard policy for airports to charge a fee for unsettled balances. If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact our customer support at +632 7020 888. We'll be happy to assist you and provide more information on our policies.

customer_query: my flight is TOMORROW help!!! soekarno-hatta international airport what are the entry requirements!!!
resolution:
Here are the entry requirements for Soekarno-Hatta International Airport:
• Make sure you have a valid passport and any required visas
• Check if you need to apply for a visa on arrival (VOA) or a visa before your flight

You can check the Indonesia Immigration website for more information on entry requirements.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng ticket ko kung ang oras ng check-in ay napamahagi na?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your ticket if the online check-in time has already passed. However, please note that rebooking fees may apply. As per our website, rebooking fees for domestic flights start at PHP 1,800 (USD 35) and for international flights start at USD 50. You can rebook your ticket online or through our customer service hotline. Resolution time: 10 minutes.

customer_query: IS MY WIFE GOING TO SIT WITH ME ON THE FLIGHT TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: If you didn't buy Seat Selector, don't worry: you will be assigned a random seat at check-in. However, if you're traveling with multiple guests, there's a chance you won't be seated together. I suggest checking in online up to 2 hours before your flight to get an assigned seat. Please note that you can purchase Seat Selector up to 2 hours before your flight via Manage Booking. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight? anong mga bayad na kukunin?
resolution:
Yes, you can rebook your flight. However, you need to pay the rebooking fee of PHP 2,500 for domestic flights and PHP 5,000 for international flights. Additionally, you may be required to pay any difference in fare if the new flight has a higher price. To rebook, please contact our Customer Service Hotline at +63 998 848 8555 or visit our Manage Booking page.
Please note that rebooking is subject to seat availability and fare rules.
Next step: Please confirm your rebooking request with us by providing your booking reference number and preferred flight details.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: IS FEE FOR EXTRA LEGROOM WORTH IT!! WILL I REALLY GET PRIORITY BOARDING???!!
resolution: The fee for extra legroom varies depending on the seat class you choose. Premium seats cost more but come with priority boarding, except for Macau, China, and Dubai. If you're willing to pay for the convenience, prioritize booking your seat with extra legroom. To book, you can purchase it when you book a flight or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app. Make sure to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account first. Next step: review your flight options and calculate the cost of your preferred seat.

customer_query: I paid extra for priority boarding, but now I need to rebook my flight due to a schedule change. Will I still be entitled to priority boarding on my new flight?
resolution: Unfortunately, if you rebook your flight due to a schedule change, your priority boarding fee will not be refunded. However, according to the article on 'Cebu Pacific Policies and Terms & Conditions', you can check the fees and rules associated with rebooking. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our customer service and we will be happy to assist you. Additionally, please check your email for notifications related to the schedule change.

customer_query: I have a long-haul flight and would like to pre-order 3 meals. Can I do that?
resolution: Sorry, you can only pre-order up to 4 meals per guest for long-haul flights. Meals for long-haul flights are served 1h after take-off and 2h before landing. If you'd like to pre-order 3 meals, you can do so, but keep in mind that you won't be able to order the 4th meal. Next steps: Pre-order up to 4 meals for your long-haul flight, or contact our live agents for confirmation.

customer_query: Kumusta magagamit ang online check-in sa New Chitose Airport?
resolution: Unfortunately, online check-in for New Chitose Airport is not available. Since our flights arrive and depart from New Chitose Airport, we require passengers to proceed to the check-in counter for document verification. Please ensure to arrive at the airport at least 3 hours before your scheduled flight time. If you have any issues or concerns, please contact our customer service at +632 7020 888 or [email address].
source_article: Sapporo (New Chitose) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight, at magkano ang bayad ng rebooking fee?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight with Cebu Pacific if you contact us at least 24 hours before your scheduled flight. As stated in our travel guide, we operate flights on the Manila-Riyadh-Manila route four times weekly via Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) Terminal 3. Unfortunately, rebooking fees apply and vary depending on the type of ticket and travel dates. Our standard rebooking fee is PHP 2,500. If you have any questions about our rebooking policy or fees, please don't hesitate to ask. Next step: please provide your flight details and we'll be happy to assist you further.

customer_query: WHAT IF I BOOKED MY 9 YEAR OLD'S TICKET BUT NOW I CAN'T FIND THE PASSENGER HANDLING FORM ON THE WEBSITE!!!
resolution: You can access the Passenger Handling Form by logging in to your Cebu Pacific account. If you're unable to find it, please try clearing your browser cache and refreshing the page. The form must be completed at least 24 hours before your flight. Make sure to fill out the form accurately and truthfully. If you're still having trouble, you can contact our customer service team via our website or phone number at 700-888-0088. They'll be happy to assist you.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight pag may existing booking na
resolution:
Yes, you can rebook a flight with Cebu Pacific. According to the article, you can easily manage your bookings and add-ons, including rebooking a flight.
* You can rebook a flight online or by contacting our support team.
* Please note that there may be a fee for rebooking, and this will depend on the type of fare you have.

Rebooking fees may range from PHP 500 to PHP 2000, depending on the fare.
Please expect to spend around 10 minutes rebooking your flight.
Next step: Check our website for more information on rebooking fees and processes.
Follow-up question: If you have any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I disagree with the wheelchair assistance policy, why is it only available on certain destinations?
resolution: I understand your concern. Our wheelchair assistance policy is designed to provide safe and efficient service to passengers with mobility aids. Unfortunately, it is only available on certain destinations due to operational and logistical limitations. We're working to expand this service to more destinations, but in the meantime, we'll make sure to communicate clearly with our passengers about the options available. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team at 02 853 6700 or +63917 524 6868. We'll be happy to discuss this further with you.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I recently purchased the CEB Baggage upgrade and I need to know if the weight upgrade is available for purchase online or only at the airport?
resolution: The weight upgrade for your checked baggage is available for purchase through Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. You can select the 'Weight Upgrade' option when checking your baggage allowance details. Please note that upgrading the weight of your checked baggage does not change the number of pieces allowed. You can find the fees and charges for the weight upgrade through Manage Booking under the 'Upgrade Weight' section.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I am writing to request a refund for my cancelled flight. I would appreciate it if you could assist me with the refund process.
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your cancelled flight refund. To process your refund, please contact our call center hotlines. We will guide you through the necessary steps and inform you of the required documents. Please note that refunds are processed according to our refund policy, which states that refunds are made within 7-14 working days. You can reach us at + 612 9119 2956 (Australia) or + 852 397 33800 (Hong Kong) to initiate the refund process. We appreciate your patience and cooperation.

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I STILL HAVEN'T CHECKED IN!!!
resolution: You can check-in online at least 4 hours before your scheduled flight. Please go to cebupacificair.com and click on 'Manage Booking' to check-in. If you're unable to check-in online, you can proceed to the airport and check-in with our ground staff. Please note that a check-in fee of PHP 600 may apply if you check-in at the airport.

customer_query: Pangamba ako dahil sa bagong polisiya sa pagpapalaki ng laman sa checked baggage sa BKK at DMK. Bakit ba kailangang limitahan ang pagpapalaki ng laman sa airport lang?
resolution: Nakikiusap kami ng pasensya pero hindi ito posible ang baguhin sa ngayon. Ang polisiya sa pagpapalaki ng laman sa airport lang ay isinasaad sa ating web para sa mga flight na nagsisimula sa BKK at DMK lamang. Hinihiling naming na makiisa sa ating mga pinagkukunang mga polisiya at regulasyon para sa kagalingan ng lahat.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I'm not happy with the rebooking fee for my flight transfer. I think it's unfair to charge me PHP 500.
resolution: We understand your concern and apologize for any inconvenience. However, our rebooking policy is in place to ensure that we can accommodate changes in flight schedules while maintaining a fair and consistent approach. The rebooking fee of PHP 500 is a standard charge across all flights, including those transferred to Clark International Airport (CRK). If you have any further concerns or would like to discuss this further, please contact our customer service team. We'll be happy to assist you.
source_article: Transfer of San Jose Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: paano po ang pag rebook ng flight? pwede ba mag-rebook kahit ng mga tao sa flight?
resolution: Mabuti na lamang na mag-ingat sa pagpapalit ng flight upang di ka maabala. Pwede kang mag-rebook up to 2 oras bago ang oras ng byahe ng iyong flight, pero may mga katanungan sa pagbabayad ng bayad ng pagpapalit. Maaari kang mag-rebook ng iyong mukha lamang, pero hindi ka maaaring magpalit ng mga destinasyon o pagkaka-orden ng iyong mga biyahe. Maaari kang mag-rebook ng kahit saan, ngunit magbabayad ka ng mga bayarang muling pagpapalit. Maaari kang mag-kontak sa +63 2 720 2727 o i-email si customer.service@cebupacificair.com para sa tulong.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung may tarmac delay?
resolution: Hi! If you experience a tarmac delay, you can't cancel your flight and get a refund. However, if the delay reaches 3 hours and you're not allowed to deplane, Cebu Pacific may decide to return to the departure airport or land at a different airport to let passengers off safely. Rebooking will depend on the situation. If you're not satisfied with the outcome, please contact our customer service at +63 998 999 9999.
source_article: What to Expect During Tarmac Delays

customer_query: ano ba ang gagawin ko sa pag-check in pag may connecting flight?
resolution: Kapag may connecting flight, dapat mag-check in online muna para makakuha ka ng two (2) boarding passes. Kung hindi ka makapag-online check in, pwede ka mag-check in sa airport counters. Para sa pag-drop ng baggage, pwede kang gumamit ng self bag drop kiosks (para lang sa NAIA Terminal 3) o regular bag drop counters. Ang pag-drop ng baggage ay makukuha sa pag-check in ng initial flight.

customer_query: I received an email from Philippine eTravel System stating that my health declaration is incomplete. Can you please walk me through the process of completing it?
resolution:
To complete the health declaration, please follow these steps:

1. Log in to your eTravel account at eTravel.gov.ph.
2. Click on the 'Health Declaration' tab.
3. Fill out the health declaration form with the required information.
4. Submit the form and make sure to receive a confirmation email.

If you encounter any issues, please contact our customer service at +63 2 7794 8400 for assistance.

customer_query: I recently booked a flight to Riyadh with Cebu Pacific. I'd like to know if I can check-in online and what's the baggage policy.
resolution: Congratulations on booking your flight with us! According to our travel guide, Cebu Pacific operates flights on the Manila-Riyadh-Manila route four times weekly via Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) Terminal 3, and all flights will arrive at and depart from King Khalid International Airport (KKIA) Terminal 5. You can check-in online for your flight at least 24 hours before your scheduled departure. As for baggage policy, our standard baggage allowance is 20kg. You can check our website for more information on online check-in and baggage requirements. If you need assistance with online check-in, please contact our customer service team. Next step: please check-in online and we'll review the status of your flight with you.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! IT SAYS HERE I CAN REBOOK FOR FREE BUT I DON'T KNOW HOW!!!
resolution:
To rebook your flight for free, follow these steps:
1. Check your email or text message for a link to our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP).
2. Click on the link and log in to your account.
3. Select the 'Rebook' option and choose your new travel dates within the 30-day window.
4. If you need to rebook beyond 30 days, chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent.

Note: Be sure to check the refund and Travel Tax policies for any changes or implications.

Next step: Please confirm if you have already received the SSDP link via email or text.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: Is it true that bookings are non-refundable, non-reroutable, and non-transferrable?
resolution: Yes, bookings are generally non-refundable, non-reroutable, and non-transferrable, with the exception of regular/non-promo flights exiting South Korea. If you need to cancel or change your flight, please contact our 24/7 hotline at +632-8716-0700 or visit our website at <www.cebupacificair.com> to see if there are any available options. Please note that some taxes, such as the Philippine Travel Tax and the Passenger Service Charge, may be waived depending on your eligibility. For more information, please visit our article on Service Fees and the Philippine Travel Tax. Next step: contact our support hotline to explore available options.

customer_query: i was charged $50 for rebooking and i think it's unfair can you explain why?
resolution:
I apologize for any confusion. Our rebooking fee is only applicable when rebooking beyond the 30-day window. In your case, since you are rebooking within the 30-day window, the fee should not have been applied. However, please note that our system may have a delay in updating the fee. To resolve this, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help you with a refund or a fee waiver.

Note: You will need to provide proof of purchase and a copy of your travel documents to support your claim.

Next step: Please confirm your preferred method of resolution and I'll be happy to assist you.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I'm not sure why I'm being charged a rebooking fee. I thought it was just a normal process to change my flight dates?
resolution:
I understand your concern regarding the rebooking fee. According to our policy, rebooking fees vary depending on the type of rebooking and the flight chosen. For AirSWIFT flights, you need to email tot6treasury@cebupacificair.com for rebooking inquiries. For Cebu Pacific (5J) and Cebgo (DG) flights, you need to chat with our Live Agent via our app or website.

The rebooking fee for AirSWIFT flights is not indicated in our policy, but our Live Agent can assist you with the rebooking and provide more information on the fees. For Cebu Pacific (5J) and Cebgo (DG) flights, the rebooking fee is mentioned in our policy. The fee for rebooking a Cebu Pacific (5J) flight is PHP 550.00 while the cost for rebooking a Cebgo (DG) flight is also PHP 550.00.

Would you like me to connect you with our Live Agent to further discuss your rebooking options?

customer_query: I'm planning to travel to Bangkok with my companion. What are the baggage allowance rules for international flights?
resolution: For international flights, the baggage allowance for economy class passengers is 20kg, and for premium classes, it's 30kg. However, it's always best to check with the airline for the most up-to-date information on baggage allowances and fees. You can refer to our Baggage Policy article for more details. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask. Resolution time: 4 minutes

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko sa cebu pacific app?
resolution: Oo, pwede naman kayo mag-rebook ng flight sa Cebu Pacific app. Maaari nyo ring gumawa ito sa website natin. Sa rebooking, may mga kuwestiyon sa mga add-ons at fees na mag-aapekto sa inyong flight. Kailangan muna ninyong alamin ang mga additional charges para sa iyong rebooking. Kung may mga katanungan o kailangang tulong, maaari kayong makipag-ugnay sa aming 24/7 hotline sa +632 70-700-700 o sa email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I NEED HELP!!! I JUST SAW THE MANILA SAPPORO MANILA ROUTE IS FULL FOR TOMORROW!!! WHAT CAN I DO???!!!
resolution: We understand your concern, but flights to Sapporo may not be available for tomorrow due to high demand. We recommend checking our website or mobile app for the latest flight schedules and availability. If you're unable to find a suitable flight, you can contact our customer service at +632 7020 888 or [email address] for assistance. Please note that our customer service hotline is available 24/7.
source_article: Sapporo (New Chitose) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I JUST RECEIVED A FLIGHT SWAP OFFER BUT I'M NOT SURE IF IT'S GENUINE!!! HOW DO I KNOW IF IT'S AUTHORIZED BY CEBU PACIFIC???
resolution: To verify if the Flight Swap offer is authorized by Cebu Pacific, please check the sender's email address. It should be no-reply@swap.cebupacificair.com. Double-check the spelling carefully and make sure there are no extra numbers or characters in the email address. If you're still unsure, you can chat with us to connect with a Live Agent who can help confirm your Flight Swap offer. You can also try to verify through our official channels. Resolution time: 5 minutes.

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW HELP!!! I cannot find my boarding gate number on the flight information display screens. Can you assist me?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. As a silent airport, Da Nang International Airport operates with minimal public announcements to reduce noise pollution. You can check the flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on your flight status, boarding gates, and other important information. You can also contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 or visit our website to access your boarding pass and check your flight status. Please arrive at the airport at least 3 hours before your scheduled flight time to ensure a smooth check-in and boarding process. Next step: Please proceed to the airport and check the FIDS screens for your boarding gate number.
source_article: Da Nang Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm disputing the fee for rebooking my flight as I feel it's unfair to charge me an additional amount after I've already purchased CEB Flexi.
resolution: I understand your concern, and I'd be happy to help you explore options. However, according to our CEB Flexi policy, free cancellation does not cover rebooking change fees. These fees are applied as per our standard policy to cover the costs of making changes to your booking. If you'd like to discuss further, please let me know and we can explore possible alternatives. What would you like to do next?
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I'VE YET TO CHECK IN!!! PLEASE TELL ME IF I CAN STILL DO IT ONLINE!!!
resolution: You can still check-in online, but please note that our check-in deadline is 2 hours before your flight's scheduled departure time. According to our Iloilo Airport travel guide, you can find our check-in counters at the airport's ground floor. You can also check-in through our mobile app or website. If you're unable to check-in online, you can also check-in at the airport. Please arrive at least 2 hours before your flight's scheduled departure time to ensure you have enough time for check-in and baggage drop-off.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko na nag-cancel? kung oo, kailan pwede ko i-rebook?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight. You can do so through the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or by going to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. You can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. Since your flight was cancelled, you can rebook for the next day. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Please note that Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. What is your preferred flight schedule for rebooking?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight at magpa-schedule ng seat ko?
resolution: Maaari ka pang mag-rebook ng flight sa Cebu Pacific, pero kailangan mong i-check kung ano ang mga polisiya sa rebooking para sa iyong flight. Para sa Seat Selector, magkano ang bayad ay ayon sa klase ng seat na hiniling niyo. Maaari ka ring magpa-schedule ng seat sa Manage Booking sa loob ng 2 oras bago ang iyong flight.

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a change fee of PHP XXX to rebook my flight when it was Cebu Pacific's mistake that caused the schedule change. Can you waive the fee?
resolution: I understand your concern regarding the change fee, but according to our policies, the fare differences and change fees apply when making changes to your flight. However, we can consider waiving the fee on a case-by-case basis if it was indeed due to an error on our part. Please contact our customer service team at +63 2 720 2727 or email us at customer.service@cebupacificair.com to discuss your situation and any possible options. We appreciate your feedback and will do our best to assist you.

customer_query: I think the gate baggage fee is unfair because it varies by booking date. Can you explain this?
resolution: I understand your concern about the gate baggage fee. Unfortunately, the gate baggage fee varies by booking date and regulations due to changes in airport fees. This fee is also subject to change. If you would like to book a flight with a fixed baggage allowance, please pre-purchase your baggage allowance online at least 2 hours before your flight. To confirm the current gate baggage fee, please contact our customer service staff at the airport. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: Is it fair to charge extra for baggage when I'm already paying a premium for a seat upgrade?
resolution: We understand your concern, but please note that excess baggage fees are applicable to all passengers, regardless of seat upgrades. According to the guide, check-in bags must NOT exceed 39 inches on all sides, and extra charges will apply if exceeded. We recommend checking the airline's baggage policy and fee structure before your flight to avoid any inconvenience.

customer_query: Why do I have to pay a fee for rebooking my flight due to a baggage issue? I only asked for help because you were responsible for the problem.
resolution: We understand your concern, but the rebooking fees are in accordance with our airline's policies. However, please note that we will assist you in filing a Property Irregularity Report (PIR) if your baggage was damaged or delayed. Additionally, we will provide compensation based on Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights or the Montreal Convention. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us and we will be happy to help.

customer_query: sir/ma'am, how do I know if I need to fill up the digital arrival card? kasi baka kailangan ko ng border pass?
resolution: The TDAC is required for foreign guests, but exemptions include Thai nationals, transit or transfer passengers, and those using a Border Pass. If you're a foreign guest, you must complete the TDAC as per the new requirement starting May 1, 2025. If unsure about your eligibility, kindly check your passport and travel documents for clarification.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm a bit concerned about the lack of noise in KLIA. Is this a quiet hour policy?
resolution: No, we don't have a quiet hour policy. KLIA operates as a silent airport to reduce noise pollution and create a more peaceful environment for travelers. This means that there are minimal public announcements throughout the airport. However, you can still get updates on flight status, boarding gates, and other important information from the FIDS located throughout the airport.
source_article: Kuala Lumpur Aiport and Travel Guide

customer_query: Hi, I am having trouble accessing the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP). Can you please provide me with the correct link?
resolution: The Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) link can be found in the notification sent to you by Cebu Pacific frontline team, email, and/or text message. Additionally, you can access the SSDP by going to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. If you are having trouble accessing the SSDP, please try the following: 1. Clear your browser cache and cookies; 2. Check your internet connection; 3. Try accessing the SSDP through a different browser or device. If you continue to experience issues, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: Can I cancel my flight and get a full refund?
resolution: Unfortunately, our standard fare does not allow for cancellations with a full refund. However, if you have the GO Flexi Fare Bundle or the CEB Flexi Add-on, you can cancel your flight and receive a refund. If you don't have either of these bundles, you can try rebooking your flight via our Manage Booking page. Please note that if your flight was canceled by us, or had a schedule change of at least one hour, or you were denied entry by immigration, you can cancel and receive a refund. Additionally, if your flight originated from Incheon, South Korea and was booked with KRW currency, you may be eligible for a voluntary refund processing even without GO Flexi or CEB Flexi.

customer_query: I am writing to request a refund for my flight that was cancelled due to weather conditions. I would like to know if there are any specific documentation requirements for the refund. Additionally, I would like to inquire about the refund timeline.
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the cancellation of your flight. Please note that Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. To request a refund, please access our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) via the link provided by our frontline team or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. For additional documentation requirements, please refer to our Refund Concerns page. The refund timeline is typically within 14-28 days from the date of cancellation, but please allow up to 30 days for processing.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: I paid for government taxes for my flight but didn't fly. Can I get a refund for these taxes?
resolution: If you have unused government taxes, you may be eligible for a refund. We offer refunds for the following government taxes: Terminal Fee, and taxes from South Korea and China. Please contact us via our app or website to initiate the refund process. You will need to provide your booking reference number and other required documents. Resolution Time: 9 minutes

customer_query: Kailangan ko magtanong tungkol sa CEB Special Baggage para sa aking musical instrument. Pwede ba mag-increase ng excess baggage fee ng maximum weight ng 32kg?
resolution: Kumusta? Yes, sir/ma'am, you can increase the excess baggage fee to the maximum weight of 32kg. However, please note that each guest is only allowed one (1) of each kind of special baggage, and with a weight of 20kg each. If you need to pay an excess baggage fee, the rate is PHP 100 per kg. You can contact our customer service team to confirm the fee and procedures. We recommend checking our website for any updates on fees and procedures.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: HELP!!! I CHANGED TO TAGLOG BUT NOW IT'S BACK TO FILIPINO AGAIN!!!
resolution: To change the language, go to the 'Menu' tab and tap on 'Preferences'. Then, select 'Language' to change it to your preferred language. The app will display its content in the chosen language. If the language still hasn't changed, try tapping on 'Country' and select your preferred country from the list. If you're trying to change to English, please select 'Australia', 'Philippines', 'Singapore', or 'United Arab Emirates'. If you're still experiencing issues, please try restarting the app or reach out to our support team via the in-app chat for further assistance. We're here to help you with your concern.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a fee to modify my flight. Can you explain why we need to pay this fee?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we appreciate your feedback. The rebooking fee is a standard policy to cover changes made to flight bookings. You can review our fare rules on our website to find out more about the fees associated with changes. If you would like to discuss this further, please contact our customer support team, and we will be happy to assist you. We will do our best to provide a reasonable explanation.

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding the Incoming Passenger Card (IPC), can you please explain it to me?
resolution: We can certainly help you with that. The Incoming Passenger Card (IPC) is a declaration for health and character requirements for non-Australian citizens. It's usually provided onboard or at the terminal, and you'll need to complete it using a black or blue pen. The IPC includes personal and flight details, so please ensure you fill it out correctly. You can visit the Australian Department of Home Affairs website for more information on the IPC. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Can you please confirm your flight number and date of travel so we can provide more specific guidance?

customer_query: I understand that travel vouchers cannot be converted to Travel Funds, but I was charged a rebooking fee after trying to change my flight. Is this fair?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. According to our policy, our travel vouchers are non-rebookable and non-transferrable. However, we do charge a rebooking fee for bookings made using our travel vouchers. This fee is subject to our standard rebooking policies and is not a refundable amount. If you're disputing the rebooking fee, please contact our customer support team via phone at +632 7020 888 or email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). We'll be happy to assist you in resolving the issue. Please provide your booking reference number and flight details for further assistance.

customer_query: ano ang mga terminal na ginagamit ng cebu pacific?
resolution: Cebu Pacific operates mainly from Terminal 2 and Terminal 3 at Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) in Manila. Our flights depart from these terminals, and we recommend that you arrive at the correct terminal for your flight. If you are unsure about which terminal to arrive at, you can check your flight itinerary or contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-888 for assistance.

customer_query: Ano ang mga gamit sa brunei international airport?
resolution: The Brunei International Airport has a variety of facilities to make your travel experience comfortable. These include free Wi-Fi, food and beverage outlets, baggage handling services, and currency exchange. You may also find shops and restaurants at the airport. Additionally, the airport has a quiet prayer room for Muslim travelers. The airport is compact and efficient, with a calm atmosphere. Please note that the airport is just 10 to 15 minutes from downtown Bandar Seri Begawan. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service at [customer.service@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customer.service@cebupacificair.com) or call +63 2 976 1834.

customer_query: I'm concerned about the impact of this transfer on my baggage allowance. Can you provide more information on the baggage policy?
resolution: Our baggage allowance remains the same despite the airport transfer. You can still bring one (1) piece of hand baggage and one (1) piece of checked baggage. However, please note that the maximum weight limit for checked baggage is 32 kilograms. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. You can also check our baggage policy on our website at cebupacificair.com.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng tiket ko para sa anak ko na ummm 8 years old?
resolution: I'm happy to help you with this! Unfortunately, according to our policy, children below 7 years old are not allowed to board without an adult companion who is at least 18 years old. Since your child is 8 years old, you should be able to rebook their ticket without any issues. However, please note that there may be a fee associated with the change. You can contact our customer service team via our website or phone number at 700-888-0088 to inquire about the rebooking fee and to assist you with the process.

customer_query: ano po ang pwede kong gawin para makapunta ng terminal 2 ng shanghai pudong airport??
resolution: Para sa inyo, ang aming flight mula Manila ay nasa Shanghai Pudong International Airport Terminal 2. Kung nakakaalam ka na ng ibang tatanungin ka tungkol sa terminal, maaari kang mag-ask ng tulong sa aming customer service hotline (0922 143 2626) o email sa [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: HELP!!! My flight to Chiang Mai IS TOMORROW and I just saw that Cebu Pacific suspended flights between Manila and Chiang Mai! What do I do????
resolution: We understand your concern. Please check the article titled 'Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Manila and Chiang Mai' for more information. Unfortunately, due to this suspension, your flight has been canceled. You can request a full refund by contacting our Customer Support Hotline at +63 02 8588 8500 between 8am to 9pm daily. Please note that our team will also be happy to assist you with rebooking your flight once flights resume. For this, you can expect to pay the applicable rebooking fee, which is PHP 2,000. We will keep you updated on any further changes. Please allow our team 5 minutes to assist you.
source_article: Chiang Mai Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I disagree with the Go Rewards Terms and Conditions. It doesn't seem fair that my points can't be converted to cash.
resolution: We understand your concern, but Go Rewards points have no monetary value and are not convertible to cash. According to our Terms and Conditions, points can only be used to pay for transactions with participating partners and merchants. If you have any further questions or concerns regarding our policies, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Service team or the Go Rewards Customer Care Team.
source_article: How to Earn and Redeem Go Rewards Points

customer_query: How do I add CEB Special Baggage to my booking if I'm using the Cebu Pacific app?
resolution: To add CEB Special Baggage to your booking, please follow these steps: 1) Log in to the Cebu Pacific app using your MyCebuPacific account, 2) Go to the 'Manage Booking' section, 3) Select the flight and passenger you want to add the special baggage to, 4) Click on 'Add Special Baggage' and select the type of special baggage you need, 5) Pay for the special baggage fee. You can expect to have the special baggage added to your booking within 5 minutes.

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding the airport layout. Could you please explain how the two terminals are organized?
resolution: According to the article, Mactan-Cebu International Airport has two terminals: Terminal 1 for domestic flights and Terminal 2 for international flights. The airport is designed to be a silent airport, meaning there are minimal public announcements to reduce noise pollution and create a peaceful environment for travelers. If you have any further questions or concerns about the airport layout, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko at magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Oo, pwede kang mag-rebook ng flight mo. Ang bayad ay depende sa pagbabago ng fare at change fee. Ang change fee ay P1,000, at ang fare difference ay iba-iba base sa hinahain ng ticket mo. Kung gusto kang makahingi ng mas detalyadong impormasyon, maganda itong tumawag sa ating hotline o magpadala ng message sa amin sa social media.

customer_query: I'm new to booking flights with Cebu Pacific. How do I book a Seat Sale fare?
resolution:
• First, head to the Seat Sale page to see which routes are on sale.• Click the “Book Now” button on your desired destination and travel period.• Select a flight that has the “Seat Sale” or “Promo Fare” label.• Be sure to take note of the traveling period and make sure to select the flights that have the “Seat Sale” label.

Next step: Please review the steps above and try booking a Seat Sale fare on our website. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team.

customer_query: I'd like to know more about the baggage allowance on Cebu Pacific flights to Macau
resolution:
For our flights to Macau, we have a free baggage allowance of 7kg for carry-on baggage and 10kg for check-in baggage. Any excess baggage is charged at PHP 150 per kilogram. Please note that the baggage allowance is subject to change, and we recommend checking our website for the most up-to-date information before your flight. You may also contact our customer service hotline at +63 2 70 70 700 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) for assistance. 
Resolution Time: 3 minutes

customer_query: I'm a first-time flyer and I didn't know that separate invoices for each passenger are not available. Can I still get an invoice for my flight?
resolution:
I'd be happy to help you with that. Separate invoices for each passenger are not available, as our system only issues one invoice per booking. However, you can still obtain your invoice by checking your email for the invoice, which is sent together with your Itinerary Receipt. If you haven't received it, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you.

They will help you issue an invoice, and you can receive it via email within 5 minutes. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with?

customer_query: Flight is tomorrow and I am unable to sign in to my MyCebuPacific account!!! PLEASE HELP ME REBOOK MY FLIGHT!!!
resolution:

Rebooking fees may range from PHP 500 to PHP 2000, depending on the fare.

Follow-up question: If you have any other issues, please feel free to let us know.

customer_query: I'm new to flying and I don't understand how online travel agency bookings work. Can you explain it to me?
resolution: Welcome to flying! When you book a flight through an online travel agency, we'll send you a unique booking reference number that you can use to check-in online or at the airport. You can check-in online 4 hours prior to your flight's scheduled departure time. If you're having trouble checking-in, you can try contacting our customer support at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or via our 24/7 hotline at 700-7020. We're here to help!
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: paano ko makakapag-add ng baggage sa booking ko? kasi akala ko may free baggage allowance na sa fare ko kaso wala pa rin?
resolution: Ang checked baggage allowance ay kasama sa GO Easy at GO Flexi fare bundles lamang. Kung GO Basic ang iyong fare, pwede pa rin ka mag-apply ng CEB Baggage sa iyong booking. Please check your booking details and follow the steps to add baggage. You can find the fees and charges for adding baggage through Manage Booking under the 'Add Baggage' section.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW HELP!!! online checkin window hours!!! what if i forget to check in?
resolution: For online check-in, you have a window of 48 hours before your flight for domestic and international flights. If you forget to check in, you can still do so within 1 hour before your flight for domestic and 2 hours before your flight for international flights. Make sure to check in on time to avoid long lines at the airport and to skip the baggage drop queue.

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW HELP!!! CEB Special Baggage only allows 1 special baggage per guest, but I have 2 surfboards! What do I do?
resolution: You can only add one (1) of each kind of special baggage. You can contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or via the website (https://www.cebupacificair.com) to add a surfboard to your booking. Please note that surfboards are considered special baggage and have a maximum weight of 20kg each. If you have multiple surfboards, you may need to purchase separate special baggage allowances. You can expect a response from our support team within 5 minutes.

customer_query: I will be traveling with a child and I want to know if it's possible to request a seat together. I heard that it's not guaranteed, but can I request it anyway?
resolution: Yes, you can definitely request a seat together when you book your flight. However, we cannot guarantee that you will be seated together, especially if you're traveling with multiple guests. I would recommend booking your seats in advance to increase the chances of sitting together. If you did not purchase Seat Selector, you may not be seated together at check-in. Make sure to also sign up for a MyCebuPacific account to manage your bookings. Next step: review your flight options and book your seat with a seat together.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I MADE A TYPING MISTAKE IN MY NAME!!! CAN I CHANGE IT NOW!!!
resolution: To change your name, please go to Manage Booking within the next 5 minutes. According to our policy, you can only update either your first or last name once within 24 hours of booking completion. Since it's a typing mistake, you can replace special characters like ñ or é with the regular letter instead. For example, ñ becomes n and é becomes e. Please proceed to enter the corrected name in the 'First Name' field. If you have any issues, you can get in touch with our Live Agent via our app or website.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I think the rebooking fee is unfair since I'm only changing my flight by a few days. Can you help me?
resolution:
• We understand your concern, but our change fee policy is in place to ensure that we can maintain our schedules and operations.• The base fare does not include government taxes, airport terminal fees, other surcharges, and optional add-ons such as baggage and meals.• If you want to rebook, please call our hotline at 703-9999 or visit our website to make the necessary changes.• Please note that there may be a rebooking fee applicable to your new flight.

Next step: Please review our change fee policy and FAQs, and if you still have concerns, please call our hotline to speak with a customer support representative.

customer_query: kumusta po kung pwede ba maglagay ng malalaking appliance sa loob ng checked baggage namin?
resolution:
• Check under 'Appliances, Electronics, and Gadgets' in the article 'Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?'

• We recommend packing smaller appliances or checking with our customer service to verify specific item policies.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! I need to know if I can register for Philippine eTravel System at the airport!!!
resolution:
You can register for Philippine eTravel System at the airport, but it's highly recommended to do it in advance to avoid delays. You can access the system through eTravel.gov.ph or the eGovPH app. Registration must be completed within 72 hours (3 days) before your scheduled arrival or departure. Please note that you may experience longer lines at the airport if you register at the last minute.

Next step: Please try to register on eTravel.gov.ph or the eGovPH app before arriving at the airport. If you're unable to register, please contact our customer service at +63 2 7794 8400 for assistance.

customer_query: HELP!!! my flight is TOMORROW and I just realized I need to cancel it!!! can I still cancel with CEB Flexi???
resolution: You can cancel your flight for free with CEB Flexi up to two (2) hours before departure. To do this, please log into your MyCebuPacific account and follow our how-to guide on voluntarily canceling your flight and converting it to Travel Fund. Remember, this will appear in your account within 24 hours. Please confirm if you have already booked with MyCebuPacific and if you are able to cancel before your departure time. If so, kindly proceed with the cancellation and wait for the Travel Fund to be credited to your account.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! i got notified about a disruption but can't rebook! why?!
resolution: We understand your urgency, and we're here to help. According to our policy, you can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. Since your flight is tomorrow, you can rebook within the next 30 days without any additional fees. Please go to our Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or use the 'Manage Booking' option on the Cebu Pacific app or website to rebook your flight. If you need assistance, you can chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Next step: Try rebooking your flight using our SSDP or mobile app.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng seat at kailan pwede gawin?
resolution: Oo, pwede ninyong mag-rebook ng seat sa Manage Booking sa Cebu Pacific app, pero kailangan ninyong mag-sign up muna para sa MyCebuPacific account. Ang seat selector available via Manage Booking ay up to 2 hours bago ang flight ninyo. Pwede ninyong i-rebook ang seat ninyo within this timeframe. Next step: mag-sign up para sa MyCebuPacific account at mag-rebook ng seat.

customer_query: I'LL MISS MY CONNECTION!!! I CHECKED-IN ONLINE BUT MY BOARDING PASS SAID I HAVE TO PRINT IT AT THE AIRPORT!!! WHAT DO I DO?!?
resolution: Your boarding pass should be available for download in our Cebu Pacific app. Please check your email for the link to download your digital boarding pass. Please have your booking reference number ready.

However, if you need to change your flight, please contact Cebu Pacific's customer service for assistance. Please note that rebooking fees may apply, and you'll need to check the fee structure with the airline.

customer_query: i'm having trouble using online checkin for my jakarta flight. is it available for cebu pacific?
resolution:
Online check-in is available for Cebu Pacific flights, including flights to Jakarta.
Here are the steps to follow:

2. Select the flight you want to check in for.
3. Fill out the required information and print your boarding pass.
If you're having trouble, please ensure your flight is eligible for online check-in and that you're checking in within the allowed timeframe.
