customer_query: I'm having trouble finding the flight information display screens (FIDS) at Sydney Airport. Can you please guide me?
resolution: The flight information display screens (FIDS) can be found throughout the airport, including at the gates and in the departure lounge. You can also check for flight information on our app or website. Please note that Sydney Airport operates as a silent airport, so we don't make announcements. Instead, we rely on visual displays to keep you informed.

customer_query: I believe it's unfair that I have to pay a fee to rebook my flight just because it's a domestic one-way ticket. Can you help me with my concern?
resolution: I understand your concern, and I'd be happy to help. However, according to our policy, Travel Vouchers are non-rebookable and non-transferable. The rebooking fee is PHP 200, which is non-refundable. Please note that Travel Vouchers are assigned to a specific flight type and cannot be changed to another origin/destination. If you'd like to discuss this further, please contact our customer service team via email at [support email]. Next step: please reply to this email with your concerns and we'll be happy to assist you.

customer_query: I am writing to express my concern about the travel tax payment and declaration process. I find it unfair that I need to pay for travel tax when I am only taking a domestic flight.
resolution:
The Philippine government requires all passengers, including domestic travelers, to pay for travel tax. This is a government-imposed fee, and it cannot be waived or exempted. However, you can check with the airline for any discounts or promotions that may be available.

Next step: Please check with our customer service at +63 2 7794 8400 to see if there are any available discounts or promotions that can help offset the travel tax fee.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! IS THERE A LATE CHECK-IN FEE?!?! WE FORGOT TO PAY FOR OUR BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE!!!
resolution: Our late check-in fee starts from PHP 600.00 for domestic flights and PHP 800.00 for international flights. You may check-in at the airport but be aware that you'll have to pay the fee. For your baggage allowance, please refer to our baggage policy. Each checked baggage has a limit of 32 kg, and each carry-on baggage should not exceed 7 kg. If you'd like to add or upgrade your baggage allowance, you can do so during online check-in or at the airport. Please contact our customer service at [customer.service@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customer.service@cebupacificair.com) or call +63 2 976 1834 for further assistance.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I BOOKED UNDER SEAT SALE PROMOTION BUT WHY DO I STILL SEE ADDITIONAL FEE FOR BAGGAGE ON MY BOARDING PASS!!!
resolution: Our system automatically adds baggage fees for bags exceeding the free baggage allowance during check-in. According to our seat sale terms (Seat Sales and Promo Fares), free baggage allowance is 7kg for domestic flights and 20kg for international flights. Since you booked a flight during a seat sale promotion, the baggage fees are not waived. You can pay the additional baggage fee online or at the airport. Please visit our website or contact our customer service to pay the fee and check-in for your flight. We'll see you at the airport!

customer_query: How can I pay for someone else's flight using my credit card?
resolution: You can book a flight for someone else and pay using your credit/debit card, Go Rewards, e-Wallet, or Travel Fund. When booking, make sure to put in the other person's contact details so they can receive updates about their flight. If you're using e-Wallet, please note that GrabPay, GCash, and Maya only accept payments in Philippine Peso (PHP).

customer_query: I'm surprised that I was charged a fee for rebooking my flight, even though I cancelled my CEB Meal order. Isn't that unfair?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our policy states that all changes to bookings, including cancellations of pre-ordered meals, incur a fee. This fee helps us to cover the costs of processing changes to your booking. If you have any further questions or disputes about our policies, please contact our customer care team at +639063245632 or +63323059990. We'll be happy to discuss your concerns and provide further assistance.

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW BUT OTA DIDNT GIVE ME THE 6 DIGIT BOOKING REFERENCE NUMBER!!! I NEED IT TO CHECK-IN!!!
resolution: To resolve this issue, please contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or website. You can reach us at +63286603333 or send an email to support@cebupacificair.com. We will assist you in verifying your booking and obtaining your 6-digit booking reference number. This process usually takes around 5 minutes. Once you have your reference number, you can proceed to online check-in. Please note that it's best to book directly with Cebu Pacific to avoid any issues like this in the future.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CEB TRANSFERS ADD-ON NOT SHOWN WHEN BOOKING
resolution:
Sorry to hear that you're experiencing this issue. To resolve this, please check if your destination is eligible for the CEB Transfers add-on. This is only available if your destination is Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. If you're booking for a different destination, it won't be shown.

To ensure availability, try booking the CEB Transfers add-on via the Manage Booking section on the Cebu Pacific app. This can be done up to 24 hours before your flight. You will need a MyCebuPacific account to purchase or add CEB Transfers.

customer_query: I JUST BOUGHT TICKETS FOR TOMORROW AND I HEARD CEBU PACIFIC FLIGHTS GOT CANCELED!!! WHAT DO I DO NOW???
resolution: If your flight is canceled, you will receive notifications through email, text message, or airport announcements. You can also check the Cebu Pacific website or social media for updates. To manage your disrupted flight, visit the articles on 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight' and 'Cebu Pacific Policies and Terms & Conditions' to know your options and the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. We will provide options based on the bill, such as rebooking or refund. Please check your email or contact our customer service for more details.

customer_query: I am a frequent flyer and I find the policy of restricting power banks in the cabin to be quite inconvenient. Can you please provide a valid reason for this policy?
resolution: We appreciate your understanding and loyalty to Cebu Pacific. Our policy on power bank restrictions is in place to ensure the safety and compliance of our flights with international regulations. According to the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO), lithium batteries can pose a fire risk if not handled properly. To mitigate this risk, we've implemented a policy to restrict power banks in the cabin to a maximum size of 30,000mAh. If you have any further concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our 24/7 customer service team.
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: ano yung bagagge limit natin for AirSWIFT flight?
resolution: Hi, for AirSWIFT flights, the standard baggage allowance is 7kg for hand carry and 25kg for checked baggage. Please check the AirSWIFT FAQs for more information. customer_query: I'm having difficulty changing the language on the app, and I'm worried that my flight is TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: Don't worry, we're here to help you. To change the language on the app, go to the 'Menu' tab and tap on 'Preferences'. Then, select 'Language' to change it to your preferred language. The app will display its content in the chosen language. If the language still hasn't changed, try tapping on 'Country' and select your preferred country from the list. If you're trying to change to English, please select 'Australia', 'Philippines', 'Singapore', or 'United Arab Emirates'. If you're still experiencing issues, please try restarting the app or reach out to our support team via the in-app chat for further assistance. We're here to help you get your language changed ASAP so you can prepare for your flight tomorrow.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: How early should I arrive at the airport for my international flight?
resolution: For international flights, please arrive at the airport three hours before your flight schedule. This will give you ample time to check in, go through immigration, and proceed to the gate. You can check our article on the Cebu Pacific International Travel Guide for more information on arrival procedures. Next steps: Please plan to arrive at the airport three hours before your flight schedule and contact us if you have any further questions.

customer_query: I just booked with Cebu Pacific and I'm not sure what CEB Flexi is... Can I add it now?

If you're interested in canceling your flight and converting it to a Travel Fund, you can do so up to two hours before departure. customer_query: HELP!!! i HAVE FLIGHT SCHEDULED TOMORROW AND I JUST HEARD ABOUT DIGITAL ARRIVAL CARD REQUIREMENT!!! DO I NEED TO SUBMIT IT BEFORE I ARRIVE?
resolution: We understand your concern! To clarify, you need to submit the Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC) before arriving in Thailand, starting May 1, 2025. This is a mandatory requirement for all foreign guests. Please submit the TDAC online or by scanning the QR code as soon as possible. It's free and only takes a few minutes. You'll need to provide personal and passport information, flight and accommodation details, and a health declaration. You can carry a digital or printed copy of your TDAC confirmation for reference upon arrival. Please submit your TDAC at least 24 hours before your flight to avoid any last-minute issues. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask!
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners

customer_query: I would like to know more about the Travel Fund. How can I use it to pay for my future travel plans?
resolution: The Travel Fund is a non-expiring virtual wallet that you can use to pay for your future trips. You can use it to pay for the value of your canceled flight, which will appear in your account within 24 hours of conversion. Once you have a Travel Fund, you can use it to pay for future travel plans by applying its value to your booking.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I PAID FOR THE PH TRAVEL TAX BUT IT WASN'T REFUNDED!!! PLEASE HELP!!!

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! HOW DO I ADD BAGGAGE ONLINE?!?!?!
resolution:
• Go to cebupacificair.com/MB and select 'Manage Booking'.
• Log in with your My Cebu Pacific account.
• Find your booking reference number and make sure you're logged in with the last name or email address registered in the booking.
• Click on the 'Add Baggage' option and select the type of baggage you need to add. A fee will be applied (PHP 150 for the first 20kg).
• You can also do this on the Cebu Pacific app.
• Please note that you can only manage your booking up to 2 hours before your flight.

Next step: Please confirm if you have any issues adding baggage online.

customer_query: HELP!!!! i left my phone on the plane and im flying to boracay tomorrow!!! what do i do???
resolution: If you left something inside the aircraft, you need to contact us via the Cebu Pacific app or website to connect with a live agent who can assist you. Please have your flight details ready and be prepared to provide a detailed description of the item. The live agent will guide you through the process. You can also check our website for more information on lost and found items. We'll do our best to help you reunite with your phone as soon as possible. Please allow 5 minutes for us to get back to you.

customer_query: HELP!!! I booked a GO BASIC ticket and I need to bring a lot of clothes for my vacation in Boracay, how can I add more baggage!!!
resolution: You can add CEB Baggage to your booking. Please go to Manage Booking and select the 'Add Baggage' option. You can add one piece of checked baggage weighing up to 20kg for every 20kg of prepaid baggage allowance. The fee for this is available through Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. Note that adding baggage may incur additional fees and charges. You can find the fees and charges through Manage Booking under the 'Add Baggage' section.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I BOOKED MY FLIGHT VIA AGODA BUT THE APP WON'T RECOGNIZE MY REFERENCE NUMBER!!! HELP ME!!!
resolution: If you booked via third-party sites like Agoda, there may be instances where the app or website doesn't recognize your booking reference number. You should contact the travel agency or third-party site where your booking was originally created. If all else fails, you can chat with our Live Agent via the app or website. We're happy to help. Please have your booking reference number ready for easy assistance.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: how do i know if i need to pay for my amount due?
resolution: You can check if you have an outstanding balance by logging in to your Manage Booking account. If you do have an outstanding balance, you can pay that when you check in. Please pay via Manage Booking before checking in to avoid any issues. If you're unsure about your balance or payment, you can contact our customer service at <phone number> for assistance. Please note that you must check in at least 1 hour before your domestic flight or 2 hours before your international flight.

customer_query: I just booked a flight and realized I need to add my child. I read on the website that I need to have an adult with me to book a child online. Can I just talk to someone about adding my child to the booking?
resolution: I understand your concern. Unfortunately, our system does not allow booking a child (aged 2-6 years) online without an accompanying adult. However, you can chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help you book a flight. The Live Agent can assist you in adding your child to the booking. Please note that a small service fee may apply. Can you please let us know when you would like to add your child to the booking?
source_article: Adding an Infant to Your Booking
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: WHY CANT I ORDER MEAL FOR DOMESTIC FLIGHT TOMORROW??!!! HELP!!!
resolution: You can pre-order meals for domestic flights, but only up to 24 hours in advance. Please try booking your meal as soon as possible. If you need assistance, you can chat with our live agents 24/7. Next steps: Book a meal for your domestic flight immediately, or contact our live agents for further assistance.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CAN I STILL REBOOK WITHOUT PAYING ADMIN FEE??!!
resolution: Rebooking a flight with Cebu Pacific may incur an Admin Fee, which can be waived in cases of flight disruptions. If your flight has been disrupted, you can visit our online disruptions article to learn more about the Travel Fund. For your rebooking, please contact Customer Care via email at [customer.care@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customer.care@cebupacificair.com) or phone at 02 7020 888 or 855 8888. Please provide your booking reference number and flight details. We will assess your eligibility for the Admin Fee waiver. Next step: Please allow 5 minutes for us to review your case, then we will respond with the outcome. If approved, your Admin Fee will be waived upon rebooking.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! HOW MUCH IS THE PHILIPPINE TRAVEL TAX?!?!
resolution: The Philippine Travel Tax is ₱1,620, which is already included in the total fare on our website. It is non-refundable and non-transferrable. To check your total fare, please visit our website and log in to your Cebu Pacific account. You can also contact our customer service hotline at +632 7020 888 or email us at <support@cebupacificair.com> for further assistance. Next step: Please review your total fare and confirm if you need any further assistance.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ang flight ko papunta sa shanghai? kung oo, magkano ang bayad para sa rebooking?
resolution: Oo, maaari kang mag-rebook ang flight mo papunta sa Shanghai. Ang rebooking fee ay PHP 1,000, at ang oras ng rebooking ay 24 hours bago ang oras ng check-in. Para sa higit pang impormasyon, maaari kang humingi ng tulong sa aming customer service hotline (0922 143 2626) o sa email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung hindi ko alam kung paano gamitin yung Cebu Pacific app?
resolution:
Yes, you can rebook your flight using the Cebu Pacific app. Here's how:

1. Tap on 'Rebook' on the app's menu.
2. Select the new travel dates and passenger information.
3. Review and confirm the changes.

If you're having trouble using the app, please refer to the language and country settings guide in the app's help section. You can also visit our website at https://www.cebupacificair.com/en-PH/ and click on the language selector at the top right of the page to change the language to English.

Our team is here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng infant? magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can add an infant to your booking. However, please note that this is limited to Infant on Lap only, which means the child will not occupy a seat. A small service fee will be charged to add an infant to your booking. The service fee is waived if you contact our customer service team at least 24 hours before departure. If you want to add the infant now, you will need to pay the service fee. The fee is 100 PHP per infant. Can you please let us know when you would like to add the infant to your booking?
source_article: Adding an Infant to Your Booking
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: HELP!!! FEE FOR CHANGE OF FLIGHT IS TOO HIGH!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: You mentioned the fee for changing a flight is too high. According to our website, the rebooking fee is PHP 1,200. However, if you're flying tomorrow, you may want to consider contacting our call center hotlines for assistance. You can reach us at + 612 9119 2956 (Australia) or + 852 397 33800 (Hong Kong). They may be able to help you find a better option or waive the fee due to the urgency of your situation. Please provide your booking reference and flight details so we can assess your case. Once we receive this information, we can guide you through the process and provide an update on your request within 5 minutes.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight gamit ang voucher ko?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight using your travel voucher. However, it's essential to note that the voucher is assigned to a specific passenger name and flight type, which cannot be changed. You can use your voucher to book a new flight on our website or mobile app, following the redemption process. Please log in to your MyCebuPacific account and ensure the name on the voucher matches the passenger's name. If you're unsure about rebooking procedures, please contact our customer support team via phone at +632 7020 888 or email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Can you please confirm your voucher type and desired flight details?

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! power bank size limit!!!
resolution: We understand you're worried about the power bank size limit for your flight tomorrow. To ensure a smooth journey, please note that the maximum power bank size allowed on our flights is 30,000mAh. You can find more information about baggage and handling guidelines in this article: <link to article>. If your power bank exceeds this limit, you may be required to check it in, which may incur an additional fee of PHP 500. Please contact our 24/7 hotline at (+632) 705 8888 to confirm the status of your power bank.
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: I wish to make some changes to my flight but I'm not sure how to switch my bundle to a different one. Can I please get some assistance?
resolution: Unfortunately, you cannot switch your fare bundle to a different one once you've selected it at the time of booking. You can consider adding or upgrading your baggage allowance or other add-ons like CEB Meals and CEB Sports Equipment after selecting your fare bundle. For assistance, you can contact our Customer Service team at least 24 hours before your flight. Please reach out to us at [email address] or [phone number].

customer_query: Is it possible to pay for additional baggage allowance at the airport and if so, how much does it cost?
resolution: According to our airport travel guide, yes, you can pay for additional baggage allowance at the airport. However, please take note that the excess baggage fee is PHP 2,000 for the first 5kg and PHP 400 for each additional 1kg. You can pay for the excess baggage fee at the baggage drop-off counter. Please ensure that your additional baggage meets the airline's requirements and is properly labeled. Would you like to proceed with paying the excess baggage fee?

customer_query: HELP!!! MY WHEELCHAIR'S TIRE IS FLAT AND I HAVE A FLIGHT TOMORROW, WHAT CAN I DO???
resolution: To request wheelchair assistance, please declare it no later than four hours before your flight. You can also bring your own wheelchair/mobility aid on the flight, free of charge. Our ground staff will collect it for you before entering the aircraft. Once you arrive at the airport, inform staff about your request. We have a dedicated lane for PWDs/PRMs and Senior Citizens. The wheelchair will be stored in the aircraft for proper safekeeping and made ready for you during deplaning. If you have a flat wheelchair tire, please contact Cebu Pacific's customer service at least 24 hours before your flight to arrange for assistance. Contact us at 02 853 6700 or +63917 524 6868 for further assistance.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I'm planning to travel from Manila to Chiang Mai and I'm concerned about the baggage allowance. Can I bring a check-in luggage to my flight?
resolution: As per our baggage policy, all passengers are entitled to a checked baggage allowance of 10 kg, subject to a handling fee of PHP 500 per 5 kg excess. You can bring a check-in luggage to your flight, but please ensure that its weight complies with our baggage allowance. Please note that oversized or special items may incur additional fees. We recommend checking our website for the most up-to-date baggage policy information. If you have any specific questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
source_article: Chiang Mai Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: Magkano ang bayad kung hindi ko nakita ang pag-atake ko sa pagbisita sa KLIA?
resolution: We charge a missed flight visit fee of RM100 for passengers who fail to meet their scheduled flight. According to our airport travel guide, KLIA operates as a silent airport, and passengers are encouraged to rely on the FIDS for updates on flight status. However, if you have concerns about your flight schedule, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service team, and we'll be happy to assist you. Please note that this fee is non-refundable and must be paid immediately upon presentation of your flight itinerary.
source_article: Kuala Lumpur Aiport and Travel Guide

customer_query: hello! where can i check my flight status?
resolution: You can check your flight status by chatting with Charlie, our chatbot, available 24/7. To do this, simply visit our website and click on the Charlie icon at the bottom right corner. Alternatively, you can download our mobile app and tap on the Menu at the bottom right corner. Under the 'Talk to Us' section, select Charlie to check your flight status. If you have any issues, please don't hesitate to contact our call center hotlines for assistance. We're here to help. Please note that Charlie can also answer your questions and help you follow up on a refund, request a Travel Certificate, and more.

customer_query: i booked my flight 3 months ago but i just found out that i can pay on travel fund. how much will i be charged for the conversion and when can i pay?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. However, please note that Travel Fund is a payment option during booking, not a conversion process for past bookings. If you have any issues with your previous booking, kindly contact our customer support team at +632 70-700-700 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to discuss possible solutions. As for the additional fees, we charge a 1% processing fee for payments made using credit/debit cards. However, we do not charge any fees for payments made using Travel Fund during booking.

customer_query: ano ang terminal number ng Davao International Airport?
resolution: The Davao International Airport is located in Davao, and its terminal number is DVO. According to our airport list, it is one of our domestic destinations. You can check our website for more information on the airport terminal guide. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service at 02-777-5939 for assistance.
source_article: Cebu Pacific Destinations, Airports, and Terminal Numbers

customer_query: I'm writing to inquire about the compensation for my delayed flight. As a passenger, I believe I'm entitled to a higher amount
resolution: Dear passenger, we understand your concern. According to our airline policies, we follow the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights, which provides compensation for delayed flights. However, please note that our compensation is based on the flight distance and delay duration. As per our policy, we provide a minimum of PHP 4,000 for flights within 4 hours of delay. If you believe you're entitled to more compensation, please provide your flight details and we'll review your case. Next step: please provide your flight details and we'll get back to you within 3 working days.

customer_query: What if I'm a first-timer and I want to know how to ORDER MEALS?
resolution: You can pre-order a meal by booking your flight or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app up to 24 hours before your flight. You need to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account to buy or add CEB Meals. You can order up to two meals per guest per flight for domestic and short-haul flights, or up to four meals per guest per flight for long-haul flights.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook yung flight ko sa pagbubukas ng airport?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight for a fee of PHP 500, which is non-refundable. However, please note that this fee is applicable only for rebookings made before the original travel date. Since your flight is transferring to Clark International Airport, please ensure that you rebook your flight as soon as possible to avoid any inconvenience. You can rebook your flight online or by calling our hotline at 02 855-8888.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: WHY DID MY ITINERARY RECEIPT SAY I NEED TO PAY ADDITIONAL CHARGES FOR MY FLIGHT!!! IS THIS A TRAP!!!
resolution: Our Itinerary Receipt may indicate additional charges due to taxes, fees, or add-ons. Please refer to your booking confirmation email or check our website for the breakdown of fees. You can contact our customer support for clarification. Contact us at support@cebupacificair.com or call us at (+632) 8702-0888 with your booking reference number ready. We'll be happy to assist you.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook? kung nagpa-late ako ng 1 hour bago kumuha ng flight ko?
resolution: Oo, pwede kang mag-rebook. Kahit na nagpa-late ka ng 1 hour, pwede kang mag-rebook sa Manage Booking up to 2 hours bago ang flight mo. Subalit kailangan mong magbayad ng fare differences at change fees. Kapag nasa flight mo at nagsisisi ka ng pagpapalate, maaari kang gumawa ng mga pagbabagong ito sa pagpapadala ng mensahe sa aming customer support sa 1-800-CEBU-PACIFIC.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: I booked a flight to Sydney but i need to cancel it and rebook for a different date. how much will i be charged?
resolution: According to our rebooking policy, the fee starts at PHP 1,500 (plus any applicable fare difference). However, please note that our Sydney destination has specific wheelchair assistance requirements, and we need to ensure that arrangements are in place for your rebooked flight. We'll require at least 2 hours' notice for rebooking, so please contact us as soon as possible to discuss your options.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I would like to add a booking to my MyCebuPacific account but the system is saying that it's a Group Booking / Travel Agency booking. Is this correct?
resolution: Yes, that's correct. If your booking is a Group Booking or Travel Agency booking, it cannot be added to your MyCebuPacific account. Please contact the travel agency or group organizer to see if they can assist you in adding the booking to your account. You can also try chatting with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Resolution time: 8 minutes
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding how to use my Go Rewards points. Can you explain it to me?
resolution: To use your Go Rewards points, log in to your Cebu Pacific account and go to the My Bookings page. Click on the ticket you want to rebook or purchase add-ons with your points. Select the points you want to use from your Go Rewards wallet. You can learn more about how to earn and redeem Go Rewards points on our website. If you need further assistance, contact our customer support at support@cebupacificair.com or call us at (+632) 8702-0888 with your booking reference number ready.

customer_query: i'm a senior citizen. how do i request assistance when i arrive at the airport?
resolution: When you arrive at the airport, please inform our staff about your assistance request. We have a dedicated lane for senior citizens and persons with disabilities. Simply proceed to the designated area and our staff will assist you with the check-in process. For wheelchair assistance, please request it at least 2 hours before your flight through Manage Booking or our customer service hotline.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: MAGKANO ANG BAYAD KUNG HUWAG KO MAG-CHECK-IN ONLINE?!!!
resolution: You are required to pay a Php 200 fee for online check-in if you do not check-in online at least 4 hours prior to your scheduled flight. Please note that this fee is non-refundable and non-transferable. If you have already checked-in online, you will not be charged this fee. Please check our website for more information on online check-in and fees. You can also contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 for assistance. Next step: Please re-check your flight status and online check-in status to determine if you have already checked-in online.
source_article: Da Nang Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko na nasa 2 hours lang bago ang flight? kung oo, magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can still rebook your flight up to 2 hours before your scheduled departure time. According to our policy, fare differences and change fees apply when rebooking. The exact amount of the change fee depends on your booking and route. For a breakdown of the fees, please check your Booking Summary when rebooking. You can make changes to your booking via the Manage Booking page on our website.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng special baggage nung flight ko ay napalit?
resolution: Kumusta? Unfortunately, our special baggage policies are non-rebookable. However, if you need to make changes to your booking, you can try to contact our customer service team to see if we can accommodate your request. Please note that each guest is only allowed one (1) of each kind of special baggage, and with a weight of 20kg each. If you need to pay an excess baggage fee, please be aware that baggage can be increased to a maximum weight of 32kg.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: magkano ang bayad kung mag-rerebook ng flight gamit ang travel voucher?
resolution: To rebook your flight using a Travel Voucher, you'll need to pay a rebooking fee of PHP 200. Please note that this fee is non-refundable. You can log in to your MyCebuPacific account to access your Travel Voucher and proceed with the rebooking process. Make sure to check the email you used to book the flight for any updates. If you're experiencing issues, check out our troubleshooting steps. Next step: please review the rebooking fee and proceed with the rebooking process to confirm the new flight details.

customer_query: I booked a Seat Sale flight but I'm not sure if I'm really getting the discount since I still have to pay for other add-ons like baggage and meals. Can you clarify?
resolution:
• Yes, you are receiving the discount as advertised on our Seat Sale page.• The base fare shown on your booking does not include government taxes, airport terminal fees, other surcharges, and optional add-ons such as baggage and meals.• You can review our add-ons and services here: Cebu Pacific's Add-ons & Services.• Please note that these additional fees are not part of the Seat Sale discount.

Next step: Please review our add-ons and services page to understand the additional fees associated with your booking.

customer_query: I'd like to update my nationality and passport details, but I've already checked in. Is that possible?
resolution: Unfortunately, you can only update your nationality and passport details up to 2 hours before your flight. Since you've already checked in, you'll need to approach the airport counters for assistance. Please note that for nationality/passport details, you can only update this once. Next step: Please proceed to the airport counters for further assistance.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay for name correction even if it's just a small mistake. Can I get a refund for the fee?
resolution: Unfortunately, name correction fees are non-refundable and non-transferable. You can review our Fare Bundle Guidelines on our website, which clearly state that name correction is only allowed within 24 hours of booking and is subject to a fee. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our Customer Service team at [email address] or [phone number].

customer_query: I recently purchased a Cebu Pacific ticket and was surprised by a baggage fee. I feel this fee is excessive. Could you please explain the baggage policy?
resolution: We understand your concern regarding the baggage fee. According to our travel guide, the baggage allowance for our Manila-Riyadh-Manila flights is 20kg. Excess baggage fees apply for weights exceeding the 20kg allowance. However, please note that our baggage policy is clearly outlined in our website and travel requirements section. If you have any questions about our baggage policy or fees, please don't hesitate to ask. Next step: please review our baggage policy and fee information so we can assist you further with your concerns.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flights ko nang libre?
resolution: Hindi po libre ang mag-rebook ng flights sa Cebu Pacific. Ang CEB Flexi ay tumutugon sa mga pagbabago ng mga plano ng paglalakbay, ngunit hindi ito tumutugon sa mga rebooking change fees. Kung nais mo pa rin mag-rebook, marahil ay magpatawag tayo ng ating hotline para sa mga sumusunod na hakbang. Maaari nating paniwalaan ang rebooking fee sa iyong pag-rebook at sa mga sumusunod na hakbang.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: WHAT IF I MISSED MY FLIGHT TOMORROW AND I'M A CEBU PACIFIC PASSANGER!!! CAN I CANCEL IT AND REBOOK FOR LATER?
resolution: For your concern, please note that flight changes may incur fees as stated in our general guidelines. According to our flight schedule, we operate daily flights from Manila to Osaka and vice versa. If you missed your flight tomorrow, you can contact our customer service team to inquire about rebooking options. Please call or message us through our official channels within 3 hours before your scheduled flight departure or 6 hours after. Be prepared to pay a rebooking fee of PHP 1,800, and the fare difference if applicable. You can also visit our website to learn more about our flight schedules and fares.

customer_query: I'M FLYING TOMORROW AND I JUST GOT A MESSAGE THAT MY FLIGHT IS DELAYED!!! CAN I GET A REFUND?!!!
resolution: Dear passenger, I understand your frustration. According to our airline policies, we can rebook you on the next available flight. However, please note that we charge a rebooking fee of PHP 2,000. If you'd like to proceed, please reply to this message. We'll assist you in rebooking your flight. If you're eligible for a refund, you can also file a refund request within 30 days from the date of your original flight. For more information, please refer to our website or visit our customer service counters at the airport. Next step: please confirm if you'd like to rebook or request a refund.

customer_query: ano po kung gusto kong mag-rebook pero may wheelchair, pwede ba?
resolution: Yes, you can request rebooking with a wheelchair. To do this, please go to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app at least two (2) hours before departure. You can also declare your wheelchair request when you book your flight. Our ground staff will collect your wheelchair for you before entering the aircraft, and it will be stored on the aircraft for proper safekeeping. Please note that there may be a rebooking fee, which is ₱600 per sector for domestic flights and ₱800 per sector for international flights. You can pay this fee online through our Manage Booking portal or through our Cebu Pacific hotline.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I would like to inquire about bringing some food I purchased during my travels. I have read the article and it says that Food, Health, and Personal Care are allowed in checked baggage.
resolution: Yes, you are correct that Food, Health, and Personal Care are allowed in checked baggage. However, please be aware that there may be restrictions on perishable items or items that require a phytosanitary certificate. You can check with our airport staff for any specific restrictions or fees. We also recommend checking the expiration dates and packaging of the items to ensure they meet our airline's requirements.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: I recently saw that there is a fee for rebooking flights, and I was wondering why there is a fee for rebooking with a wheelchair?
resolution: Thank you for sharing your concerns with us. The rebooking fee is in place to help us manage our flight inventory and ensure that all passengers have a smooth travel experience. However, we understand that this may be a burden for some passengers. As a compromise, we offer a discounted rate of ₱300 per sector for domestic flights and ₱500 per sector for international flights for passengers with wheelchairs. We will review our policy and consider revising it in the future to better serve our passengers with disabilities. In the meantime, please let us know if you would like to rebook your flight and we will do our best to accommodate you.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I HAVE A FLIGHT TOMORROW AND I FORGOT TO CHECK IF MY LAPTOP CAN GO IN MY CHECKED BAGGAGE!!! HELP!!!
resolution:
• Check the article 'Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?' on the Cebu Pacific website.
• Appearances under 'Appliances, Electronics, and Gadgets' indicate laptops are allowed in checked baggage.
• Please prepare your laptop in a protective case to avoid damage,
• Pack it properly and ensure the baggage is sealed.
• If you have concerns about specific electronics or their packaging,
• You may contact Cebu Pacific's customer service 24/7 at +63 02 7020 888 or email through the website.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I disagree with the rebooking fee of PHP 2,500. It seems unfair to charge such a high fee for passengers who need to rebook their flights. Can you please clarify the policy behind this fee?
resolution: We understand your concern about the rebooking fee. According to our airport travel guide, the PHP 2,500 rebooking fee is non-refundable and non-transferable. This fee is in place to discourage last-minute changes and to allow us to accommodate other passengers who may have been displaced by your rebooking request. However, we are willing to waive the fee on a case-by-case basis if you have a valid reason for rebooking. Please provide us with your reason and we will review your request. How would you like to proceed?

customer_query: Good day, I am writing to inquire about the rebooking fee for my disrupted flight. I would like to know if it is possible to waive the fee considering the circumstances of my flight.
resolution: We understand your concern regarding the rebooking fee. According to our policy, rebooking for disrupted flights is available via the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website, free of charge, up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebooking beyond the 30-day period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Please note that if you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, a fee may apply. However, we can review your request on a case-by-case basis. Please provide us with more details regarding your flight and the circumstances, and we will be happy to assist you.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I'd like to add a baggage add-on to my existing booking, but I'm not sure if I'll get any points for this. Can you please advise?
resolution: Yes, you can earn Go Rewards points for adding a baggage add-on to your existing booking. As per our policies, points are credited seven (7) days after you board your flight. Please note that you will be charged the applicable fee for the baggage add-on. To add this, simply log in to your Manage Booking and follow the prompts to add the baggage add-on. Please contact our Customer Service team if you have any issues with this.
source_article: How to Earn and Redeem Go Rewards Points

customer_query: I'd like to know more about my options during flight disruptions. Where can I find this information?
resolution: You can find more information on your options during flight disruptions by visiting our website and clicking on the following articles: 'Cebu Pacific Policies and Terms & Conditions', 'Customer Service Plan', 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight', and 'What to Expect During Tarmac Delays'. These articles will provide you with a detailed explanation of our policies and procedures. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact our customer service at [insert contact number].

customer_query: isn't it unfair to charge a rebooking fee for flights that were transferred without notice?
resolution: We understand your concern, but please note that the rebooking fee is a standard policy as stated in our website. However, we can assist you in finding an alternative flight with minimal fees. Our Customer Service is available to assist you in finding a suitable solution. Resolution time: 12 minutes.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) Masbate, Siargao Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: i would like to rebook my flight for march 15th but the system is saying it's not available do you have any suggestions?
resolution:
I'm happy to help you rebook your flight. However, please note that our system is only able to offer available flights within the 30-day window. If your desired travel date is beyond this window, you can chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you with rebooking.

Additionally, please check that you are rebooking within the same class of travel and that you are not requesting a change to a different route.

Next step: Please confirm your preferred travel date and class of travel and I'll be happy to help you rebook.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I am writing to request a refund for my flight. However, I also used CEB Flexi to cancel my flight and convert the value to a Travel Fund. Can I still refund my original booking?
resolution:
According to our policy, CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation and does not cover rebooking change fees. However, you can still request a refund for your original booking. Please note that the refund will be processed in accordance with our refund policy and may take up to 14 working days to complete.

To request a refund, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [email](mailto:feedback@cebupacificair.com) and provide your booking reference number. We will be happy to assist you with your refund request.

Please note that you may still use the Travel Fund to pay for your future travel plans.

customer_query: I was charged a rebooking fee of PHP 500. I think this is unfair because I was forced to rebook due to a system glitch. Can you help me with this?
resolution: I understand your concern, and I'd be happy to help you with this. However, according to our policy, rebooking fees are non-refundable, except in cases where we, as the airline, are at fault. Since you had to rebook due to a system glitch, I suggest you contact our Customer Support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or through our website's contact page to explain your situation. We may be able to offer a refund or a voucher, depending on the circumstances. Please allow 2-3 business days for us to review your case. Thank you for your understanding.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND IT'S CANCELLED!!! CAN I STILL REBOOK FOR TOMORROW?!?!
resolution: You can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. Since your flight is cancelled and you want to rebook for the next day, you can do so through the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or by going to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Please note that Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. You can also check the refund process in the article about Refund Concerns. What is your preferred flight schedule for rebooking?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I'm not sure if I understand the provision of options during flight disruptions. Can you explain this in simpler terms?
resolution: Our goal is to ensure your welfare is taken care of whenever there are flight changes. We will provide options based on the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. This means that we will give you choices on how to proceed with your travel plans. If you need help understanding your options, please contact our customer service at [insert contact number] or visit our website and click on the 'How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight' article. We are here to assist you.

customer_query: i'm traveling with my unaccompanied minor and i'm having trouble checking in online... can i get an exception?
resolution: Unfortunately, as per our policy, we cannot accommodate unaccompanied minors for online check-in. Please proceed to check in at the airport and inform our staff that you have an unaccompanied minor with you. We will assist you with the check-in process and provide additional support for your child. Please note that we will charge a fee for this service, but we will be happy to assist you.

customer_query: I disagree with the travel voucher's expiration rules. Since I have unused funds in my credit card, why should I not be able to use my voucher during peak periods?
resolution: I understand your concern, and I apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, our Travel Voucher rules are designed to ensure fair usage for all passengers. The expiration rules and peak travel periods are clearly stated in our guidelines to prevent abuse and maintain a balanced travel experience for everyone. If you have concerns about the fair use of Travel Vouchers, please feel free to reach out to our customer service team, and we'll be happy to discuss further.

customer_query: Flight is TOMORROW help!!! I booked online but I don't see my flight status
resolution: Charlie, our chatbot, can help you check your flight status. You can chat with Charlie on the Cebu Pacific mobile app or website. Simply follow these steps: 1. Tap on the Menu at the bottom right corner of the app, 2. Click on the Talk to Us section, 3. Select Charlie, 4. Ask Charlie to check your flight status. If you're unable to chat with Charlie, you can contact our call center hotlines at + 612 9119 2956 or +852 397 33800. Please have your booking reference number ready.

customer_query: HELP!!! i booked my flight yesteRDAY but i forgot to add it to my account!!!
resolution:
To rebook or make changes to your flight, please follow these steps:
1. Log in to your MyCebuPacific account and navigate to the 'Bookings' section.
2. Select the booking you wish to make changes to and click on the 'Add Booking' feature.
3. Verify that you are one of the guests in the booking or that your name and email address match the details in your MyCebuPacific account.
4. If the booking is already added to another account, you will not be able to rebook or make changes.
The rebooking fee for domestic flights is P1,800 and for international flights is USD150.
Please note that rebooking is only possible up to 4 hours before the scheduled flight departure.
If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to chat with us via our app or website.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a fee to update my name, especially when I made a typo. Can you explain the policy behind this fee?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our policy states that name updates can only be done within 24 hours of booking. If you've already exceeded this timeframe, you'll need to chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can validate your request. Please prepare proof of the name correction, e.g., marriage certificate, or other supporting documents. Our fee for this service is PHP 500, which is non-refundable. Next step: Please review our policy and understand the reasoning behind the fee.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I disagree with the policy of charging a rebooking fee. I think it's unfair, especially since I'm booking with a travel agency. Can you help me with this?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. However, our rebooking fee policy is in place to cover administrative costs. Philippine passport holders can rebook without a fee for a specific date, time, and flight, but there's a non-refundable rebooking fee of PHP 2,000 for changes to other dates, times, or flights. Please note that the rebooking fee is non-transferable and non-refundable. If you're interested in learning more about our rebooking policy or have concerns about our fees, we recommend referring to our Rebooking Policy article or contacting our customer support directly. We'll be happy to discuss this with you further. Resolution time: 8 minutes

customer_query: I want to cancel my flight, but I don't have the GO Flexi Fare Bundle or CEB Flexi Add-on. Can I still get a refund?
resolution: I'd be happy to help you explore your options. According to our policy, you can still cancel your flight and get a refund if your flight was canceled by us, had a schedule change of at least one hour, or if you were denied entry by immigration. If you meet any of these conditions, please go to the Manage Booking page and follow the prompts to initiate the refund process. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: ano ang bayad sa rebooking fee? magkano ang mga fee na iinababaw kung mag-rebook ako beyond 30 days?
resolution: There is no fee for rebooking within the 30-day period before or after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, you will need to chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. During the chat, they will provide you with information on the fees associated with rebooking beyond the 30-day period. Please note that Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. Would you like to know more about the refund process?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I just found out that I need to pay a rebooking fee, but I think it's unfair since I'm within the 24-hour window. Can you help me escalate this?
resolution: I understand your concern, and I'm happy to help you escalate this issue. According to our travel guide, Hong Kong International Airport operates as a silent airport, which means there are minimal public announcements. However, we do try to accommodate our passengers as much as possible. In this case, the rebooking fee is mentioned in our general guidelines as a charge for changing flight details. I can offer to waive the fee this time, but please note that future changes may still incur a fee. If you're willing to accept this offer, I'll proceed with updating your booking. However, if you'd like to dispute the fee further, I can escalate this to our customer service team. Would you like to proceed with the waived fee or request further assistance?
source_article: Hong Kong Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: Pwede pa ba mag-rebook kung ang anak ko ay may sakit?
resolution:
Oo, pwede kayong mag-rebook kung ang anak ko ay may sakit. Sa kasalukuyang polisiya, ang mga pasahero ay pwedeng mag-rebook nang walang bayad ng rebooking fee kung sila ay may sakit o may kalamang medikal.
* Kung gusto ninyong mag-rebook, magandang magsimula sa pahina ng [rebooking](https://cebupacificair.com/booking/rebooking).
* Kung may tanong o katanungan, wag mag-alala, at magandang mag-try ng [customer service](https://cebupacificair.com/help/contact).
Paano mo gusto na mag-rebook?

customer_query: i'm having trouble checking in online because the agency i booked with is not authorized by cebu pacific.
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. Booking with an unauthorized agency can cause issues with online check-in. To resolve this, please contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or website. We will assist you in verifying your booking and providing you with instructions on how to check in online. In the meantime, you can also try contacting the unauthorized agency to resolve the issue, but we recommend booking directly with Cebu Pacific to avoid such problems in the future. Please note that unauthorized agencies may not provide you with the necessary information or assistance.

customer_query: I'm concerned that the premium seat option is unfair to passengers who don't have the ability to pay the higher fee. Shouldn't there be a more equitable way to allocate seats?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our premium seat option is designed to provide additional benefits and convenience to passengers who are willing to pay a premium for them. The extra legroom, priority boarding, and seat near exit & lavatory are all amenities that are not included in our standard fare. We strive to be fair and transparent in our pricing and policies, and our premium seat option is clearly outlined on our website and app. If you have any further concerns or would like to discuss this further, please contact our customer support team at +632 7020 888 or send us a message on the app. We appreciate your feedback and will take it into consideration.

customer_query: i am writing to inquire about the rebooking fee for my cancelled flight. i want to rebook beyond the 30-day period. is this unfair?
resolution: We understand your concerns about the rebooking fee. According to our policy, if you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, you may be required to pay a fee for rebooking. However, please note that this fee is non-refundable and not applicable to all passengers. We will provide you with the exact amount of the rebooking fee, and you can choose to pay it or cancel your new booking. Next step: We will review your case and provide you with the rebooking fee amount. Please allow 5 minutes for us to process this request.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I recently discovered that my booking was added to someone else's account. How do I remove it from their account and link it to mine?
resolution: Unfortunately, it is not possible to unlink a booking from your MyCebuPacific account. However, you can try adding or linking a new booking with the same details as your original booking. Please note that you can only add or link a booking if you are one of the guests in the booking or your booking's full name or email address matches the details in your MyCebuPacific account. If you wish to re-add the booking, please contact us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I would like to book a flight for my elderly mother, but I'm not sure about the baggage allowance. Can you please advise?
resolution: According to our baggage allowance policy, you can check the baggage allowance for your mother's flight on our website or by contacting our customer service team. Please note that bookings are generally non-refundable, non-reroutable, and non-transferrable. If you're booking an international flight, you may be able to check in online or at the airport. Please contact us if you have any further questions. Next steps: Check the baggage allowance for your mother's flight and contact us if you have any questions.

customer_query: I noticed that Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) does not require travelers to fill up a digital arrival card. Is that correct? And if so, why is that?
resolution:
Yes, that's correct. Currently, Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) does not require travelers to fill up a digital arrival card. However, please check for any additional requirements that may be imposed by the local government. We recommend that all travelers check with the local authorities for any up-to-date information on arrival requirements.

Resolution Time: 3 minutes
source_article: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm questioning the policy of charging for CEB Meals if I'm unable to bring it on board due to AirSWIFT-operated flights.
resolution: We understand your concern, sir/ma'am. However, the CEB Meals policy is in place to ensure that we can prepare your meals fresh and ensure food safety. Unfortunately, this policy also affects AirSWIFT-operated flights. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer service team.

customer_query: kailangan ko ng 32kg ng special baggage, magkano ang bayad?
resolution: CEB Special Baggage has a maximum weight of 20kg per special baggage. If you need to exceed this weight, you will need to pay an excess baggage fee. The excess baggage fee can be calculated based on your route and current baggage allowance. You can contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or via the website (https://www.cebupacificair.com) to determine the exact fee for your situation. Please note that baggage can be increased to a maximum weight of 32kg. You can expect a response from our support team within 8 minutes.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook sa flight sa singapore namin kasi nagka problema kami ng ticket?
resolution: I understand that there may be unforeseen circumstances. However, our rebooking fee is stated in our website. For domestic flights, it's PHP 1,500, while for international flights, it's SGD 30. Since you're taking a flight to Singapore, you'll need to pay SGD 30. Please note that you also need to pay the fare difference if the new flight has a higher price. You can pay via bank transfer or over the phone. Please call our hotline at +63 (2) 70-20-888 for assistance.

customer_query: I've made a mistake in my booking and I want to transfer it to another guest. But I read that bookings are not transferable. Can I appeal to you?
resolution: Unfortunately, bookings cannot be transferred to another guest. This is stated in the General Guidelines section of the article. If you're concerned about this policy, you can try contacting our Live Agent via our app or website. However, please note that this policy is in place to ensure the integrity of our booking system. Resolution time: 9 minutes.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: Why do I need to accept the Flight Swap offer through the official platform? Can't I just reply to the email or contact the customer service through phone?
resolution: We understand your concern, but according to Cebu Pacific's policy, you must accept the Flight Swap offer through our official platform. This is to ensure the security and integrity of your booking. If you're still unsure, you can try to verify through our official channels or chat with us to connect with a Live Agent who can help confirm your Flight Swap offer. Please note that participation in the Flight Swap offer is voluntary, and you can decline the offer if you're not satisfied. Resolution time: 9 minutes.

customer_query: I am writing to inquire about the Priority Boarding policy for Premium Seat Selectors. Can you provide more information?
resolution: According to the Cebu Pacific Airline Policies, Priority Boarding is available for Premium Seat Selectors, except for Macau, China, and Dubai. This means that you and your companions will be able to board the aircraft ahead of other passengers. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask.

customer_query: Is the $10 fee for rebooking a one-time fee, or do I need to pay it each time I make a change to my flight?
resolution: The $10 rebooking fee is a non-refundable fee that applies to each rebooking request. If you need to make changes to your flight, you'll need to pay the rebooking fee each time. However, we have CEB Flexi available, which can provide you with more flexibility and savings. If you'd like to explore this option further, please sign up or log in to your MyCebuPacific account and check our how-to guides for more information.

customer_query: I booked a flight with Cebu Pacific last week, but I just learned about the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. Does this bill affect my previous booking?
resolution: The Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights does not apply to flights that were already booked prior to its implementation. However, you may still be entitled to a refund or rebooking options in case of flight disruptions. Please contact our customer service at +63 2 879-0888 or email us at [customercare@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customercare@cebupacificair.com) to discuss your options. We will do our best to accommodate your request.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung nagkasakit ako at hindi ko na kaya ang flight?
resolution: If you are too sick to travel, you might be eligible for a refund. According to our policy, if you, or another passenger in the booking, has a serious illness, you can request a refund. However, please note that bookings are generally non-refundable for personal reasons. If you have the CEB Flexi add-on, you can cancel your booking and convert it to a Travel Fund. Otherwise, please approach us at the airport counters for assistance, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. They can assess your case and provide guidance on the next steps. Next step: Please provide a doctor's note or medical certificate to support your request for a refund. Resolution time: 7 minutes

customer_query: I see that there is a premium seat option available, but what are the criteria for being eligible to sit in an exit row seat?
resolution: According to our airline policy, passengers who want to sit in an exit row seat must be able to fulfill safety requirements and meet the following criteria: be at least 15 years old, be able to speak and understand English to follow instructions given onboard, be physically fit and able to reach, open, lift, and throw out the exit door in an emergency. Additionally, they should not be pregnant or seated with an infant or a passenger under 15 years old, and should not have any permanent or temporary impairments. If you believe you meet these criteria and would like to request an exit row seat, please contact our customer support team at +632 7020 888 or send us a message on the Cebu Pacific app.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? i need to travel earlier than my original plan
resolution: Unfortunately, rebooking fees may apply, but we encourage you to check with our Manage Booking page for more information. Please note that group bookings with more than 20 passengers have a restriction on rebooking, so it's best to check with our customer support team for further assistance. You can reach us via phone at 02-8702-0888 or email us at support@cebupacificair.com for more information on rebooking fees and procedures.

customer_query: I was trying to book a flight and I was asked to select a fare bundle, but I was not sure what it was. Can you explain what a fare bundle is?
resolution: A fare bundle is a package deal that includes certain add-ons or services at a lower price compared to purchasing them individually. When you select a fare bundle, it applies to all guests in your booking, including round-trip flights. Our fare bundles include options like GO Basic, GO Easy, and others. Each bundle has its own inclusions and restrictions, such as baggage allowance, seat selection, and voluntary rebooking. Please check our website for more information on our fare bundles and their respective inclusions. You can also contact our customer service team for assistance.

customer_query: I booked a flight with you guys last week and I'd like to update my nationality. Is it possible to change it now, considering it's just a few hours before my flight?
resolution: Unfortunately, it's not possible to update your nationality this close to your flight. According to our policy, you can only update your nationality, birthday, and salutation details up to 2 hours before your flight, and this is only available via Manage Booking. For nationality and passport details, you can only make this change once. If you need assistance, please approach the airport counters for help. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: Puede ba mag-rebook ang flight pag nagbago ang itinerary ko?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight if you need to change your itinerary. However, a rebooking fee may apply, which depends on the type of fare you have booked. Please check the Cebu Pacific website for the latest information on rebooking fees and procedures. You can also contact our customer service team for assistance.

customer_query: IS MY BAG TOO BIG I DIDN'T CHECK THE WEIGHT AND DIMENSIONS WILL I GET CHARGED !!!
resolution: The baggage allowance for Cebu Pacific flights is 39 inches on all sides. If your bag exceeds this size, you will be charged extra. Please proceed to the Repack Area to verify the weight and dimensions of your baggage or re-arrange its content. Check-in bags must not exceed 39 inches on all sides. Extra charges will apply. You can also click here to learn more about baggage allowance.

customer_query: Flight is TOMORROW HELP!!! I FORGOT TO DECLARE THE PHP 50,000 I'M CARRYING. WHAT DO I DO?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience, but please immediately report to the airport authorities about the undeclared amount. According to the guide, you need to declare the amount when filling your eTravel details and secure authorization from the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas for PHP currency. Non-declaration or false declaration will be subject to confiscation and/or legal action.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng eroplano ko kung nagka-travel tax problem?
resolution: Kung may travel tax problem ka, pwede kang mag-rebook ng eroplano sa SSDP (Self-Service Disruption Portal). Sa SSDP, pwede kang i-rebook ang eroplanong gusto mo at i-refund ang travel tax mo. May mga instructions din kami sa SSDP para sa mga pagbabagong ito. Kung may katanungan ka pa, pwede kang mag-PM sa amin. Anong oras na naka-schedule ang eroplano mo?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: Pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight pag na-cancel siya? At magkano ang bayad?
resolution:
Oo, pwede ka mag-rebook ng flight. Maaari ka ring magpa-rebook ng libre hanggang 30 araw bago o 30 araw pagkatapos ng iyong orihinal na schedule. Kapag gusto mong magpa-rebook sa labas ng 30-araw na panahon, maaari kang tumawag sa aming customer service team para sa tulong.
Ang bayad para sa mga bagong pag-rebook ay magkakaiba-iba depende sa iyong route at klase ng ticket. Kung gusto mong malaman ang bayad para sa iyong kaso, makakapunta ka sa aming website at pagtutungo sa Manage Booking section.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: IS MY FLIGHT TOMORROW STILL DEPARTING FROM MNL!!!
resolution: Your flight tomorrow is still departing, but from Clark International Airport (CRK) starting October 26, 2025. You can check your revised itinerary on our website or mobile app. Please note that you do not need to take any action, but if you have any concerns, you can contact our 24/7 hotline at +63 998 995 1111.
source_article: Transfer of San Jose Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: I'm new to flying and wasn't sure what CEB Flexi is. Is it like insurance or something?
resolution: CEB Flexi is a service that allows you to cancel your flight for free and convert the value of your booking to a non-expiring Travel Fund. This means you can use the value of your cancelled flight to pay for future travel plans. You can add CEB Flexi to your booking before finishing your purchase, and the price is based on your flight date and regulatory guidelines. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: I recently had to cancel my flight due to a family emergency. Can I get a refund for the value of my CEB Flexi?
resolution: We're sorry to hear about your family emergency. If you've already converted the value of your CEB Flexi to a Travel Fund, you may use it to pay for future trips. If you're looking for a refund, please contact our customer support team via [email](support@cebupacificair.com) or [live chat](https://www.cebupacificair.com/support). They will guide you on the next steps to process your refund. Please note that refunds are subject to our airline's policies and procedures.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung gusto kong magdagdag ng baggage?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight to add baggage. However, we have a temporary baggage policy in some airports, like Bangkok and Don Mueang, where you can only purchase up to two additional pieces at the airport. If you need more than three pieces, it's best to purchase them online. For rebooking, please contact our customer service at +632 70 70 700. There's a fee for rebooking, which is P1,200 for domestic flights and P2,000 for international flights. You'll need to pay the difference in fare and any additional fees for baggage. Please be advised that rebooking fees may vary depending on the fare bundle and type of flight. Can you please provide your booking reference number so we can assist you further?
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: WHAT IF I HAVE NO FIRST NAME BUT I WANT TO SIGN UP FOR MYCEBU PACIFIC!! I DONT UNDERSTAND!!!
resolution: To sign up for a MyCebuPacific account, you can simply tick the "I have no first name" box and fill in the remaining fields. Please note that you will still need to provide your name, email address, and other required information. If you encounter any issues during the sign-up process, you can contact our customer support team via phone (+632 8704-7000) or email ([support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com)). We're available 24/7 to assist you. Next step: try signing up again using the 'I have no first name' option.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I believe the rebooking fee for changing my flight is unfair. Can I get a refund?
resolution: We understand your concern. Our rebooking fee is PHP 2,000, and it is clearly stated in our policy. However, we can offer a refund if you have a valid reason for rebooking. Please contact our customer service at 02-777-5939 to discuss your case further. We will review your request and inform you of the next steps. Please note that our refund policy has a timeline of 3 business days for processing. We appreciate your understanding.
source_article: Cebu Pacific Destinations, Airports, and Terminal Numbers

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I JUST NOTICED I MADE A TYPO IN MY FIRST NAME!!! CAN I CHANGE IT NOW?!?!
resolution: Unfortunately, you cannot make changes to your booking outside of the 24-hour window. Please contact our Live Agent via our app or website and provide proof of the name correction, such as a marriage certificate, to validate your request. You will need to pay any applicable rebooking fees, currently PHP 2,000. Our Live Agent will assist you and provide a new booking reference number. Please expect to wait 5-10 minutes for a response. What is your name so I can assist you further?
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: IS MY FLIGHT TOMORROW CANCELED IF I DONT PAY FOR BAGGAGE UPGRADE!!! HELP!!!
resolution: You don't need to pay for baggage upgrade for your flight tomorrow. According to our website, checked baggage allowance is only included in our GO Easy and GO Flexi fare bundles. Since you didn't mention your fare bundle, please check your booking through Manage Booking. If you have a GO Basic fare bundle, you can add checked baggage and special baggage in Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. Please note that upgrading the weight of your checked baggage doesn't change the number of pieces allowed. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service at +632 70 70 700 within the next 5 minutes.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: where do i go if i don't have any bags to check in at NAIA Terminal 3?
resolution: If you don't have any bags to check in, you can head straight to the security/immigration gates at NAIA Terminal 3. Just make sure to check in online or at the airport first. If you have any issues, please contact our customer service at <phone number> or visit us at the airport. Please remember to arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before your international flight or 1 hour before your domestic flight.

customer_query: ano ang mga bagay na dapat kong gawin pagkatapos ng mga entry requirements sa singapore?
resolution:
After clearing immigration, please proceed to collect your baggage and proceed to the arrivals area.
1. Ensure you have all necessary travel documents, including your visa (if required) and proof of onward travel.
2. Register with the Immigration and Checkpoints Authority (ICA) using the SG Arrival Card.
3. Declare all goods you bring into Singapore, including gifts and purchases.
4. Follow the airport's signs to the customs and immigration area.
5. For more information, you can visit the ICA website or ask one of our friendly staff members.

customer_query: HELP!!! I MADE A TYPING MISTAKE ON MY NAME AND IT'S TOMORROW!!!
resolution: To update your name, please go to Manage Booking within 24 hours of booking. You can only update either your First Name or your Last Name, and you can only do this once. If it's more than 24 hours since you made your booking, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can validate your request. Please prepare proof of the name correction, e.g., marriage certificate, or other supporting documents. Next step: Please go to Manage Booking now to attempt the update.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko pag may issue sa CEB TravelSure?
resolution: Oo, pwede kang mag-rebook ng flight sa CEB TravelSure. However, please note that the flight cancellation up to flight cost coverage is only available for flights in Thailand and Vietnam. Pag may issue sa pag-rebook, kailangan mong kumunista sa aming customer service team sa +632 7020 888 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Pwede bang mag-anunsiyo kung anong mga requirements para sa rebooking sa Cebu Pacific?

customer_query: I've tried to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account but I was informed that I'm not eligible because I'm under 18. However, I'm 19 years old. Can I still sign up?
resolution: According to our guidelines, anyone aged 18 and above is eligible to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account. Since you're 19 years old, you should be eligible to sign up. Please try again and contact us if you continue to encounter issues. Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you. Next step: attempt to sign up again and confirm your age when prompted.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: What if I booked my flight with another person's name? I want to link it to my MyCebuPacific account.
resolution: To link a booking to your MyCebuPacific account, you must be one of the guests in the booking or your booking's full name or email address must match the details in your MyCebuPacific account. You cannot add or link a booking if it was already added to another account or if it's a Group Booking / Travel Agency booking. If you wish to link your booking, please contact us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you.
