source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko kung kainis ako dahil nahuli ako sa traffic? Nagtatanong lang po ako kasi diko pa alam kung ano ano gagawin ko
resolution: Unfortunately, our policy does not allow for rebooking due to traffic. However, you can try rebooking your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Please note that there may be a rebooking fee associated with rebooking beyond the 30-day period. The rebooking fee is subject to change and may vary depending on the route and travel dates.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: I would like to add extra baggage to my booking. According to the Cebu Pacific baggage guidelines, I can add a maximum of three pieces of checked baggage. Is this correct?
resolution: Yes, that is correct. You can purchase a maximum of three pieces of checked baggage online, with each piece having a base weight of 20kg. However, if you need more than three pieces, you can purchase additional baggage at the airport, subject to certain restrictions. Please note that these restrictions do not apply to all flights, including flights departing from Bangkok (BKK) and Don Mueang (DMK).
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight. According to our rebooking policy, a rebooking fee of PHP 2,000 applies plus any difference in fare. Please contact our customer support team at least 24 hours before your original flight to proceed with the rebooking. You may also visit our website to view our rebooking policy and procedures. Please click on the 'Help' tab and search for 'rebooking' to learn more.

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding the rebooking policy. If I rebook my flight multiple times, will I incur additional fees each time?
resolution: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. According to Cebu Pacific's policy, there is no limit to the number of times you can rebook your flight. However, you will still incur a change fee of P1,000 and the fare difference for each rebooking. We strive to be fair and transparent in our policies, and we hope this clarification helps. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: Magkano ang bayad para makapunta sa lounge ng Cebu Pacific sa Ninoy Aquino International Airport Terminal 3?
resolution: The Cebu Pacific lounge at Ninoy Aquino International Airport Terminal 3 is accessible to passengers who have paid PHP 500 per person. Please note that priority passengers are also eligible for lounge access. You can pay for lounge access at our counter at the airport or through our website. For more information, please contact our customer service hotline at +632 7020 888.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I BOOKED GO BASIC BUT WANT TO KNOW IF I CAN STILL CHANGE MY SEAT FOR FREE!!!
resolution: Sorry to hear you're panicking! Unfortunately, with GO Basic, you can't choose your seat for free. According to our Fare Rules, GO Basic seats are assigned randomly at check-in. However, you can upgrade to a Standard Seat with our GO Easy fare bundle, which is a better option for seat selection. This would cost an additional [amount] and can be done at the time of booking. If you've already booked, you can reach out to our customer service team at [phone number] or [email address] to discuss your options. Next steps will depend on your specific situation and available seats.

customer_query: Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inquire about the CEB Transfers policy. Can you please provide more information on how to purchase and rebook CEB Transfers?
resolution:
To purchase CEB Transfers, you can go to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app up to 24 hours before your flight. A MyCebuPacific account is required. Please log in to your account and follow the prompts to add CEB Transfers to your booking. You can also purchase CEB Transfers when you book your flight. To rebook CEB Transfers, please log in to your MyCebuPacific account and follow the prompts to make changes to your booking, including CEB Transfers. Please note that any changes to CEB Transfers will incur a fee, and you will need to comply with any additional requirements such as providing new flight information. If you have any issues, you can contact us at +632 7744 9999 or visit our website for more information.

Next step: Please log in to your MyCebuPacific account and attempt to purchase or rebook CEB Transfers, as applicable. If you encounter any issues, please wait until the next business day to contact us for assistance

customer_query: I would like to request a refund for my cancelled flight. Can I get a full refund?
resolution: For a full refund, please check the refund policies here: Refund Concerns. According to our policies, you are entitled to a refund of your fare according to your form of payment, except for Travel Tax. Travel Tax and unused TravelSure will have to be refunded separately. Can I assist you with the refund process?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung nagkamali ng information sa digital arrival card?
resolution: We recommend re-checking your information and resubmitting the TDAC if you made an error. If you've already submitted the incorrect information, kindly contact the Thai immigration department for guidance on corrections. Please note that re-submission may take a few minutes, and it's essential to complete the TDAC accurately to avoid further complications.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'M BOOKED FOR TOMORROW HELP!!! I DIDN'T KNOW I NEEDED A VALID ID FOR DOMESTIC FLIGHTS!!!
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. According to the article, you need to bring a valid ID for domestic flights. Please refer to the list of accepted IDs in our Domestic Travel Guide article. Please arrive at the airport three (3) hours before your flight and proceed to the airport counters with your valid ID. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact our support team at support@cebupacificair.com. We hope this resolves the issue. Next step: Arrive at the airport with your valid ID.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung nasaan na ang aso ko?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight with your dog. According to the article, you need to declare the presence of your dog at the time of booking or via Manage Booking. You can do this by contacting our customer service through this number 02-8532-8000. There might be a rebooking fee, please check with our customer service for more information.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung nagbago ng isang beses ang plano ko ng pagbiyahe?
resolution: Oo, maaari kang magre-book ngunit may mga pagbabago sa rules at sa bayarin at pagbabago sa halaga ng tiket. Kapag nagre-book ka, maaaring may additional bayarin at pagbabago sa halaga ng tiket. Maaari mong bisitahin ang website namin para sa mas detalyadong impormasyon. Kung may tanong, maaari kang makipag-ugnay sa amin sa [email address] o [phone number].

customer_query: Hello, I am a first-time flyer. Can I bring my sports equipment in my checked baggage?
resolution: Yes, you can bring your sports equipment in your checked baggage. However, it's essential to check with us first to ensure that your equipment complies with our baggage size and weight requirements. Additionally, some sports equipment may incur extra fees. Please contact our customer service team at customerservice@cebupacificair.com or call us at 02 8702 0888 to get more information and to book your equipment as checked baggage. We'll be happy to assist you.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I'm surprised that our policy requires a fee for my rebooking request. Isn't this unfair, considering we only want to change our flight dates by a few days?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we appreciate your feedback. Our rebooking fees are in place to help us manage and adjust our flight schedules. The first rebooking is free, but subsequent rebookings incur a fee. We aim to strike a balance between accommodating our passengers' needs and ensuring that we can continue to provide our services efficiently. We'd be happy to discuss this further with you and provide more information on our rebooking policies. May I know what changes you're looking to make to your flight, and I'll do my best to assist you?
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I'm experiencing flight delays and cancellations frequently with Cebu Pacific. I think I'm being unfairly charged for rebooking fees. Can you help me understand the policy behind this?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing. Our rebooking fees are in line with our airline's policies and the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. If you rebook within 24 hours of the original flight, a rebooking fee of P1,000 applies. However, if you rebook 30 days before or after the original schedule, the fee is waived. We understand that this may seem unfair, but we assure you that our policies are in place to ensure the welfare of all passengers. If you'd like to discuss further, please contact our customer service at +63 2 879-0888 or email us at [customercare@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customercare@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I find it unfair that I have to pay extra for my oversized baggage. Can you waive the rebooking fee?
resolution: Unfortunately, our policy is clear that extra charges will apply for oversized bags. However, I can offer to waive the rebooking fee if you rebook your flight immediately and pay the additional fee for the oversized baggage. Please note that this is a one-time gesture and future rebooking fees will still apply. To proceed, please contact our customer service team within the next 24 hours.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I AM A CEbu Pacific PRIORITY PASSENGER BUT I CANT FIND MY SEAT NUMBER IN THE ONLINE CHECK IN!!!
resolution: To resolve this issue, please check your booking summary email or contact our 24/7 hotline at +632 7020 888 or email us at customer.service@cebupacificair.com. You can also visit our website and click on 'Manage Booking' to retrieve your seat number or make changes to your booking. Please note that priority passengers can access the Ninoy Aquino International Airport Terminal 3 lounge for a fee of PHP 500 per person. Seat numbers are usually assigned 24 hours before the flight.

customer_query: flight to singapore is TOMORROW help!!! my baggage is 32 kg, can i check in online?
resolution:
To check in online, please visit our website and follow these steps:
1. Log in to your Manage Booking page.
2. Select the flight and passenger details.
3. Proceed to choose your seat and add baggage (additional fee of SGD 20 for 10 kg). You can pay using your credit card or other accepted payment methods.
4. Confirm your booking and print or save your boarding pass. For baggage, please note that Changi Airport has a baggage allowance of 32 kg for economy class.

customer_query: I just received a travel voucher but I'm not sure what it's for. Can you help me understand how it works?
resolution: A Travel Voucher is a free ticket issued by Cebu Pacific for future travel plans. It covers the base fare of any domestic or international flight type, but does not cover fees or other taxes. Please check the email you used to book the flight for the latest updates. You can also log in to your MyCebuPacific account to access your Travel Voucher. The voucher is assigned to a specific passenger name and cannot be transferred or changed. Next step: please review the voucher details and contact us for assistance if needed.

customer_query: I'M RUNNING LATE FOR MY FLIGHT TOMORROW!!! CAN I PAY FOR IT NOW AND STILL BOARD?
resolution: Please settle all balances or unpaid amounts before the day of flight or before checking in for your flight. You can pay using your credit/debit card, Go Rewards, e-Wallet, or Travel Fund. If you have an unpaid balance, you won't be able to board the flight. Please settle your balance at the airport or contact our customer support at +632 7020 888. You can also check our website for our payment centre option, but it's currently unavailable.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko kung may visa issue?
resolution: Kumusta po? Maaari kang mag-rebook ng flight mo through our website or mobile app, but you'll need to pay the rebooking fee, which is PHP1,200 per passenger. This fee is as stated on our website, so kindly review our website for more information. You can also contact our customer support team at +63 2 7020 888 for assistance with rebooking. If you need more help, you can visit our website or social media channels for more information on our rebooking policy. What is your flight number and date of travel so we can check on the rebooking fee?

customer_query: I am disputing the rebooking fee because I feel it is excessive. Can you assist me with this?
resolution: I understand your concern about the rebooking fee. However, the fee is subject to Cebu Pacific's policies and is non-refundable. According to our policies, Seat Selector is available via Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. If you have already purchased Seat Selector and need to rebook, please contact our customer service team to discuss your options. Please note that we will not be able to waive the fee, but we can assist you with finding alternative solutions.

customer_query: I'M CALLING TO ASCERTAIN THE FAIRNESS OF THE REBOOKING FEE. I BELIEVE IT SHOULD BE WAIVED GIVEN THE AIRSWIFT MIGRATION
resolution: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We understand your concern about the rebooking fee. However, please note that the rebooking fee is a standard policy for Cebu Pacific. We have communicated this clearly in our AirSWIFT migration announcement. If you would like to explore options for avoiding the fee, we can discuss possible alternatives, such as canceling and rebooking. Please note that this option will also involve a cancellation fee. We can discuss this further with you. Can you please confirm your flight details and reference number for further assistance?
source_article: AirSWIFT Airlines Migrates to Cebu Pacific System

customer_query: I have a Travel Voucher for an International One-way Short Haul flight, but I want to book a Round-trip International flight. Can I do so?
resolution: Unfortunately, no. The voucher is assigned to a specific flight type and cannot be changed to another origin/destination. This means that you cannot use your Travel Voucher for a Round-trip International flight. You can, however, use it for other flight types that are included in the voucher's assigned flight types. To check the included flight types, please log in to your MyCebuPacific account or check the email you received with the voucher.

customer_query: pwede pa ba mag-take ng baggage ang amin sa cebu pacific flight papuntang jakarta?
resolution:
Cebu Pacific allows checked baggage for international flights, including flights to Jakarta.
The baggage allowance is one piece of checked baggage weighing up to 23 kg.
You can purchase extra baggage allowance online or at the airport for a fee.
The fee is PHP 500 per additional 5 kg.
Please note that you can check your baggage allowance and fees on the Manage Booking page.
If you need more information or assistance, please contact us.
Our customer service is available from 5am to 7pm to help with any questions or concerns.
Our contact number is 02-7738088.

customer_query: I don't think it's fair that I have to pay a rebooking fee even if I'm changing my flight within 24 hours. Can you waive it for me?
resolution: I understand your concern, but our fare rules state that voluntary rebooking is allowed but subject to change fees and fare differences. Unfortunately, we cannot waive the rebooking fee in this case. However, we can assist you in rebooking your flight and provide you with the required documentation for your request. Please contact us at +63917 829-2922 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to discuss further. We will do our best to assist you within the next 12 business hours.

customer_query: kailangan ba magbayad ng rebooking fee kung nagde-delay ang eroplano?
resolution: Hi there! Our policy states that rebooking fees apply when you change your flight dates or times. However, if your flight is delayed due to circumstances beyond our control, like a tarmac delay, we'll waive the rebooking fee. Please contact our customer service at +63 998 999 9999 to discuss your specific situation. We'll do our best to accommodate you.
source_article: What to Expect During Tarmac Delays

customer_query: ano po ang mga terminal sa mga domestic flights?
resolution: According to the article, Terminal 1 of Mactan-Cebu International Airport serves domestic flights. You can find more information about Cebu Pacific's domestic routes and schedules on our website. Please visit our website at https://www.cebupacificair.com and click on the 'Routes' tab to view our domestic flight schedules and destinations.

customer_query: Is it true that only Cebu Pacific flights accept service dogs, while Cebgo and AirSWIFT do not?
resolution: Yes, that's correct. According to our guidelines, Cebu Pacific (5J) accepts service dogs, while Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) do not currently accept them. However, we are working on adding AirSWIFT to our accepted flights list soon. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at +63 998 888 1234 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I believe the fee for CEB TravelSure is quite steep. Is it really worth it?
resolution: CEB TravelSure provides a comprehensive insurance package that covers emergency medical treatment, flight cancellation, and compensation for lost or damaged baggage. The fee is competitive in the market and offers great value for the coverage provided. If you're still unsure, please refer to our CEB TravelSure policies for more information. If you'd like to discuss further, kindly contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Have you considered the potential costs of medical treatment or flight cancellation without CEB TravelSure?

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng special baggage kung hindi ko pa naka-add bago na ako nag-book ng ticket?
resolution: Unfortunately, special baggage add-ons can only be added within 2 hours before your flight. According to our policy, special baggage must be purchased before check-in. You can manage your booking via the Cebu Pacific app or a MyCebuPacific account to add special baggage before the deadline. Next step: try adding special baggage to your booking via the app.

customer_query: hi, i just tried to check in online for my flight tomorrow but it says i need to pay php 1000 for rebooking. how much is the rebooking fee again?
resolution: Ang rebooking fee para sa flights ng Cebu Pacific ay PHP 1,000. Ito ay inilalagay sa aming Shanghai Airport at Travel Guide. Ngunit, para sa inyo ay hindi na kinakailangan ang bayarin ng rebooking fee kung magre-rebook ka ng within 24 hours bago ang oras ng check-in. Maaari kang humingi ng tulong sa aming customer service mula sa atin pangarap hotline (0922 143 2626) o sa email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I think the rebooking fee is unfair. I just found out that my family member's flight was cancelled due to unexpected circumstances. Can't I get a waiver for the fee?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our rebooking fee is a standard charge for flights cancelled or amended by passengers. However, we offer a flexible rebooking policy that allows you to change your flight up to 3 hours before departure without any additional fee. If you have a genuine reason for cancelling your flight, you can request a refund for your ticket or a travel credit worth 100% of the original purchase price. Please contact our support team at +63 917 725 5711 to discuss your options. Resolution time: 9 minutes. Please provide your booking reference number and a detailed explanation for your request.

customer_query: I am having trouble understanding the difference between rebooking and canceling my flight. Can you please explain it to me in simpler terms?
resolution: Rebooking means changing your flight to a different schedule without canceling it. Canceling your flight means abandoning your original flight and forfeiting your fare and other fees. To rebook, you can use the Manage Booking page on our website. To cancel, you can do so only under certain conditions: if your flight was canceled by us, if there was a schedule change of at least one hour, or if you were denied entry by immigration.

customer_query: I strongly disagree with the infant without seat policy. It's unfair that we have to pay for an infant's seat when they can just sit on our lap.
resolution:
Dear valued guest, 

Cebu Pacific's policy on infant without seat is in place to ensure the safety and comfort of all our passengers. The fee for an infant without seat is necessary to compensate for the special assistance required. 

However, if you'd like to rebook your infant's seat, please note that there are CRS requirements that need to be met. You can purchase a CRS-approved seat for your infant on our website. If you have any further questions or concerns, kindly contact our customer support team at [email address or contact number]. 

Next step: Please provide your booking reference number so we can assist you further.

customer_query: I understand that booking an international flight requires passport details, but is it fair to charge a rebooking fee of PHP 2,400? Is there any way to waive this fee?
resolution: We understand your concern about the rebooking fee. However, please note that our rebooking policy is designed to manage last-minute changes. You can request to waive the rebooking fee, but please contact our 24/7 hotline at +632-8716-0700 as soon as possible to discuss available options. Please note that we may require additional documentation to support your request. Next step: contact our support hotline to discuss waiving the rebooking fee.

customer_query: I'd like to know more about the personal accident insurance with CEB TravelSure. What exactly does it cover?
resolution: The personal accident insurance with CEB TravelSure provides extensive coverage for accidents while traveling in the Philippines or Asia. This includes medical treatment, hospitalization, and other related expenses. For more information, please refer to our CEB TravelSure policies. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Have you reviewed the full coverage details of the personal accident insurance?

customer_query: I booked a flight using my Go Rewards number, but I'm not sure if I'll get any points for this. Can you please confirm?
resolution: To earn Go Rewards points, you must enter your Go Rewards number at the time of booking and ensure that the name and email in your booking match the details in your Go Rewards account. Please note that points are credited seven (7) days after you board your flight. If you have any issues with this, please contact the Go Rewards Customer Care Team at [insert contact details]. They can assist you in verifying your points and answering any other questions you may have.
source_article: How to Earn and Redeem Go Rewards Points

customer_query: i recently booked a flight with Cebu Pacific, but i was charged a higher fee for rebooking compared to what was stated on the website. i believe this is unfair.
resolution: We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. According to our website, the rebooking fee is indeed PHP 2,000 or USD 40 for domestic flights and PHP 5,000 or USD 100 for international flights. However, fees may vary depending on the circumstances of the rebooking. If you believe you were charged an unfair fee, please contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or website, and we will review your case. We will do our best to resolve the issue fairly and according to our policies. Please have your booking reference number ready for verification purposes.

customer_query: I would like to inquire about the baggage allowance for my upcoming flight to Sapporo. According to the article, can you please confirm the free baggage allowance?
resolution: According to our baggage policy, one standard carry-on bag and one personal item are allowed for free. The standard carry-on bag must fit in the overhead bin or under the seat in front of you. If you have any issues or concerns, please contact our customer service at +632 7020 888 or [email address].
source_article: Sapporo (New Chitose) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight sa brunei airport?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight at the Brunei International Airport. However, please note that rebooking fees apply. Rebooking fees start from PHP 1,200.00 for domestic flights and PHP 1,800.00 for international flights. You may also rebook your flight online or by contacting our customer service at [customer.service@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customer.service@cebupacificair.com) or call +63 2 976 1834. If you'd like to rebook your flight due to unforeseen circumstances, please prepare your identification and travel documents when you rebook at the airport. You may request the assistance of our airport staff for any concerns.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight? magkano ang bayad
resolution: If you need to rebook your flight, please contact our customer support at +632 7020 888. The rebooking fee is not mentioned in the article, but we do have a guide on how to pay for amount due. You can check our website for the CEB Flexi and Travel Fund guide. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

customer_query: paano kung gusto kong mag-book ng flight sa ibang destinasyon? kailangan ko pa rin mag-fill up ng digital arrival card?
resolution: Hi! If you need to rebook your flight to a different destination, you still need to submit the TDAC for your original flight. However, you won't need to submit a new TDAC for your new flight if you're not entering Thailand. You can only submit one TDAC per trip. If you have any questions or concerns about rebooking, we recommend contacting our customer service team for assistance. Please note that changes or cancellations may incur fees. Would you like us to outline the fees associated with rebooking?
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I CANT CHECK IN ONLINE!!!
resolution: We can help you check in for your flight. Please try checking in on our online check-in page or through the Cebu Pacific app. If you're unable to check in online, you can check in at the airport. You must check in at least 1 hour before your domestic flight or 2 hours before your international flight. If you have any issues with checking in, please contact us at <phone number> or visit us at the airport.

customer_query: I JUST BOOKED WITH CEB FLEXI, HOW DO I CONVERT TO TRAVEL FUND IF I DECIDE TO CANCEL MY FLIGHT TOMORROW!!! HELP!!!
resolution: ['To cancel your flight and convert to Travel Fund, go to your MyCebuPacific account within 2 hours before your flight departure.', "Sign in and find your booking, then click 'Cancel Flight' and follow the prompts.", 'Once you cancel, the value of your booking will be converted to a non-expiring Travel Fund within 24 hours.', 'You can use your Travel Fund to pay for future travel plans, but it does not cover rebooking change fees.']

customer_query: excuse me, what's the difference between MNL and CRK airports?
resolution: Our flights will be transferring from Ninoy Aquino International Airport (MNL) to Clark International Airport (CRK), which is located in Pampanga. The main difference is that Clark International Airport is outside of Metro Manila, and it's expected to have less traffic congestion compared to MNL. However, please note that the flight duration and schedules remain the same. If you have any more questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! MY PASSPORT IS EXPIRING IN A MONTH, DO I NEED A VISA!!!
resolution: Please don't worry, we're here to help. You need to obtain a visa prior to travel as Australia does not offer visa-free entry for Filipino citizens. You can check if you need a visa on our website, Cebu Pacific TravelDoc, using your nationality and travel dates. Once you've determined you need a visa, please allow at least 3-4 days for processing. You can contact our customer support team at +63 2 7020 888 for more information and to book your visa appointment. You can also visit the Australian Department of Home Affairs website for more information on the visa application process. Don't forget to include your visa details in your travel documents to avoid any delays or issues upon arrival. What is your flight number and date of birth so we can check on your visa status?

customer_query: anong requirement ng visa kung galing sa ibang bansa?
resolution:
For non-Philippine passport holders, please check the Cebu Pacific TravelDoc website to see if you'll need a visa for entry into Vietnam. Currently, Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) does not require travelers to fill up a digital arrival card, but please check for any additional requirements that may be imposed by the local government.

If you need a visa, please check the application requirements and fees on the Cebu Pacific TravelDoc website. The visa application process may take around 5-10 working days.

Resolution Time: 10 minutes
source_article: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'd like to know more about the rebooking fee. PHP 200 seems quite steep. Is there any flexibility on this policy?
resolution: Hi, I understand your concern regarding the rebooking fee. However, our Rebooking policy is clearly outlined in the AirSWIFT FAQs, which state that fees start at PHP 200 for domestic flights. Unfortunately, we cannot waive this fee as it allows us to maintain our efficient flight operations. If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to ask. Next, I can help you with checking the rebooking options available for your flight. Would you like to explore those?

customer_query: I'm not happy with the rebooking fee. I think it's too high. Can you waive it or offer an exception?
resolution:
We understand your concern, and we're more than happy to help you find a solution.

However, our rebooking fee is based on our flight suspension policy and is subject to the applicable fare difference.

That being said, we can offer an exception to waive the rebooking fee in certain circumstances. Please note that exceptions are not guaranteed and are subject to approval.

Here are the steps to follow:
1. Contact our customer service team to explain your situation.
2. Provide documentation supporting your request, if necessary.
3. We will review your request and respond with a decision.

If we approve your request, we will waive the rebooking fee. Otherwise, you will need to pay the fee as stated in our policy.

Can you please provide more information about your situation?
source_article: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Manila and Chiang Mai

customer_query: ano ba pwede ko gawin kung di ko alam kumuha ng ID?
resolution: Sa international flights, ang kailangan mo ay ang iyong passport. Hindi mo ito kailangang i-submit ng bago ang pag-alis mo para ma-check-in sa online. Ngunit mahalaga na mai-scan mo ang iyong passport sa pag-surrender sa check-in counter bago ka mag-depart. Kung may katanungan ka pa, maaari kang kausapin ang aming suportang tao sa support@cebupacificair.com.

customer_query: I don't understand. Why do I need to have an existing and verified account to use the e-Wallet option?
resolution: You need to have an existing and verified account to use the e-Wallet option because it's a requirement for GrabPay, GCash, and Maya. This is mentioned in the article under the 'e-Wallet' section. You can check our website for more information on how to verify your account and use the e-Wallet option.

customer_query: Dear customer service, I am writing to inquire about the fees associated with bringing sports equipment in my checked baggage. I have read the article and it mentions that Sports and Hobby Equipment are allowed.
resolution: Thank you for reaching out. According to our article, Sports and Hobby Equipment are allowed in checked baggage. However, please be aware that there may be additional fees for oversized or heavy items. Typically, fees may range from 2,000 to 5,000 PHP per item, depending on the size and weight. We recommend checking with our airport staff at least 2 hours prior to your flight for any specific fees or restrictions.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: I was told I need to pay a fee to change my flight details. Is this fair?
resolution: We understand your concern about the fee. As per our policy, a rebooking fee may apply in certain situations. This fee helps us cover additional processing costs. However, we offer flexible rebooking options to accommodate changing needs. Our Live Agent can assist you in exploring alternative solutions and provide more information on our rebooking policies. Please chat with us via our app or website to discuss further and receive assistance within 5 minutes.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung nagbago ang plano ko?
resolution:
• Yes, you can rebook your flight as long as it's within our change fee policy.• The base fare does not include government taxes, airport terminal fees, other surcharges, and optional add-ons such as baggage and meals.• If you want to rebook, please call our hotline at 703-9999 or visit our website to make the necessary changes.• Please note that there may be a rebooking fee applicable to your new flight.

Next step: Please call our hotline to inquire about the rebooking fee and to schedule your flight changes.

customer_query: I REBOOKED MY FLIGHT TOMORROW AND NOW THE FEE IS TOO HIGH!!! PLEASE HELP ME ASAP!!!
resolution: The rebooking fee varies depending on your booking and route. According to our policy, a fare difference and change fee apply when rebooking. You can view your Booking Summary to see the breakdown of relevant fees. If you need assistance, please contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific website or mobile app. For your convenience, our support team is available 24/7. Please have your booking reference number ready when you call so we can expedite your query.

customer_query: I'm having trouble managing my booking because I'm not sure what to do after signing up for a MyCebuPacific account. Could you please explain it to me?
resolution:
After signing up for a MyCebuPacific account, you can easily manage your bookings and add-ons. Here's how:

1. Log in to your account and go to your booking details.
2. Click on the 'Manage Booking' tab to view and edit your booking information.
3. You can also purchase add-ons, such as seat selection and food orders, from this page.

Note: Make sure to have the same email address used in your previous bookings to easily add your existing Travel Fund to your account. Next step: Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I DIDNT BUY BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE ONLINE AND NOW I HAVE A 25KG BAG!!! HELP!!!
resolution: You will be charged an excess baggage fee of PHP 50 per kilo for the 5kg excess. You can pay this fee at the airport or pre-pay online for your next flight. If you need immediate assistance, please contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 from 6am to 10pm. To avoid this fee in the future, please pre-purchase your baggage allowance at least 2 hours before your flight.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CAN I USE MY TRAVEL VOUCHER FOR DOMESTIC ROUND TRIP?
resolution: Unfortunately, Travel Vouchers cannot be converted to Travel Funds or in the form of a refund. However, you can use it to book a DOMESTIC ROUND TRIP flight as long as it's within the voucher's assigned flight type. To redeem your voucher, please log in to your MyCebuPacific account or check the email you used to book your original flight. You will also receive the voucher via email. Make sure to apply the voucher during the booking process. For troubleshooting steps or further assistance, please visit our website.

customer_query: pwede ba akong mag-rebook ng flight ko na may additional baggage?
resolution: Unfortunately, any changes to your booking, including adding extra baggage, will incur a rebooking fee. Please refer to our website for the latest fees and charges. You can also contact our support team via the app or at https://www.cebupacificair.com/contact-us to discuss your options. If you need to rebook, please do so as soon as possible to avoid any additional fees.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight gamit ang travel voucher?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook a flight using your Travel Voucher. However, the voucher is assigned to a specific passenger name and cannot be transferred to another name. Similarly, it is also assigned to a specific flight type and cannot be changed to another origin/destination. For example, if your voucher is for a Domestic One-way flight, you cannot use it to book an International Round-trip flight. To rebook, please make sure to apply the voucher during the booking process.

customer_query: HELP!!! I'VE GOT A FLIGHT TOMORROW AND REALIZED I FORGOT TO CHECK IN ONLINE. WHAT DO I DO???
resolution:
Here's what you can do:
• Go to the airport and use the self-service kiosks or line up at Cebu Pacific's airport counters.
• Make sure to arrive at the airport three (3) hours before your flight, as the airport counters for domestic flights close 45 minutes before departure.
• If you need assistance, you can contact Cebu Pacific's customer support at 02 7744 6666 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: HELP!!! I HAVE A GADGET AND FOOD AND I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO!!!!
resolution: We understand your concern. According to our article, certain appliances, electronics, and gadgets can be brought in your checked baggage. Food items, however, are not allowed in checked baggage. Please separate your items accordingly. Note that oversized or prohibited items may incur additional fees. If you're unsure about your items, kindly contact our customer service hotline at 02 8702 0888 for assistance. You can reach us 24/7. We'll be happy to guide you.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I recently lost some items in the aircraft, what should I do?
resolution: If you lost items in the aircraft, please report it immediately to any Cebu Pacific ground staff, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. You can also contact the airport's Lost & Found office directly. We will assist you in filing a report and trying to locate the lost items.

customer_query: I am planning to fly with Cebu Pacific soon and I would like to know what options are available to me in case my flight is canceled or delayed. Could you please provide me with information on our airline's policies and procedures?
resolution: We appreciate your preference for Cebu Pacific. In case of flight cancellations or delays, we will provide you with options based on our airline's policies and the Philippine Air Passenger Bill of Rights. For cancellations, you can choose to be re-accommodated on the next available flight, rebook for free up to 30 days before or after the original schedule, or convert your ticket to a travel fund. For delays, we will provide refreshments, meals, or a food voucher equivalent to the delay time. You can find more information on our website or contact our customer service at +63 2 879-0888 or email us at [customercare@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customercare@cebupacificair.com). Do you have any other questions about our policies or procedures?

customer_query: Hello, I'm first-time flyer. Can a 3-year-old child sit on an adult's lap during the flight?
resolution:
Hi there! For a 3-year-old child, they are considered a minor. According to our policy, a minor can only occupy their own seat, but if you're traveling with an infant, they can sit on an adult's lap. However, there's no baggage allowance given for infants on lap. If you have any further questions or concerns, kindly contact our customer support team at [email address or contact number]. 

Next step: Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.

customer_query: I would like to know more about the CEB Flexi add-on and how it can help me in case of a flight cancellation
resolution: The CEB Flexi add-on allows you to convert your booking to a Travel Fund in case of a flight cancellation. This means you can use the value of your booking towards a future flight with Cebu Pacific. Please note that this add-on must be purchased in advance and is not available for rebooking. You can learn more about CEB Flexi and Travel Fund here: CEB Flexi and Travel Fund. Resolution Time: 4 minutes

customer_query: Hello, I booked a round-trip flight on my credit card, but then decided to cancel my trip. How do I get a refund?
resolution: You may be eligible for a refund under the following conditions. If your flight was canceled by us, or if your flight had a schedule change of at least one (1) hour, or if you were denied entry by immigration, you can reach out to us for a refund. Additionally, one-way and round-trip flights originating from Incheon, South Korea booked with KRW currency are eligible for voluntary refund processing even without GO Flexi or CEB Flexi. Please contact us at +63 2 720 2727 or email us at customer.service@cebupacificair.com to discuss your refund options. Please note that the fare and all other fees will be forfeited, and your flight will be considered flown.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung may dala akong mobility aid?
resolution: Pwede kang mag-rebook ng flight, pero may mga mga kasunod na hakbangin sa iyo kailangan gawin. Ang first rebooking ang libre, pero kapag ikaw ay naka-rebook ng higit sa isa, may kaunting bayad ang kukunin mo. Makababayaran ito sa loob ng 24 na oras bago ang inyong flight. Pwede mo ring magtanong sa amin tungkol sa mga detalye ng rebooking fee at sa mga karagdagang requirement. Mailing address mo ba ay updated?
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I would like to know if I can rebook my flight for a different date due to a personal reason and what fees are associated with it. I found that there is a rebooking fee of PHP 1,800 but I want to know if it's fair considering the fare difference
resolution: Thank you for expressing your concern. We understand that our rebooking fee of PHP 1,800 may seem high, but it's a standard fee to cover the operational costs. However, we do offer a fare adjustment for the new flight, which will be calculated based on the current fare. You can visit our website to check the fare and fare difference. For example, if the original fare was PHP 10,000 and the new fare is PHP 12,000, the price difference is PHP 2,000. The rebooking fee will still apply, making the total amount PHP 4,800. If you're still concerned, you can contact our customer service team to discuss further and explore possible alternatives.

customer_query: Dear Sir/Madam, I was informed that food and drinks will be given to passengers after 2 hours of tarmac delay. However, I was not provided with any food and drinks. Could you please assist me regarding this incident? Thank you.
resolution: Hello! I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during the tarmac delay. According to our policy, after 2 hours, the cabin crew will distribute food and water. However, if supplies are limited, priority will be given to passengers with special needs, small children, senior citizens, and pregnant women. Please contact our customer service at +63 998 999 9999 to report the incident and we'll look into providing assistance.
source_article: What to Expect During Tarmac Delays

customer_query: kumuha ba ako ng bayad bago kumatok na ng airport?
resolution: Yes, you need to pay for your outstanding balance before checking in. You can do this via Manage Booking on our website or through the Cebu Pacific app. Please ensure you make the payment at least 2 hours before your flight if you're traveling internationally, or 1 hour before your domestic flight. Once you've paid, you can proceed with online check-in. If you have any issues, feel free to contact us.

customer_query: kailangan ko ng digital arrival card para sa flight ko pero wala akong access sa comuter
resolution: If you don't have access to a computer, you can submit the TDAC using a mobile device or ask someone to help you. You can also visit the TDAC website and use their QR code scanning feature. If you're still experiencing issues, please contact our customer service team for help. We're here to assist you. Would you like us to provide more information on submitting the TDAC?

customer_query: How do I know if I have already completed my meal order for my upcoming flight?
resolution: You can check your booking status and meal order through the 'Manage Booking' section on the Cebu Pacific app. From there, you can view the details of your meal order and make any necessary changes. Please note that hot meals must be purchased 24 hours ahead, so we can prepare your meals fresh and ensure food safety.

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! pwede ba i-bring ang power bank ko sa checked baggage?
resolution: Yes, you can bring a power bank in your checked baggage. According to our article, electronics and gadgets are allowed in checked baggage. However, please note that you need to follow the power bank's manufacturer instructions and ensure it is properly packed. It's also a good idea to check with the airline for any specific rules or regulations. You may also want to consider bringing a portable charger for your hand-carry for easy access. customer_query: I am concerned about the mandatory Taiwan Arrival Card requirement for international travelers. Is this a new policy and how will this affect my travel experience?
resolution: The Taiwan Arrival Card is indeed a mandatory form for international travelers, as required by the Taiwan government. According to the Kaohsiung Airport and Travel Guide, travelers are encouraged to complete the online form at least 3 days before their arrival in Taiwan. Starting October 1, paper submissions will no longer be accepted. I recommend completing the form in advance to avoid any inconvenience during check-in. Can you please confirm if you have completed the form already or if you need further assistance?

customer_query: Hi, I have a medical condition and I'd like to bring my emotional support dog on my flight. Can you please tell me what documents I need?
resolution: To bring an emotional support dog on your flight, you need to provide a document with letterhead from your medical doctor supporting the need for the emotional support animal. Additionally, make sure to bring your dog's complete and up-to-date vaccination card. Both documents must be presented at check-in. Resolution time: 5 minutes.

customer_query: kumusta po ang airport facilities sa Chubu Centrair International Airport?
resolution: Chubu Centrair International Airport features various airport facilities including restaurants, shops, and lounges. As Cebu Pacific operates flights on the Manila-Nagoya-Manila route, you can expect to find a range of dining options at the airport. You can also use our airport lounge for a fee of PHP 500 per person. For more information, please check our website or contact our customer service hotline at +632 7020 888.

customer_query: I booked a flight TOMORROW with CEB Flexi!!! HELP!!! Will I get a refund if I just want to cancel!!!
resolution: You can cancel your flight for free if you have CEB Flexi, but you'll need to do so up to two hours before departure. To cancel, please log into your MyCebuPacific account and follow the instructions to voluntarily cancel your flight. You can then convert the value of your booking to a Travel Fund. Keep in mind that CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation and does not cover rebooking change fees. If you're looking for a refund, please check our policy on cancellation fees and contact our customer support team via [email](support@cebupacificair.com) or [live chat](https://www.cebupacificair.com/support).

customer_query: I read on your website that rebooking fee is PHP 2,000, but when I called the hotline, they told me it's PHP 3,000. Can you clarify this for me?
resolution: Dear passenger, we apologize for the confusion. You are correct, our rebooking fee is PHP 2,000. We'll make sure to update our customer service hotline and website to reflect the correct information. To resolve this, please call our customer service hotline again and let them know that you've been informed of the correct rebooking fee. We'll be happy to assist you in rebooking your flight. Please note that our fees are subject to change, and we strive to provide accurate information to our passengers. Next step: please call our customer service hotline again to resolve this issue.

customer_query: I strongly disagree with the Unaccompanied Minor Fee on domestic flights. Many airlines do not charge such fees. Why does Cebu Pacific have this policy?
resolution: We understand your concerns, but our policy is in place to ensure the child's safety and comfort during the flight. Unfortunately, we are unable to waive the Unaccompanied Minor Fee. However, we are happy to provide more information on how to use our Unaccompanied Minor Service, which includes the escorting of your child to the gate.

customer_query: anong mga facility ang available sa sydney airport? magkano ang mga bayad?
resolution: Sydney Airport has various facilities such as restaurants, shops, and lounges. Some facilities may have a fee associated with them. For example, access to the airport lounge may cost around PHP 2,000. Please note that baggage allowance for your flight can be checked at cebupacificair.com. The standard baggage allowance is 30kg for economy class.

customer_query: FLIGHT TOMORROW HELP!!! I booked a flight for my 9-year-old child but I just realized that I need to complete the Passenger Handling Form. Is it too late to do this now?
resolution: I'm so sorry to hear that you're in a rush! Unfortunately, according to our policy, the Passenger Handling Form must be completed at least 24 hours before your flight. Since your flight is tomorrow, it is too late to complete the form. However, I recommend contacting our customer service team via our website or phone number at 700-888-0088 as soon as possible to explain your situation. They may be able to assist you or provide guidance on the next steps to take.

customer_query: I NEED TO CHANGE LANGUAGE TO ENGLISH ASAP FOR TOMORROW'S FLIGHT!!! HELP!!!
resolution:
Here's how you can change the language on the Cebu Pacific app:

1. Open the Cebu Pacific app and tap 'Menu' at the top right corner of your screen.
2. Under 'Preferences', tap on 'Language' to access the available options.
3. Select your preferred language, and the app content will be displayed in your chosen language.

If the language still hasn't changed, please return to the Menu and tap on 'Country' at the bottom, then select your preferred country from the list. For the app's content to be displayed in English, please select 'Australia', 'Philippines', 'Singapore', or 'United Arab Emirates'. You can also refresh the app or try a different browser if the problem persists.

For the website, please click on the language selector located at the top right of the page, select your preferred language from the list, and if the language still hasn't changed, click on the country selector at the bottom of the website and select your preferred country from the list. To change the content to English, please select 'Philippines'.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: anak ko 2 taong gulang pwede ba mag-rebook?
resolution:
Oo, pwede kayong mag-rebook. Sa 2 taong gulang, ang bata ay isang minor at hindi pa rin pwedeng mag-rebook nang walang bayad ng bagagyo.
* Ang bagagyo ng menor de edad ay hindi libre, pero may bayad na hand-carry baggage allowance.
* Sa halagang PHP 200, sila ay pwedeng magbawas ng tatlong (3) pieces ng checked bagagyo.
* Kung gusto ninyong mag-rebook, magandang magsimula sa pahina ng [rebooking](https://cebupacificair.com/booking/rebooking).
* Kung may tanong o katanungan, wag mag-alala, at magandang mag-try ng [customer service](https://cebupacificair.com/help/contact).
Paano mo gusto na mag-rebook?

customer_query: ano ba pwede kong gawin kung naka wheel chair ako pero wala akong reservation sa wheelchair?
resolution: You can request wheelchair assistance when you first book a flight or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app at least two (2) hours before departure. If you've already booked your flight and need wheelchair assistance, please contact our Customer Service team via email at customercare@cebupacificair.com or through our 24/7 hotline at +63 2 7744 8333. They can assist you with your wheelchair request. Please note that you can also bring your own wheelchair/mobility aid on the flight for free.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I'M FLYING TOMORROW AND MY CHILD IS SEPARATED FROM ME CAN I PLEASE GET A WINDOW SEAT SO WE CAN SIT TOGETHER!!!
resolution: Unfortunately, you can't change seats for free if you didn't buy Seat Selector. You can try purchasing a seat when you book your flight or through Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. Keep in mind that everyone with a ticket is guaranteed a seat on the aircraft, and you'll be assigned a random seat at check-in. If you're traveling with multiple guests, there's a chance you won't be seated together, so it's recommended to book your seats in advance. The fee for Seat Selector varies depending on the route, but you can check the Manage Booking section for more information.

customer_query: I'M GOING TOMORROW AND I JUST REMEMBERED I DIDN'T HAVE CEB TRAVEL SURE!!! CAN I STILL BUY IT?
resolution: Unfortunately, you missed the window to purchase CEB TravelSure via Manage Booking. You can try purchasing it when you book your next flight, but please note that it may not be available for your current travel plans. Please contact our customer service team at +632 8859 2774 to discuss your options.

customer_query: I have an unsettled balance, but I was not informed about the fee for flights exiting Dubai. Is this fee fair and necessary?
resolution: We understand your concern regarding the fee for unsettled balances on flights exiting Dubai. However, this fee helps us recover the costs of handling last-minute payments and rebookings. It is applied in accordance with our policies and guidelines. Nevertheless, we appreciate your feedback and will consider your opinion when reviewing our policies. In the meantime, please settle any outstanding balances to avoid additional fees. If you have any further concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer support team. We'll be happy to address your concerns and provide assistance.
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung may kukuha ako ng promo ticket?
resolution: According to our booking policies, bookings are generally non-refundable, non-reroutable, and non-transferrable. However, if you book a regular/non-promo flight exiting South Korea, you may be exempt from some of these rules. Please contact our customer service team to discuss your options. They may be able to assist you in rebooking your flight. Next steps: Discuss your options with our customer service team.

customer_query: i am writing to challenge the rebooking fee of P2,000. isn't this excessive considering the airline cancelled our flight?
resolution: Thank you for sharing your concern with us. I understand that our rebooking fee of P2,000 may seem excessive, especially if the airline cancelled your flight. However, according to our airline policies, fare differences and change fees apply when rebooking. The GO Flexi Fare Bundle or CEB Flexi Add-on can provide flexibility in making changes to your booking, including free rebooking or cancellation due to schedule changes or flight cancellations. If you believe the fee is unfair, please contact our customer support team at 1-800-CEBU-PACIFIC, and we'll be happy to review your case and provide a possible refund or waiver of the fee.

customer_query: I am a first-time flyer and I am a bit confused about what I can bring in my checked baggage. Could you please clarify the food section?

You may also want to check with the airline for any specific rules or regulations on food items. customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding how to manage my bookings. Can you explain the process?
resolution: To manage your bookings, simply log in to your MyCebuPacific account. From there, you can view your existing bookings, check-in online, and make any necessary changes. If you're having trouble logging in, please check that your username and password are correct. If you're still having issues, please contact our support team via email at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) or phone at 02 8585 8888. We can assist you in managing your bookings.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: What if I miss the 4-hour payment deadline for Philippine Travel Tax?
resolution:
If you miss the 4-hour payment deadline for Philippine Travel Tax, you will not be able to check-in online. You will need to pay the tax at the airport before proceeding with check-in.
Please note that late payment may result in additional penalties or fees.
If you have any concerns, please contact our Customer Service Hotline at +63 998 848 8555.
Next step: Please confirm your flight details and Philippine Travel Tax payment with us to avoid any issues during check-in.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung wala akong CEB Flexi? kailan ba magkano ang bayad
resolution: Unfortunately, CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation; it does not cover rebooking change fees. You will need to pay a fee for rebooking your flight without CEB Flexi. If you want to avoid this fee, you can purchase CEB Flexi on your next flight. The price of CEB Flexi is based on your flight date and regulatory guidelines.

customer_query: i was charged a rebooking fee of PHP 4,080 for my flight change, but i think it's unfair since the flights were not fully booked. can you explain?
resolution:
• Our rebooking fee policy is outlined in our website: PHP 2,080 for domestic flights and PHP 4,080 for international flights.
• These fees are in place to cover the costs of processing changes to your flight booking.
• If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact our customer service hotline at 700-800-088.

To understand our rebooking fee policy better, please visit our website and review the terms and conditions.
Next step: Call our hotline for further assistance.

customer_query: I think it's unfair to charge a fee for adding another guest to an existing booking. Can you waive the fee for me?
resolution: We understand your concern, but our policy is clear: you cannot add another guest to an existing booking, except for infants below 2 years old at the time of travel. This policy is in place to ensure that we can provide the best possible service to all our passengers. However, we can offer you an alternative solution: booking separate one-way flights for the additional guest. We can also provide you with a refund for the difference in fare, minus the applicable service fee. Please contact our customer support team via [email](mailto:customer_support@cebupacific.com) or [phone](tel:02-702-0888) to discuss your options.

customer_query: I was denied entry by immigration, but I paid for the PH Travel Tax. Is it fair that I won't get a refund?
resolution: I'm happy to help you explore this further. According to our policy, if you have been denied entry by immigration, you are eligible for a refund for the PH Travel Tax. However, we need to review your case to ensure this is applicable. Please approach us at the airport counters for assistance, or chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. They can assess your case and provide guidance on the next steps. Additionally, please note that if you have the CEB Flexi add-on, you can cancel your booking and convert it to a Travel Fund, which may provide more flexibility. Next step: Please review our refund policy and terms, and we will review your case and provide a resolution. Resolution time: 9 minutes

customer_query: IS MY FLIGHT STILL OKAY TONIGHT!!! I FLY TO CLARK IN 2 HOURS!!!
resolution: Your flight is still okay and will depart from Clark International Airport as scheduled. Since you're flying to Clark in 2 hours, please proceed to the airport immediately and arrive at least 3 hours before your flight. For any further assistance, you can contact our 24/7 hotline at 02 855-8888 or visit our website at cebupacificair.com.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: I BOOKED MY FLIGHT YESTERDAY BUT FORGOT TO LOGIN. NOW I NEED TO LINK IT TO MY ACCOUNT BUT I DON'T KNOW HOW!!!
resolution: To link a booking to your account, make sure you are one of the guests in the booking or the full name or email address matches the details in your MyCebuPacific account. You can find the 'Add or link an existing booking' feature in your account. If you're having trouble, please contact our support team via chat on our app or website.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: what are the baggage and handling guidelines for power banks that do not exceed the 100wh capacity?
resolution: According to our 'Baggage and Handling Guidelines' section, power banks that do not exceed the 100Wh capacity can be brought in checked baggage. Please ensure that your power bank is properly packed and does not exceed the checked baggage weight limit of 32kg. If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact our customer support at +63 2 976 1834. We are available 24/7 to assist you.
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko sa Cebu Pacific? kung oo, magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight with Cebu Pacific. According to our flight schedule, you can rebook your flight until 3 hours before the scheduled departure time. The rebooking fee is PHP 1,200. Please note that if you rebook to a higher fare category or a different flight schedule, the fare difference will be deducted from the original fare. You can rebook your flight through our website or by contacting our support team at +63 917 725 5711. Resolution time: 12 minutes. Please provide your booking reference number so we can assist you further.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ang flight ko, kung oo, anong mga requirements?
resolution: Oo, pwede kang mag-rebook ng flight ko. Para sa mga requirements, you need to contact our customer service team through the Cebu Pacific app or website, available 24/7. We will assist you with the rebooking process. Please note that there might be a rebooking fee, which will be disclosed to you during the contact. You can also contact our AirSWIFT Hotline at +63 2 5318 5940 or +63 917 816 8763, available daily from 8 AM to 7 PM, Philippine Time.
source_article: AirSWIFT Airlines Migrates to Cebu Pacific System

customer_query: I'm concerned about the no show policy for GO Basic. If I don't show up for my flight, won't I just be able to rebook for a full refund?
resolution: I understand your concern, but our no show policy is clear: if you don't show up for your flight, your fares and fees will be forfeited. This is stated in our Fare Rules, under the GO Basic tab. Unfortunately, you won't be able to rebook for a full refund if you don't show up for your flight. However, you can contact our customer service team at [phone number] or [email address] to discuss possible alternatives, such as canceling your booking and receiving a refund, minus any applicable fees.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-update ng contact number ko bago mag-flght? kung oo, magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can update your contact number up to 2 hours before your flight. However, please note that you can update this multiple times as necessary. There's no fee for updating your contact number. To proceed, go to Manage Booking and update your contact number. Make sure to save the changes. If you're still within 2 hours before your flight, you can do it online. If not, please approach the airport counters for assistance.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I noticed that the airport guide mentions that the Taoyuan Airport MRT is available. Does this mean I can use it to get to the airport?
resolution: Yes, you can use the Taoyuan Airport MRT to get to the airport. The MRT is a convenient and affordable option. However, please note that the MRT operates from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM. If you plan to arrive at the airport before or after these hours, you may need to consider other transportation options. The airport travel guide is clear about the MRT's operating hours and availability. Is there anything else you'd like to know about the airport's transportation options?

customer_query: magkano ang bayad kung naitala ang bag ko sa airport pero di ko na nakita
resolution: Unfortunately, if you left your checked baggage at the airport, you need to contact the airport's Lost & Found office directly, as Cebu Pacific operates independently from airports. The contact information for each airport can be found in our directory. Please note that we do not provide compensation for lost airport items. You may need to contact your travel insurance provider to see if they can assist you. Please allow 8 minutes for us to provide you with the contact information for the airport's Lost & Found office.

customer_query: I believe the rebooking fee is excessive and I'd like to dispute it. According to your policy, you should have a more reasonable fee. Can you look into this and refund me the excess amount?
resolution: We understand your concern and apologize for any inconvenience. However, our rebooking fee policy is clearly outlined in the OTA booking terms and conditions. The PHP 1,200 rebooking fee is a standard fee applicable to all rebooking requests. While we appreciate your feedback, we cannot waive the fee. If you have further concerns, you may escalate your case to our Customer Service Manager at [csmanager@cebupacificair.com](mailto:csmanager@cebupacificair.com) or via our 24/7 hotline at 700-7020. We'll be happy to explore options for you.
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I think it's unfair that we have to pay an extra fee for sports and hobby equipment in checked baggage. Can you explain the rationale behind this policy?
resolution: I hear your concern and I'm happy to provide more information on our policy. According to our article, sports and hobby equipment are considered special items and are subject to additional fees. The fees are necessary to cover the extra handling and storage costs associated with these items. However, I understand your frustration and I'd be happy to help you explore alternative options for your equipment. If you're willing to pay an extra PHP 500 for checked baggage, we can accommodate your sports and hobby equipment in your checked baggage. Alternatively, you may want to consider shipping your equipment to your destination instead. What's your preferred option?
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: Why is there a rebooking fee for flights I booked online? I think it's unfair because I booked directly with you.
resolution: The rebooking fee is a standard charge for changes to bookings, as stated in our Fare Rules and Conditions. This fee is in place to cover the administrative costs associated with making changes to bookings. While we understand your concern, our policy is to apply this fee consistently across all bookings, regardless of how they were made. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to help. Next step: review our fare rules and contact us if you'd like to discuss further.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung hindi ko pa na-avail ang promo ko?
resolution:
* Unfortunately, once a booking is made, our promo and sale periods are final. 
* However, you can rebook your flight but you will incur a rebooking fee based on our rebooking policy. 
* The rebooking fee typically costs between PHP 100 to PHP 1,500. 

Please check our website for the full rebooking policy and fees. Would you like me to assist you with rebooking your flight, ma'am?
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: I would like to update my contact number and nationality before my flight, but I'm not sure if I can do it online. Can you clarify?
resolution: You can update your contact number up to 2 hours before your flight. To do this, go to Manage Booking and update your contact number. For nationality changes, you can do it up to 2 hours before your flight as well, but please note that you can only update it once. If you're still within 2 hours, you can proceed online. If not, please approach the airport counters for assistance. Also, please note that you'll need to have an account to make any booking changes.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I believe the rebooking fee is unfair since I have to change my flight due to unforeseen circumstances. Can I get an exemption?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we're happy to help. However, our rebooking fee policy is clearly stated in our airport travel guide. We charge a rebooking fee of RM50 for every change made to a booking. If you'd like to discuss possible exemptions or alternatives, please contact our customer service team, and we'll be happy to assist you. Please note that we take all requests on a case-by-case basis, and our final decision is subject to the availability of seats and other factors.
source_article: Kuala Lumpur Aiport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I tried to check-in online but the system wouldn't allow me to because my power bank exceeded the size limit. Can I get a refund for the ticket since I was unable to travel?
resolution: We're sorry to hear that you encountered issues with online check-in. According to our baggage and handling guidelines, passengers are responsible for ensuring their baggage meets the size and weight requirements. If you were unable to check-in online due to your power bank exceeding the size limit, you may still be able to travel by checking in your power bank at the airport. However, please note that you may incur an additional fee of PHP 500 for checking in your power bank. If you still wish to request a refund, please contact our customer service team with your ticket number and reason for the request. We'll review your case and get back to you within 5 minutes.
source_article: Power Bank Limitations on Cebu Pacific Flights

customer_query: Paano ba mag-sign up sa MyCebuPacific account?
resolution: Maaari kang mag-sign up sa MyCebuPacific account sa pamamagitan ng sumunod na mga hakbang: 1) Pumunta sa website ng Cebu Pacific at klick sa 'Sign Up' sa taas ng pahina. 2) I-input ang mga pangalan mo at email address. 3) Piliin ang paraan ng pag-sign up (Facebook, Google, o Apple) kung gusto mo. 4) Sumunod sa mga instructions sa susunod na pahina. Kung may katanungan ka, maaari kang mag-email sa [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) o tumawag sa aming hotline.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I have a question regarding the terminal used for my Manila-Riyadh-Manila flight. My flight is TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: We understand your concern and want to help. According to our travel guide article, all flights will arrive at and depart from King Khalid International Airport (KKIA) Terminal 5. Unfortunately, Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) Terminal 3 is not a valid terminal for your flight. Please note that flights departing from Manila for Riyadh will depart from NAIA Terminal 3, but all flights will arrive at and depart from KKIA Terminal 5 in Riyadh. If you're arriving in Manila for your connecting flight to Riyadh, please make sure to check the flight itinerary or contact our customer service team to confirm your terminal. Next step: please confirm your flight details and terminal information so we can assist you further.

customer_query: I believe that charging P500 for rebooking after a tarmac delay is unfair. The delay was caused by the airline, not me. Can you please waive the fee?
resolution: Hi! I understand your concern about the rebooking fee. However, our policy clearly states that rebooking fees apply when you change your flight dates or times, regardless of the cause of the delay. The fee is P500. If you'd like to discuss this further, please contact our customer service at +63 998 999 9999. We can review your case and provide a possible exemption.
source_article: What to Expect During Tarmac Delays

customer_query: kumusta po kayo? pwede ba mag-rebook sa flight ko sa mga appliances na dala ko?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out. According to our article, Mobility and Household Items are allowed in checked baggage. However, we also have a rebooking fee, which is 2,000 PHP plus the fare difference. If you'd like to rebook, please contact our customer service at least 4 hours prior to your flight. We can assist you in finding a suitable flight for your appliances.
source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?
category: Can I Bring This in My Hand-Carry?

customer_query: I'm disputing the rebooking fee of PHP 500. I think it's too high. Can you review this for me?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we will be happy to review our rebooking fee policy with you. According to our policy, the rebooking fee is PHP 500, which is based on the fare difference between the original and new flight. However, we are willing to work with you to find a solution. Please contact our customer service at [insert contact number], and we will assist you in reviewing your case. We will provide you with a detailed explanation of our policy and see if there's a way to waive or adjust the fee.

customer_query: I'd like to rebook my flight but I'm not sure if I need to pay a change fee. Can you give me some guidance on how this process works?
resolution: To rebook your flight, please log in to your MyCebuPacific account and head over to our Manage Booking page. You can rebook your flight with the same origin and destination up to 2 hours before the scheduled flight time. Fare differences and change fees may apply. You will need to pay these fees and any other applicable charges before your rebooking request can be processed. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at +63 2 8516 0700.
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I booked a ticket with GO Basic, but I realized I need to bring checked baggage. Can I add this to my booking at a later time?
resolution: Unfortunately, you can't add checked baggage to your GO Basic booking at a later time. According to our Fare Rules, GO Basic only allows 7kg hand-carry luggage. If you need to bring checked baggage, you would need to upgrade to a fare bundle that includes checked baggage, such as GO Easy. However, this can only be done at the time of booking. You can contact our customer service team at [phone number] or [email address] to discuss your options. Next steps will depend on your specific situation.

customer_query: I would like to know the baggage allowance for my upcoming flight.
resolution: According to our Brunei International Airport travel guide, passengers are allowed 1 piece of check-in baggage weighing up to 20 kg and 1 piece of hand carry baggage weighing up to 7 kg. You can also purchase additional baggage allowance if needed. Please note that baggage fees will apply if your baggage exceeds the allowed weight or size.

customer_query: HELP!!! my flight is TOMORROW and I forgot to complete the digital arrival card!!! pwede ba mag-review ng requirements
resolution: To avoid delay at immigration, kindly complete the Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC) online or by scanning the QR code provided on the official website. The TDAC requires information such as personal and passport details, flight and accommodation info, and health declaration. There is no fee for submitting the TDAC. You can submit it immediately and carry a digital or printed copy for reference upon arrival. Please allow 5 minutes to complete the form.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: Hi, what terminal should I go to if I'm flying with Cebu Pacific to Narita? Is it Terminal 1 or 2?
resolution: Cebu Pacific operates from Terminal 2 at Narita International Airport. To ensure a smooth travel experience, please check your flight itinerary or confirmation email for your terminal assignment. If you're unsure, you can also check our website for the latest information on flight schedules and terminal assignments.
