Additionally, you can contact our customer service hotline at 02-851-8888 for assistance.

customer_query: I'm new to flying, how do I rebook my flight?
resolution: You can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. To do this, please go to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website, and follow the prompts to rebook your flight. If you need help, you can also chat with us via the app or website to connect with a Live Agent. What is the status of your current flight?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight sa MyCebuPacific?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook a flight through your MyCebuPacific account. To do this, log in to your account, go to the 'Manage Booking' section, and select the flight you want to rebook. You can also purchase add-ons for a more comfortable flight experience. Note that a rebooking fee may apply, depending on the type of flight and the time of rebooking. This fee is stated in our [Fare Rules and Conditions](https://www.cebupacificair.com/fares-and-booking-conditions). Next step: review our fare rules and contact us if you have further questions.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: magkano ang bayad para makabawi ng paglipat ng ruta sa may Hanoi?!?
resolution: Pwede kang mag-rebook ng ruta sa Noi Bai International Airport, pero magbabayad ka ng rebooking fee na P1,500 para sa bawat pagbabago ng ruta. Para sa mga detalye, tawagan ang aming hotline sa 02-851-6333. Para sa mga rebooking requirements, pumunta sa aming website sa cebupacificair.com at mag-check ng mga pahinang tungkol sa Mga Kawing at Pagsasakay. Kumuha ng oras ng oras mo para sa pagpaparebook at pumunta sa airport sa oras mo ng pagsakay. Next step: Tumawag sa hotline namin para sa mga detalye ng rebooking fee at requirements.

customer_query: PAWELAN NA KO BA MAG-PANUWID SA PAGKAALIS KO SA BORACAY? MAGKANO ANG BAYAD??? FLIGHT IS TOMORROW PLEASE HELP!!!
resolution: You can purchase CEB Transfers when booking your flight or up to 24 hours before your flight via Manage Booking in the Cebu Pacific app. The CEB Transfers add-on is only available for flights to Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. A MyCebuPacific account is required to buy or add CEB Transfers. The fee for CEB Transfers is not specified in the article, please check the Cebu Pacific website for the latest information. For assistance, please contact Cebu Pacific through their website or call their customer service hotline.

customer_query: I'm trying to rebook my flight but I'm being charged a change fee. I think this is unfair because I'm being forced to change my flight due to a schedule change. Is there anything I can do about this?
resolution: We understand your concern, but change fees apply to rebooking of flights. Fare differences and change fees are non-refundable. You can try rebooking your flight with the same origin and destination up to 2 hours before the scheduled flight time. If you have any further concerns or complaints, please email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) and we will address your concerns according to our airline policies.
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: Kumusta? Pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko sa Chiang Mai nang walang bayad?
resolution: Magandang umaga! Kung nais mo mag-rebook ng flight sa Chiang Mai, may mga fees na kailangan bayaran. Base sa ating flight schedule, may PHP 2,000 ang rebooking fee. You can check our website for the latest schedule and rebooking policy. Please note that our team can assist you with rebooking, but you will need to provide proof of payment for any additional fees. For assistance, please contact our Customer Support Hotline at +63 02 8588 8500, available between 8am to 9pm daily. Sana makatulong kami sa inyo.
source_article: Chiang Mai Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko at magbago ng baggage allowance ko
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight and change your baggage allowance. However, please note that you may incur a rebooking fee and any difference in baggage allowance fees may also apply. If you need to rebook your flight, please contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 from 6am to 10pm. To confirm the fees and options, please provide me with your booking reference number. Can I assist you with rebooking your flight?
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: HELP!!! FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I JUST GOT HOSPITALIZED!!! CAN I STILL CANCEL WITH CEB FLEXI!!!
resolution:
Yes, you can still cancel with CEB Flexi. According to our policy, you can cancel your flight for free and convert the value to a Travel Fund up to two (2) hours before departure. Since your flight is tomorrow, you have less than 24 hours to cancel. Please log into your MyCebuPacific account and follow these steps:

1. Go to 'Manage Booking' and select your flight.
2. Click on 'Cancel Flight' and confirm the cancellation.

After cancellation, the value of your booking will be converted to a non-expiring Travel Fund. You can use this to pay for your future travel plans. Please note that CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation and does not cover rebooking change fees.

If you have further questions or concerns, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [email](mailto:feedback@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I've tried checking my email and still can't find my Itinerary Receipt. Can you help me?
resolution: Please try checking your inbox or junk folder again. If you still can't find it, you can save a copy of your Itinerary Receipt on your mobile device in case of inspections at the airport entrance. If you've checked and it's still not found, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can assist you within 8 minutes.

customer_query: I am writing to express my concern regarding the fee for rebooking my flight on the Cebu Pacific app. Is the $25 fee justified?
resolution:
We understand your concern regarding the rebooking fee. According to our policy, rebooking fees may apply. Please note that this is stated in our terms and conditions.

You can find more information on our rebooking fees and policies on our website at https://www.cebupacificair.com/en-PH/. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

We appreciate your understanding and look forward to assisting you with your travel plans.
source_article: How to Change Language and Country Settings

customer_query: I booked a one-way ticket and I'm not sure what the baggage allowance is. Can you please help me?
resolution: According to our website, checked baggage allowance is only included in our GO Easy and GO Flexi fare bundles. Since you booked a GO Basic fare bundle, you can add checked baggage in Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. The fare for checked baggage starts at P1,500 for domestic flights and P2,500 for international flights. Please note that each additional piece of checked baggage costs P500 for domestic flights and P1,000 for international flights. Can you please provide your booking reference number so we can assist you further?
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I disagree with the rebooking fee of PHP 500. Is there any possibility of waiving it considering the circumstances?
resolution: We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the rebooking fee. However, please note that the fee is non-refundable and non-discountable. As mentioned in our article, this fee is applicable only for rebookings made before the original travel date. If you have any further concerns or disagreements, please don't hesitate to escalate your case to our customer service team by calling our hotline at 02 855-8888. We'll be happy to assist you further.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I need to pay a fee for changing my meal order within 24 hours of the flight. Can you explain why this is the case?
resolution: We understand your concern, and thank you for bringing it to our attention. Our policy of charging a fee for changing meal orders within 24 hours is in place to ensure that we can prepare meals fresh and ensure food safety. This fee helps us cover the costs of preparing meals at short notice. However, we do offer a Voluntary Refund Policy for meals that have not been served during the flight. Please contact our live agents to discuss further. Next steps: Contact our live agents at 24/7 to discuss your issue.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CAN I REBOOK IF I WANT TO CHANGE THE DESTINATION!!!
resolution: Unfortunately, you cannot change the destinations with a rebooking. According to our Manage Booking page, we only allow changing your flight up to 2 hours before your flight, and fare differences and change fees apply. Please proceed with rebooking to the original destination or cancel your flight if you'd like to change it. You can reach us at +63 2 720 2727 or email us at customer.service@cebupacificair.com for assistance. Please note that you cannot change your destination and we will not be able to accommodate this request. Resolution: cancel or rebook to original destination.

customer_query: I'm confused about the rules for canceling my flight. Can you explain it to me in simpler terms?
resolution: I'd be happy to help clarify things for you. According to Cebu Pacific's policy, if you cancel your flight, you will forfeit the fare and all other fees. However, if you have the GO Flexi Fare Bundle or CEB Flexi Add-on, you may be able to convert your ticket to a travel fund. Otherwise, you can still rebook your flight via the Manage Booking page. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook sa masbate flight na mula MNL to CRK?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight. However, please note that rebooking fees and policies apply, as stated in our website. For flight DG 6177/6178, there's a rebooking fee of PHP 1,300. You can rebook online through our website or contact our Customer Service for assistance. Resolution time: 10 minutes.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) Masbate, Siargao Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: Can I request for a seat near the exit with extra legroom and priority boarding? I'm traveling to Macau.
resolution: Unfortunately, priority boarding is not available for Macau flights. However, you can try purchasing a seat near the exit with extra legroom through Seat Selector. This will give you extra legroom and a seat near the exit. You can purchase this when you book your flight or through Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. The fee for Seat Selector varies depending on the route, but you can check the Manage Booking section for more information.

customer_query: I'm part of a group booking with 25 passengers. Can we check in online or do we have to wait in line?
resolution: Unfortunately, our online check-in system is not available for group bookings with more than 20 passengers. However, you can still check in at the airport with your group. Please plan to arrive at the airport with plenty of time to spare to avoid long lines. For further assistance or inquiries, please contact our customer service team.

customer_query: Dear Sir/Madam, I recently booked a flight with Cebu Pacific and I am inquiring about the invoice for my purchase. Could you please provide me with the necessary information regarding the invoice and itinerary receipt?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. You can find your invoice and itinerary receipt in your Cebu Pacific account or in the confirmation email we sent you after booking. The invoice will show the payment details, including the date and amount of payment, as well as any additional fees. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at +632 70-700-700 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a rebooking fee when I'm just trying to change my flight. Can you waive the fee?
resolution:
We understand your concern and apologize for any inconvenience. However, our rebooking fee policy is in place to ensure that we can continue to provide our services to our customers. Unfortunately, we are unable to waive the rebooking fee at this time.

That being said, we can offer you the opportunity to cancel your flight and convert the value to a Travel Fund, which you can then use to pay for your future travel plans. Please note that CEB Flexi only allows for free cancellation and does not cover rebooking change fees.

If you have further questions or concerns, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [email](mailto:feedback@cebupacificair.com).

customer_query: magkano ang rebooking fee para sa pagbago ng ruta ko sa may Hanoi?!?
resolution: Pwede kang mag-rebook ng ruta sa Noi Bai International Airport, pero magbabayad ka ng rebooking fee na P1,500 para sa bawat pagbabago ng ruta. Para sa mga detalye, tawagan ang aming hotline sa 02-851-6333 at kami ay magpapadala ng inyong mga tanong sa aming Mga Kawing at Pagsasakay team. Kumuha ng oras ng oras mo para sa pagpaparebook at pumunta sa airport sa oras mo ng pagsakay. Next step: Tumawag sa hotline namin para sa mga detalye ng rebooking fee at requirements.

customer_query: I NEED HELP!!! I REQUESTED WHEELCHAIR ASSISTANCE BUT IT DIDNT SHOW UP IN MANAGE BOOKING!!! WHAT DO I DO?!?!
resolution: We're sorry to hear that your wheelchair assistance request didn't show up in Manage Booking. Please contact our Customer Service team via email at [customercare@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customercare@cebupacificair.com) or through our 24/7 hotline at +63 2 7744 8333. They can check on the status of your request and assist you further. You can also try rebooking your wheelchair assistance through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app at least two (2) hours before departure.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW!!! PWD PAKIBILISAN NA ANG CHANGING OF DESTINATION?!?!
resolution:
According to our flight suspension policy, changing your destination is not allowed. However, you can choose to rebook to a new travel date before February 27, 2026. Please visit our website or app to manage your booking and select a new travel date. Please note that this option is only available before the last day of operations on February 27, 2026.

Here are the steps to follow:
1. Visit our website or app and log in to your account.
2. Go to Manage Booking and select the flight you want to rebook.
3. Choose a new travel date before February 27, 2026.
4. Pay any fare difference or rebooking fee, if applicable.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

How long will it take to process my rebooking request?
source_article: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Manila and Chiang Mai

customer_query: I need to REBOOK my flight and I want to know if I can still ORDER MEALS!!! The flight is TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: You can rebook your flight and still order meals, but you need to do it within 24 hours before your flight. Check Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app to see if you can still order meals. If not, you can contact our customer service at +632-8702-0888 to assist you. Please note that you may incur a rebooking fee, but this can be waived if you contact us within 24 hours.

customer_query: I think the rebooking fee is unfair. Can I get a refund?
resolution:
We understand your concern. However, our rebooking fee is in line with our fare rules and is non-refundable.
According to our policy, rebooking fees are not refundable unless the flight is cancelled or significantly delayed.
You can refer to our Service Fees section in our website for more information.
If you have any further concerns, please contact our Customer Service Hotline at +63 998 848 8555.
Next step: Please provide your booking reference number and a detailed explanation of your concern.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! WHAT IF I FORGOT TO DECLARE MY FOREIGN CURRENCY!!!
resolution: We understand your urgency. To address your concern, please check our article on the Cebu Pacific International Travel Guide. According to the guide, if you're carrying more than PHP 50,000 or USD 10,000, you need to declare the amount when filling your eTravel details. Please note that non-declaration or false declaration shall be subject to confiscation and/or legal action. If you have already checked in online, please report to the airport authorities immediately. To ensure a smooth process, we recommend that you check our guide for the specific requirements and procedures for declaring foreign currency. Next steps: Please report to the airport authorities immediately and provide your travel documents for verification.
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm concerned that the rebooking fee is unfair. I only received a Travel Advisory via email and I'm not aware of any other fees associated with the airport transfer.
resolution: We understand your concern. Our policy states that the rebooking fee is waived if the flight is rebooked within 24 hours of the original flight's departure. However, since your flight is departing tomorrow, the rebooking fee applies. You can try contacting our customer service hotline to discuss further. You can reach us at 02-8702-0888 (local) or +632-8702-0888 (international). We'll be happy to assist you with your concerns and provide more information on our rebooking policy. Please provide your booking reference number and flight details so we can assist you further.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook yung flight ko para magbago ng pangalan ko?
resolution: Unfortunately, rebooking is not allowed if it's more than 24 hours since you made your booking. However, you can update your name within 24 hours of booking. If you've already exceeded the 24-hour timeframe, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can validate your request. Please prepare proof of the name correction, e.g., marriage certificate, or other supporting documents. Next step: Please go to Manage Booking now to attempt the update if within 24 hours, or chat with us if outside of 24 hours.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: IS ONLINE CHECK-IN AVAILABLE FOR MY FLIGHT TOMORROW!!!
resolution: You can check in online for your flight as early as 48 hours before departure. Since your flight is tomorrow, you should have checked in online already. Please use our online check-in page to complete the process. If you're experiencing issues, you can contact our customer support team via the Cebu Pacific app or call us at +63 2 8702 0888. You can also visit our website for more information.

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! HOW DO I PURCHASE CEB TRANSFERS AFTER I ALREADY BOOKED MY FLIGHT???
resolution:
To purchase CEB Transfers, you can go to Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app up to 24 hours before your flight. A MyCebuPacific account is required. Please log in to your account and follow the prompts to add CEB Transfers to your booking. Please note that CEB Transfers is only available if your destination is Boracay via Caticlan or Kalibo. If you have any issues, you can contact us at +632 7744 9999 or visit our website for more information.

Next step: Log in to your MyCebuPacific account and attempt to purchase CEB Transfers again. If you encounter any issues, please wait until the next business day to contact us for assistance

customer_query: I think the fee for rebooking is unfair. Is there any way to avoid this fee?
resolution: We understand your concerns regarding the rebooking fee. Unfortunately, our policy requires a fee for rebooking flights. However, we may be able to waive this fee in certain circumstances. Please chat with us via our website or mobile app to speak with a live agent. They will review your case and provide guidance on the eligibility for a fee waiver. Please note that we require a minimum of 72 hours' notice before the scheduled flight departure time to consider a fee waiver.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: sir/ma'am, i'd like to request for a refund for my cancelled flight. however, i noticed that i'll be charged a fee for this. is this fair?
resolution: I understand your concern. Unfortunately, according to our policy, there's a fee for rebooking or refunding a cancelled flight. Please note that this fee is mentioned on our website, and it varies depending on the type of flight. I can try to assist you with the refund process, but please be aware that the fee will still be applied. If you'd like to proceed, please contact our customer service at <phone number>, and we'll guide you through the steps. Please have your booking reference number ready.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung naitala ang bag ko sa airport pero di ko na nakita?
resolution: Rebooking your flight is possible, but please note that there may be additional fees for making changes to your ticket. You can contact us via the Cebu Pacific app or website to inquire about rebooking and the associated fees. If you'd like to rebook, please provide us with your flight details and the reason for the change. We'll be happy to assist you. Please allow 5 minutes for us to get back to you with more information.

customer_query: how do i update my last name in my booking
resolution: To update your last name within 24 hours of booking, please go to Manage Booking and select the booking you would like to update. You can make changes to your last name only, and you can only do this once. Your last name should be exactly as it appears on your valid ID. Please note that you can only make this change once, and it must be within 24 hours of booking. If you have already passed the 24-hour mark, please contact our Live Agent via our app or website and provide proof of the name correction. What is your valid ID number so I can assist you further?
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: i feel like its unfair to have to pay a fee to rebook my flight if i lost my bag at the airport. can i get a refund if i cancel the rebooking fee?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, our rebooking policy is in place to cover the costs of making changes to your ticket. If you cancel your rebooking, the rebooking fee will not be refundable. If you'd like to discuss this further, please contact our customer service team via the Cebu Pacific app or website. We'll do our best to understand your situation and provide a resolution. Please allow 10 minutes for us to get back to you.

customer_query: I've successfully paid for my flight, but I've been asked to rebook it. Do I need to pay again?
resolution: As per our article, there's no need to book again if you've already successfully paid for your flight. However, please note that rebooking policies and fees may apply. Our Live Agent can help you better understand our rebooking process and any associated costs. Please chat with us via our app or website to discuss further and receive assistance within 10 minutes.

customer_query: i think it's unfair that you charge a rebooking fee of PHP 2,000 for making changes outside of the 24-hour window. can you explain the rationale behind this policy
resolution: We understand your concern, and we strive to provide a fair and transparent service. Our rebooking fee is in place to cover the additional administrative costs associated with making changes to a booking outside of the initial booking period. The fee also helps to ensure that our passengers are aware of the need to make changes within the allotted timeframe. If you have any further questions or concerns about our policies, please do not hesitate to ask. We are here to help. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: Hello, I recently booked a flight through a travel agency and I'd like to know more about my baggage allowance. Are there any additional fees for checked baggage?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out to us. As per our policy, standard baggage allowance for Economy and Premium Economy passengers is 1 checked bag weighing up to 32 kg. Any excess baggage will incur a fee of PHP 150 per kilogram. For more information on baggage policies, you can also visit our website or contact our customer service team at (02) 7020-8888. May I know the weight and dimensions of your checked baggage to provide more assistance?
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I would like to know if seat sales and promos will be sent to me via email if I sign up for MyCebuPacific.
resolution: Yes, as a MyCebuPacific account holder, you will receive updates on seat sales and promos via email. This is one of the benefits of signing up for an account, as mentioned in our article. To receive these updates, make sure your email address is up-to-date in your account settings. If you don't have an account yet, signing up is free and easy! Next step: check your email settings and confirm that you've signed up for a MyCebuPacific account.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I'm not clear about the wheelchair assistance. Do I need to pay for it?
resolution: No, wheelchair assistance is free. According to our policy, if you'd like to request wheelchair assistance at the airport, you may do so for free. However, please declare your wheelchair request no later than four hours before your flight. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact our customer service team at +632 8702 0888.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I am having trouble adding my booking to my account because I booked it through a travel agency. Magkano ang bayad for online check-in?
resolution: Our online check-in service is complimentary for most passengers. However, if you booked your flight through a travel agency, there may be an additional fee for online check-in. Please contact your travel agency to confirm their online check-in policy and any associated fees. If you are unable to contact your travel agency, please chat with us via our website or mobile app to speak with a live agent. They will assist you in exploring alternative options for online check-in.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm not sure if I should claim my baggage at the baggage claim area or not. Can you please clarify the process?
resolution:
After immigration, please proceed to the baggage claim area to claim your baggage. Check the respective baggage carousel on the display screen for your flight. If you're unable to find your baggage, please head to the Support Counter, located in the left side of the customs area after going through immigration, and look for the 'Lost & Found' or 'Lost Luggage' area.

Resolution Time: 5 minutes
source_article: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: what if my hand-carry is 9kg can i pay for gate baggage fee
resolution: According to our airport baggage guidelines, gate baggage fees vary by booking date and regulations. Unfortunately, you cannot pay for the gate baggage fee in advance. If your hand-carry is 9kg, you will be charged the gate baggage fee at the airport. To confirm the fee, please contact our customer service staff at the airport. Can I provide you with more information on our baggage allowance options for your next flight?
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I don't have a Cebu Pacific account. Can I still manage my booking?
resolution:
• Unfortunately, you need a My Cebu Pacific account to manage your booking.
• You can create an account on cebupacificair.com or through the Cebu Pacific app.
• Once you have an account, you can easily access your Manage Booking portal.
• If you have any issues setting up your account, please feel free to reach out to us.

Next step: Please create a My Cebu Pacific account and try managing your booking again.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ang ticket ko, kung ayaw ko ng flight nung ibinook ko?
resolution:
• Please visit [Cebu Pacific TravelDoc](link) to check if you need a visa for your travel.
• For flight changes, please refer to our rebooking fee policy: PHP 2,080 for domestic flights and PHP 4,080 for international flights.
• If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service hotline at 700-800-088.

To proceed, please visit our website to rebook your flight and pay the corresponding fee.
Next step: Call our hotline for assistance with the rebooking process.

customer_query: I'm a bit unclear, I'd like to cancel my flight but I think I might be eligible for a refund. I booked a one-way flight from Incheon, South Korea, and it's due to leave in 24 hours. Can I get a refund without the GO Flexi or CEB Flexi bundle?
resolution: Yes, you are eligible for voluntary refund processing because you booked a one-way flight from Incheon, South Korea, regardless of the fact that you didn't purchase the GO Flexi or CEB Flexi bundle. To proceed with the refund, please visit our website or call our customer support hotline at +63 2 8516 0700. Please be advised that you will not receive a refund of the fare and all other fees will be forfeited.
category: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I believe the change fee for rebooking my flight is unfair. I understand that I need to pay for a fare difference, but shouldn't the change fee be waived considering it's my first time rebooking?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we appreciate your feedback. However, our policy is consistent across all bookings. The change fee is applicable regardless of the number of times you rebook your flight. We do not have a waiver for the change fee. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to our customer support team.

customer_query: flight is TOMORROW help!!! pwede ko pa ba mag-REBOOK kung gusto ko ng earlier flight???
resolution: Hi, our Rebooking policy allows you to make changes up to 2 hours before your scheduled flight time. Unfortunately, since your flight is tomorrow, you're past that window. Rebooking fees start at PHP 200 for domestic flights. Please contact our 24/7 hotline at +632 70-20-888 or visit our website for more information. We can assist you with the rebooking process, but the fee applies. Can I assist you further with the rebooking?

customer_query: I booked CEB Transfers without realizing that it's only available for flights to Boracay. I'd like to dispute the fee for this service as I didn't get any benefit from it. Can you please assist me?
resolution:
We understand your concern and will be happy to assist you. However, our policies are in place to ensure that we provide the best possible service to our passengers. CEB Transfers is a prepaid service that is available for flights to Boracay, and it includes transportation from the airport to your accredited hotel and vice versa. Unfortunately, we cannot waive the fee for this service as it is a non-refundable charge. If you have any additional concerns or questions, please contact us at +632 7744 9999 or visit our website for more information. Please note that we will do our best to assist you in any way we can.

Next step: Please review our website and policies to understand the CEB Transfers service and the fees associated with it. If you continue to have questions or concerns, please wait until the next business day to contact us for further assistance

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? anong bayad?
resolution:
Oo, pwede ka mag-rebook ng flight mo. Kung ikaw ay naka-rebook sa isang bagong date, walang bayad sa iyong rebooking. Pero kung ikaw ay nagsamantala ng rebooking sa labas ng 30 araw, may bayad ka pero magkano ang bayad ay depende sa iyong form of payment. Para sa Travel Tax at unused TravelSure, dapat mag-refund ka nang separate.

Para sa mga detalye, tumawag ka sa aming customer service hotline o chat kami sa aming app or website.

Next step: Please confirm your form of payment and your desired new travel dates.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I'm confused about the seat sale terms. Why are there additional fees for baggage and other services when I already booked a seat sale promotion?
resolution: I understand your concern. Our seat sale promotions do not waive fees for baggage and other services. According to our seat sale terms (Seat Sales and Promo Fares), free baggage allowance is 7kg for domestic flights and 20kg for international flights. If your baggage exceeds the free allowance, additional fees will be charged. We try to keep our fees reasonable and transparent. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! CAN I STILL REBOOK TO CLARK AIRPORT?
resolution: Unfortunately, rebooking is possible, but you'll need to pay the rebooking fee. As per our policy, the fee for rebooking is PHP 1,200. You can rebook your flight by visiting our website or contacting our customer service hotline. You can reach us at 02-8702-0888 (local) or +632-8702-0888 (international). If you rebook within 24 hours of your flight, the fee will be waived. However, since your flight is tomorrow, the rebooking fee applies. You can also try checking our social media accounts for a Travel Advisory regarding the airport change. Once you've rebooked, you'll receive a notification with the new flight details.
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: Ano ang dapat kong gawin sa airport kapag hindi ko alam kung saan ako pumunta?
resolution: Wag kang mag-alala, kami ay nandito upang tumulong. Kapag nasa airport ka, maaari kang mag-rely sa flight information display screens (FIDS) para sa mga update sa flight status at boarding gates. Maaari kang rin humingi ng tulong sa mga airport staff kung kailangan mo ng assistance. Sa pagitan ng flights, maaari kang mag-check sa iba't ibang mga pasilidad sa loob ng airport, tulad ng duty-free shopping at lounges. Don't forget to follow the 'Arrivals' signs to proceed to the immigration counters after landing. What is your flight number and date of arrival so we can assist you better?

customer_query: HELP!!! FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I CAN'T FIND ANY SEAT SALE FLIGHTS!!!
resolution:
• Visit our Seat Sale page directly to check for available Seat Sale flights.• If you can't see any Seat Sale or Promo Fare flights, it may mean we've already run out of seat allocation for that destination.• Try checking other destinations on offer via the Seat Sale page.• If you have any further concerns, please call our hotline at 703-9999 for assistance.• Be sure to take note of the traveling period and select the flights that have the “Seat Sale” label.

Next step: Please review your options on the Seat Sale page and try re-searching for available flights. If you're still unable to find a suitable flight, please call our hotline for further assistance.

customer_query: Kumusta naman po kung magkano ang bayad para sa additional baggage ko?
resolution: For domestic flights, if your baggage exceeds the free allowance of 7kg, you'll be charged PHP 150 per kilogram for the first 5kg and PHP 300 per kilogram for the next 5kg. For international flights, if your baggage exceeds the free allowance of 20kg, you'll be charged PHP 300 per kilogram for excess baggage. You can check the baggage fees and pay for them online or at the airport. Please note that baggage fees are non-refundable. Is your flight tomorrow?

customer_query: I purchased CEB Flexi but did not create a MyCebuPacific account. How do I access my travel fund?
resolution: To access your Travel Fund, you need to sign up for a MyCebuPacific account and log in. Then, follow the steps in our how-to guide to access your Travel Fund. Please note that your Travel Fund will be available within 24 hours after canceling your booking. Once you've logged in, you can find the guide by searching for 'voluntarily cancel your flight and convert it to Travel Fund with CEB Flexi'. Our support team is here to assist you with any issues you may encounter.
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: kumusta ang mga opsyon para sa magpapa-rent ng bag sa changi airport?
resolution:
We don't offer baggage rental services directly, but you can consider the following options:
1. Rent a suitcase from one of the many luggage storage services in the airport, like the Luggage Hero or the Stasher.
2. Ask a friend or family member to bring an extra bag for you.
3. Consider purchasing a new bag at the airport's shops. Please note that there may be additional fees for checking in oversized or heavy bags.
4. For more information, you can visit the airport's website or ask one of our friendly staff members.

customer_query: I HAVE A FLIGHT TO CEBU TOMORROW HELP!!! WHAT TERMINAL DO I REPORT TO??
resolution: You have a flight to Cebu tomorrow. Please report to Mactan Cebu International Airport, specifically to Terminal 1 for domestic flights or Terminal 2 for international flights. You can check the airport guide at our website for more information. If you have any concerns, please contact our customer service at 02-777-5939 for assistance.
source_article: Cebu Pacific Destinations, Airports, and Terminal Numbers

customer_query: HOW CAN I CHANGE MY FLIGHT TO TOMORROW??? I NEED TO CANCEL MY BOOKING AND CONVERT IT TO TRAVEL FUND!!!
resolution: To change your flight, you'll need to cancel your booking and convert it to a Travel Fund. CEB Flexi allows free cancellation up to 2 hours before departure. Once you cancel, you can convert the value to a non-expiring Travel Fund, which can be used to pay for future travel plans. Please log into your MyCebuPacific account to make the necessary changes. If you don't have an account, please sign up before canceling your flight. You can find more information on how to cancel your flight and convert it to Travel Fund in our how-to guides.

customer_query: I'm trying to change my nationality but it says I can only do it once. What if I made a mistake? Can I change it again?
resolution: According to our policy, you can only update your nationality once. If you've already made the change and need to correct it, please contact our Live Agent via chat or phone. We'll try to accommodate your request. However, please note that there might be a fee associated with the change, especially if it's within 24 hours of your flight. We'll let you know the details and any applicable fees before making the change.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: What happens if my flight is cancelled? Will I get a refund for the CEB TravelSure?
resolution: In case of flight cancellation, you may be eligible for a refund of your CEB TravelSure policy. However, this is subject to the terms and conditions of the policy. For more information, please refer to our CEB TravelSure Policies section. You can also contact Chubb's customer service team at +632 8859 2774 or use their Self-Service Portal to file a claim.

customer_query: Kumusta po ang process ng refund ng fare ko?
resolution:
According to our flight suspension policy, you can request for a refund of your fare. Please note that the processing time of your refund will depend on your form of payment.

Here are the steps to follow:
1. Visit our website or app and log in to your account.
2. Go to Manage Booking and select the flight you want to cancel.
3. Choose the refund option.
4. Follow the prompts to complete the process.

Please allow some time for the refund to be processed. You will receive an email notification once the refund has been made.

When can I expect to receive my refund?
source_article: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Manila and Chiang Mai

customer_query: what is online check-in? pwede ba mag-rebook kung hindi ko gusto ang flight time?
resolution: Online check-in is a self-service feature available on our website and mobile app. You can use it to select your preferred seat, print or download your boarding pass, and check in for your flight. As for rebooking, yes, you can rebook your flight if you don't like the original flight time. However, you may be subject to a rebooking fee, which varies depending on the airline's policies. According to our website, the rebooking fee is PHP 2,000 or USD 40 for domestic flights and PHP 5,000 or USD 100 for international flights. You can rebook your flight by contacting our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or website.

customer_query: Magkano ang bayad ng rebooking fee pag hindi ko na kaya ang flight ko?
resolution: Kung hindi na kaya ang iyong flight, maaari kang mag-rebook para sa ibang flight. Maaari kang umanong magtanong para sa rebooking fee sa aming suportang tao at kung ano ang bayad nito. Mayroong batas na ang rebooking fee ay 50 pesos para sa domestic flights at 200 pesos para sa international flights. Kung ikaw ay may katanungan o kung ikaw ay mayroong konsern tungkol dito, maaari kang kausapin ang aming suportang tao sa support@cebupacificair.com.

customer_query: I DONT HAVE A FIRST NAME BUT I JUST BOOKED A FLIGHT TOMORROW HELP !!!!!!
resolution:
You can still sign up for a MyCebuPacific account even if you don't have a first name. Please follow these steps:

1. Go to the Cebu Pacific website and click on 'Sign Up'.
2. Fill in the required fields, including your last name and email address. You can tick the 'I have no first name' box and fill in the remaining fields.
3. Follow the prompts to complete your account registration.

Note: Make sure to use the same email address used in your previous bookings to easily add your existing Travel Fund to your account. Next step: Try signing up for your account again and see if you can resolve the issue.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook kung ayaw kong mag-dalawa na beses kasi masakit na ako
resolution: Unfortunately, you can only update your name once. If you need to make changes to your name again, you will need to follow the same process and provide additional documentation if necessary. However, please note that you can update your contact number multiple times as necessary. If you are experiencing discomfort and need to rebook, please contact our Live Agent via our app or website to discuss further options. Please note that rebooking fees apply, currently PHP 2,000. What is your contact number so I can assist you further?
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm trying to pre-order a meal for my upcoming flight, but it's not showing up in my booking. Can you help me?
resolution: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try logging out and back into your account to see if the option becomes available. If the issue persists, please contact our customer care team at +639063245632 or +63323059990 and we'll be happy to assist you. Please note that CEB Meals must be purchased at least 24 hours prior to the flight departure.

customer_query: I was charged a fee for baggage excess weight, but I don't think it's fair. Can you help me with a refund?
resolution: Our baggage allowance policy is clearly stated on our website, indicating a 20kg weight limit for checked baggage. If your baggage exceeds this weight limit, a Php 100 fee per kilogram will be applied. Please review our baggage allowance policy on our website for more information. If you believe you have been charged an incorrect fee, please contact our customer service hotline at 02-7020-8888 with your reference number and baggage details to request a review. Next step: Please contact us with your reference number and baggage details for further assistance.
source_article: Da Nang Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: KUMUKOY AKO KUNG PWEDENG IBALIK ANG BAYAD KO SA FLIGHT KO. MAGKANO ANG BAYAD PARA SA REFUND?
resolution:
To check if you're eligible for a refund, please follow these steps: 
1. Go to our website at [www.cebupacificair.com](http://www.cebupacificair.com) and click on the 'Manage Booking' tab.
2. Enter your booking reference number and last name.
3. Check the refund policy for your specific flight, based on the fare type and payment method used. 
According to our Online Travel Agency (OTA) bookings FAQ, refunds may take 7-10 working days to process. A service fee of PHP 200 will be deducted from the refund amount. If you have already initiated a refund request, please allow 3-5 working days for the process to complete. Would you like me to assist you with your refund request?

customer_query: HELP!!! I PURCHASED CEB FLEXI FOR MY FLYING TOMORROW BUT I NOW NEED TO CANCEL!!! CAN I DO IT???
resolution: You can cancel your booking for free if you purchased CEB Flexi. However, you must do so up to two hours before departure. To cancel, log into your MyCebuPacific account and follow the steps in our how-to guide. You can find the guide by searching for 'voluntarily cancel your flight and convert it to Travel Fund with CEB Flexi'. After canceling, your Travel Fund will be available within 24 hours. Please ensure you sign up for a MyCebuPacific account and log in if you haven't already. Your Travel Fund can be used to pay for future trips.
category: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I have a digital boarding pass but I'm not sure about the check-in process at NAIA Terminal 3. Can you help me?
resolution: If you're departing from NAIA Terminal 3, please proceed to Gates 5 & 6. If you don't have any bags to check in, head straight to the security/immigration gates. However, if you have bags to check in, you can use our Self Bag Drop Kiosks at Aisle A. You can also consider checking in online and using the digital boarding pass on your mobile device to speed up the process. For any further assistance, feel free to contact our customer support team.

customer_query: paano ba kung hindi ko nakita ang itinerary kong receipt?
resolution: Pwede kang i-check ang iyong email na tineregister sa booking. Tiyak na nakumpleto ang bayad para sa iyong flight o add-ons, kasi ang itinerary receipt ay isini-send sa loob ng 24 oras. Kung hindi pa rin makita mo ang itinerary, marahil kailangan mong tignan ang inbox o junk folder mo. Kapag wala pang 5 minutes, pwede kang mag-chat sa amin sa pamamagitan ng app o website para makonekta ka sa isang Live Agent na makakatulong.

customer_query: Can I check in at the airport if I have a group booking with more than 20 passengers?
resolution: Unfortunately, online check-in is not available for group bookings with more than 20 passengers. You will need to check in at the airport. Please arrive at least 2 hours before your international flight to ensure you have enough time to complete the check-in process. If you have any issues or concerns, you can visit the Cebu Pacific booth at the airport or contact our customer support team.

customer_query: I am planning to travel with a large musical instrument and I want to know if I can add it as checked baggage or if I need to purchase the special baggage add-on?
resolution: If you need to bring a larger or specialized item, such as a musical instrument, consider getting CEB Special Baggage Add-on. This add-on is available through Manage Booking or at the airport, subject to certain fees and restrictions. Please check the fees and charges for the special baggage add-on through Manage Booking under the 'Add Special Baggage' section.
source_article: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! WHAT HAPPENS IF WE GET LOST IN TRAFFIC AND MISS THE FLIGHT?!!!
resolution: Sorry to hear that you're feeling anxious about your flight. According to our airline policies, fare differences and change fees apply when rebooking. However, you can rebook your flight via Manage Booking up to 2 hours before your flight. If you're concerned about traffic, you can also consider adding the GO Flexi Fare Bundle to your booking, which allows for free rebooking or cancellation due to schedule changes or flight cancellations. Please note that there's no limit to the number of times you can rebook your flight. If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact our customer support team at 1-800-CEBU-PACIFIC.
category: Suspension of Cebu Pacific Flights Between Cebu and San Vicente

customer_query: kung pwede ba ako mag-rebook ng ceb transfers, magkano ang bayad kung may change sa flights ko?
resolution:
Yes, you can rebook your CEB Transfers if you make changes to your flight. If you need to change your flight, you will need to purchase the CEB Transfers add-on again.

To rebook, follow these steps:
1. Go to the Manage Booking section on the Cebu Pacific app.
2. Update your flight details.
3. Purchase the CEB Transfers add-on again.

Please note that you will need to pay for the CEB Transfers add-on again, and the cost is PHP XXX (the cost is not specified in the article, so please replace with the actual cost).

You can also contact us at XXX-XXX-XXXX to inquire about the CEB Transfers add-on and rebooking process.

customer_query: FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I FORGOT TO PRINT MY BOARDING PASS!!!
resolution:
We can assist you with printing your boarding pass. Please head to the Cebu Pacific website or mobile app to print your boarding pass. Follow these steps:
1. Log in to your account using your email and password.
2. Click on the 'boarding pass' tab.
3. Select your flight and print your boarding pass. If you're unable to print it, you can also check your email for your boarding pass.

Please note that Tan Son Nhat International Airport operates as a silent airport, which means there are minimal public announcements. You will need to check your flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on your flight status and boarding gate.

Resolution Time: 5 minutes
source_article: Ho Chi Minh (Saigon) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng CEB Special Baggage kung may kulang ako ng konti
resolution: Unfortunately, CEB Special Baggage cannot be added or changed less than 2 hours before your flight. If you need to add or increase your special baggage allowance, please contact our customer support through the Cebu Pacific app or via the website (https://www.cebupacificair.com) at least 2 hours before your flight. Please note that CEB Special Baggage may not be available on Cebgo (DG) flights due to limited space. You can expect a response from our support team within 10 minutes.

customer_query: I am concerned that the fee for shipping my emotional support dog via CEB Cargo is too high. Is there a more affordable option available?
resolution: We understand your concern, and we apologize if our fee for shipping your emotional support dog via CEB Cargo seems high. Please note that this fee is a standard charge, and it's necessary to ensure the safe transportation of your pet. However, we are happy to offer you a discount for your loyalty. Please contact us at +63 998 888 1234 or email [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) to discuss further options and find a solution that suits your budget.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I BOOKED MY AIRSWIFT FLIGHT LAST WEEK!!! MY REFERENCE NUMBER DOESN'T WORK IN THE CEBU PACIFIC APP!!! HELP!!!
resolution: Unfortunately, since AirSWIFT has migrated to the Cebu Pacific system, you need to use your new booking reference number to manage your booking. To resolve this, please contact our customer service team to obtain your new reference number. You can reach us through the Cebu Pacific app or website, available 24/7. Additionally, you can contact our AirSWIFT Hotline at +63 2 5318 5940 or +63 917 816 8763, available daily from 8 AM to 7 PM, Philippine Time.
source_article: AirSWIFT Airlines Migrates to Cebu Pacific System

customer_query: excuse me po, ano ang mga airlines na naka-terminal sa Terminal 3 ng Ninoy Aquino International Airport?
resolution: Our airline, Cebu Pacific, operates flights from Terminal 3 of Ninoy Aquino International Airport. According to our website, our flights are located in Terminal 3, but we operate from Terminal 2 for some flights. You can check our website for more information on our flight schedules and terminals. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service at 02-777-5939 for assistance.
source_article: Cebu Pacific Destinations, Airports, and Terminal Numbers

customer_query: pwede ba magpahaba ng aking paglalayag para sa Hanoi?!?
resolution: Tama, pwede kang magpahaba ng aking paglalayag para sa Hanoi. Pwede kang mag-rebook ng ruta sa Noi Bai International Airport at magbabayad ka ng rebooking fee na P1,500 para sa bawat pagbabago ng ruta. Para sa mga detalye, tawagan ang aming hotline sa 02-851-6333 at kami ay magpapadala ng inyong mga tanong sa aming Mga Kawing at Pagsasakay team. Kumuha ng oras ng oras mo para sa pagpaparebook at pumunta sa airport sa oras mo ng pagsakay. Next step: Tumawag sa hotline namin para sa mga detalye ng rebooking fee at requirements.

customer_query: I'm a bit concerned about the online check-in fees. I understand that I need to pay for changes to my booking, but I think the P500 fee is a bit steep. Can you please explain why this fee is necessary?
resolution: We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our online check-in fee is necessary to cover the costs of processing and handling changes to your booking. According to our Iloilo Airport and Travel Guide, this fee is already stated on our website and is subject to change. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight namin sa cebu pacific? magkano ang bayad?
resolution:
Cebu Pacific's rebooking policy allows you to change your flight for a fee.
Here are the steps to follow:
1. Log in to your Manage Booking page and select the flight you want to rebook.
2. Pay the rebooking fee, which is PHP 1500 for domestic flights and PHP 2500 for international flights.
3. The new booking will be automatically updated.
The rebooking fee is non-refundable, but you can cancel your flight and get a refund minus the rebooking fee.
You can call our customer service at 02-7738088 to confirm the rebooking fee and schedule.
Please note that rebooking is only allowed up to 24 hours before your scheduled flight time.

customer_query: WHAT IF I HAVE 2 CHILDREN, CAN I ADD ANOTHER GUEST TO MY EXISTING BOOKING ???
resolution: According to our guidelines, you cannot add another guest to an existing booking, except for infants below 2 years old at the time of travel. Unfortunately, this means you won't be able to add another child to your existing booking. However, you can book separate one-way flights for each child if you need to change their passenger type during the travel period. Please note that our passenger type cannot be changed once the booking has been paid. You can contact our customer support team via [email](mailto:customer_support@cebupacific.com) or [phone](tel:02-702-0888) to discuss your options.

customer_query: Excuse me, I'm a bit confused about the Admin Fee. Is it a one-time fee or do I have to pay it every time I book a flight online?
resolution: The Admin Fee is a service charge imposed on guests who book flights using Cebu Pacific's digital channels, including the website and mobile app. This fee is not a one-time payment, but rather a separate charge each time you book a flight. According to our policies and guides, the Admin Fee may be refunded or stored in a Travel Fund if your flight is disrupted. Please visit our online disruptions article to learn more about the Travel Fund. Next step: If you have any further questions or concerns about the Admin Fee, please feel free to ask us.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko? kung oo, magkano ang bayad?
resolution: **Rebooking is allowed, but with some conditions**. If you want to rebook your flight, you will need to contact our support team at https://www.cebupacificair.com/contact-us. Please note that you will be subject to change fees and fare differences. According to our Fare Bundle Guidelines, the fee for rebooking is based on the fare difference between the original and new booking. **Can you please provide your booking reference number so we can assist you further?**

customer_query: I would like to know the check-in procedures for my flight departing from NAIA Terminal 3. Could you please provide me with the instructions?
resolution:
For your flight departing from NAIA Terminal 3, please follow these steps:
1. Enter through Gates 5 & 6.
2. Proceed to the check-in kiosks between Aisles A & B.
3. If you don't have any bags to check in, head straight to the security/immigration gates.
4. If you have bags to check in, use our Self Bag Drop Kiosks at Aisle A.
Please have your boarding pass ready for scanning at the gate.
category: CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options

customer_query: I am planning to carry more than PHP 50,000 with me to Australia. What are the requirements for declaring this amount?
resolution: If you're carrying more than PHP 50,000 or USD 10,000 (or equivalent in other currencies), you are required to declare the amount when filling your eTravel details. For PH currency, you need to secure authorization from the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas. Non-declaration or false declaration shall be subject to confiscation and/or legal action.

customer_query: I would like to know more about the baggage allowance for flights departing from Clark International Airport (CRK).
resolution: For flights departing from Clark International Airport (CRK), the baggage allowance remains the same as before. However, please note that any baggage fees will be applicable as per our standard policy. You can check our website for more information on baggage allowance and fees. We also recommend checking with our customer service team for any specific requirements or restrictions.
source_article: Transfer of San Jose Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: HELP!!!!  WHEELCHAIR NOT SHOWING UP ON BAGGAGE ARRIVAL CAROUSEL!!!
resolution: Sorry to hear that your wheelchair is not showing up on the baggage arrival carousel. To resolve this, please contact our Cebu Pacific hotline at +632 7020 8888 or email us at [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com) and report the issue. We will check the status of your wheelchair and arrange for it to be delivered to you. Please note that our wheelchair service is only available upon arrival on specific destinations, and for other destinations, your wheelchair will be unloaded from the cargo hold and delivered to the baggage arrival carousel. We apologize for the inconvenience and will do our best to get your wheelchair to you as soon as possible.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!! I FORGOT TO APPLY FOR THE TDAC AND I'M NOT SURE IF I CAN STILL DO IT!!!
resolution: The TDAC is an online form that replaces the traditional paper-based arrival card for international travelers entering Thailand. You can still apply for the TDAC within 3 days before your entry date. Please visit the Visit Thailand Digital Arrival Card article to learn more. Go to the TDAC website and fill out the required information. You'll receive an email with a QR code that you can present at the immigration counters. Please also ensure you have a valid passport and any required visa. For Philippine passport holders, a visa is not required for stays up to 60 days. If you have any issues or concerns, you can contact Cebu Pacific customer support through our website or mobile app. We're here to help! Resolution time: 3 minutes

customer_query: I understand that my flight will be departing from Clark International Airport, but I'd like clarification on what terminal I should be heading to.
resolution: For flights departing from Clark International Airport, you'll be heading to NAIA Terminal 2. Although your flight is transferring to Clark, your departure terminal remains the same. Please make sure to check your Itinerary Receipt for more information on your flight details. If you have any issues with your baggage allowance or any other queries, you can try contacting our customer service hotline for assistance. You can reach us at 02-8702-0888 (local) or +632-8702-0888 (international).
source_article: Transfer of Cebgo (DG) and AirSWIFT (T6) Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: Ano ang pinapatawad na bayad kung gusto kong mag-rebook ng flight na hindi ko ginamit pa?
resolution: Unfortunately, there might be a rebooking fee for flights that you haven't used yet. However, we recommend downloading the Cebu Pacific mobile app and bookmarking www.cebupacificair.com for easier access and future bookings. You can also add no-reply@email.mycebupacific.com to your email contact list to receive updates about your flight. If you still have questions about the rebooking fee, please don't hesitate to contact us through the Cebu Pacific app or website, available 24/7.
source_article: AirSWIFT Airlines Migrates to Cebu Pacific System
